comments: Buggy! Once they fix the signing bugs, this might be a good game. Now, there are widespread examples of users not being able to get in; instead, it freezes at a white screen.  Many videos crash the game, which means you lose the treat you would otherwise earn by watching those ads. Other crashing problems as well.

For not getting even the first event bird out of 3 in alien excavation after opening so many premium eggs reaching (*4) of the premium eggs. I blame - chimera and rovio. Either the makers of the game are idiots or the game is stupid and seriously 2000 per month for an imaginary egg everyday that cannot guarantee a 4 or 5 star bird. Yeah, the makers of the game really are idiots.

the game is really fun and humorous. I love the clan feature- found a great clan to be part of. there are glitches that rovio needs to iron out that affect play. I am hoping this new big update helps fix all that. the changes look to be really good. excited to see what they've done.

I did not expect to enjoy this nearly as much as I have. The frequent events are nice and having a guild just makes them better. I don't feel compelled to be social be because there is no chat, just playing the game. It is a wonderful balance.

Love the game. The game play is great. Only down side is that I feel that the game cheats against me sometimes by adding enemies. Only happened about 3 times now. ***edit*** I have since realized there are certain pigs that do add more pigs when hit. The game doesn't cheat. I'm extremely happy with the game play and ability to build a great team without paying a whole bunch of money. You just need patients and good planning.

Decent game, lots of fun to keep you coming back. I would of rated a 4 star game but every time I need to watch a video the game stops working, stopping me from getting a free premium egg or opening chests!

descriptionHTML:
Collect, assemble, and evolve your flock.
100+ crazy new Angry Birds?! We’re gonna need a bigger nest. The flock is bigger and badder than ever before. Build your own team, combine super skills and evolve your birds into their ultimate form.

Embark on an epic adventure.
Something sinister is brewing on Bird Island. Why are there so many pigs around? Who is behind the mysterious Bacon Corp? What’s the Eagle Force? Who lost the dungeon keys? Find the answers – only in Angry Birds Evolution.

Crush the pigs in explosive battles.
What’s worse than egg-stealing pigs? Over 90 different varieties of egg-stealing Pigs, that's what. Pirates, ninjas, tourists – someone has to clean this place up. Let the feathers fly in full contact battles and send the pigs packing.

Join weekly events.
Earn awesome rewards, and get a chance to add extra rare birds to your team by taking part in weekly events. Join by yourself or assemble a clan of buddies to compete with other clans. Build the strongest, most awesome clan on Bird Island and rule the roost!

Compete against other players.
The Oinktagon: two teams enter – only one leaves (victorious). Challenge other players in PVP tournaments of the Bird Island pastime, Pigball, and dominate the leagues for even more awesome rewards.


FEATURES:
– Over 100 colorful new characters to hatch and collect.
– Assemble the ultimate flock of birds and take down the pigs with ease.
– 5 Classes of birds with unique abilities.
– Evolve your feathery heroes into unstoppable super birds.
– Explore the island and stop the Bacon Corp.
– Climb up the Eagle Mountain and win ultimate eggs.
– Battle other players in the Oinktagon.
– Join clans to unlock perks, compete with other clans, and chat with clanmates.
– Send out scouts for rewards & challenges.


This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.
- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
- This application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply. After the initial download, additional content will be downloaded and this may include data charges.

There‚Äôs never been a better time to buddy up and kick some pig butt!

title: Angry Birds Evolution

comments: Love this game addictive and lose time playing it. But anyone else having problems logging in? When i try to log in it just sits on the loading screen (on 100%).. Until i close the app and restart it Tried making a fresh Charecter and goes straight into other characters but just not my main.. This started happening an hour ago

I can't get certain menus to work. In shop its the purchase for mount gear, all i see is random text and it freezes the game. Some of the event menus do the same. Ive been playing for a little over a year and never had this problem. Please help.  Also the merit shop menu is broken. I can't buy anything and the event ends today. Ill update as I see other menus broken.

This game sucks.. I always get thee same armament with only one star!  and some items are soo expensive that the money you pay is not worthy for the br you get and in return you'll get low br and also low money not worthy.. If they make this game less expensive maybe I'll give it a four stars... But no! not this time

Makes you pay good money to be strong then merges you with much older servers that allows a no pay player to be much stronger ... horrible customer service also! Edit 3\18 I see Gatorcade replied to this saying contact them for help. I did 8 days ago with no reply... So yeah like I said horrible customer service

I paid money on This game only for it to stop working once I did...plunder doesn't open for me, mounts won't open for me...assassins creed play won't open...if I do open them....game immediately freezes and I have to shut down. Funny how I pay money and now I have Chinese characters all over the damn game...  THIS is absolutely a pay to play game...except when you pay...the game apparently stops working....

Hey guys.. So when I try to level up my mount I click on the icon and when it comes up most of it is blank except a few words in another language. It freezes the screen so I have to close out and sign back in. Also I can't get anything on plunder either. Some help would be greatly appreciated, thank you.

comments: Don't spend a dime if you play this game.  Rates on character drops are rigged.  As you go up in rank they manipulate drop rates as they believe people who invest so much time will pay money to try and get better rather than quit.  This is a major issue.  You cannot do any real events without banner cards and the developers know this.  Again they manipulate rates based on account rank so as you go up in rank your chances go way way down.

Updates keep getting stuck with the ver 3.8.1. Since it was released. Download 269 out of 269 but nothing happens after that, and a message of "connection error" keeps appearing. Have passed the daily log in bonus, and will probably lose the consecutive login bonuses as a result. Didn't create transfer code or link to fb account yet so may risk of losing account if I reinstall. Please fix this asap.

This game is awesome however, today I was updating my app and I can't log in. It updated and say open than the app continues to try and update and wont. I can't even transfers it. I tried with internet and my data. I have more than enough storage but now all my time and effort has been wasted. And I feel "great"

Tried transferring to new device, now the damn game won't download beyond the title screen and I've tried everything to get it to work. A pity too. I liked the game but I can't play it. All that time spent on my old phone, just gone.

As promised I upped my 3 star to a 4 star because SSJ4 Gogeta is complete now. However it really kills the joy of the game to have to gather 5 of the same SSR to awaken all the way especially when I used some of them for super attack power increases. Find another way to fully unlock characters through the potential grid(maybe a tournament item) and you'll pull me back from Pokemon Duel.

This gacha game involves summoning characters through a "loot box" system.  Most games now show rates so you know what you are getting in to.  For this game, however, it do not show the rates on this english version.  For now, just keep this in mind if you decide to spend money on this game.  Until this issue is fixed and until Google Play policies are updated to reflect showing rates in "loot box" based games, my review will remain as 1-star

descriptionHTML:
A brand-new chapter in the Dragon Ball Z saga has arrived!
Now you can experience all the nonstop action in the palm of your hand!

◎Explore the World of Dragon Ball!◎
Face off against formidable adversaries from the anime series! Explore your favorite areas in a whole new way with unique board-game-style gameplay! Utilize various items and power-ups to strengthen your team and steel yourself for the battles ahead!

◎Intense Over-the-Top Action!◎
Simply tap the Ki Spheres on the screen to engage in supersonic combat! The fighting is so extreme your screen won't be able to handle it! Awaken the true potential of your favorite Dragon Ball characters and make them stronger than ever before! You’ve never experienced Dragon Ball like this!

◎Assemble Your Very Own Dream Team!◎
Create your own team from a wide variety of Dragon Ball characters! You can even group together certain characters to activate powerful Link Skills! Only Dokkan Battle gives you the freedom to build virtually any team you want! Take your trusty fighters to the battlefield and rise to the top!

◎Time is of the Essence!◎
The story begins when Trunks’ Time Machine crash-lands on a planet where the Dragon Ball timeline has been thrown into chaos! Who could be behind this sinister turn of events? Work together with Trunks to get to the bottom of this mystery, battling legions of familiar foes along the way. The very fate of the Dragon Ball universe rests on your shoulders!

Get pumped--the world of "Dragon Ball Z Dokkan Battle" awaits you!

comments: This season I really put in a big effort to try and win the treble. Got the best players, do all the training, strategy ect. All for nothing. Lost against a crappy team in semi of Cup. Apparently according to IA it wasn't my day. Like I said before, game is pre programmed. Dev's do nothing about the gameplay, they rather concentrate on silly add ons which can make them money. Big boooooooooo for dev's.

In overall it's a good game but needs some changes.  The match engine is not so good .  Like promotion to next division , also should be a relegated team from that division to a lower division.  Prices are outstanding. Tokens are a problem.  But i insist AGAƒ∞N that SYSTEM Dƒ∞Vƒ∞Sƒ∞ON needs a new update or review. PUT AT LEAST A TEAM THAT SHOULD GET RELEGATED TO A LOWER Dƒ∞Vƒ∞Sƒ∞ON.  The idea that you have to change the whole team every season is also not a good thing. Some little changes are needed to make this game a wonderful game.

I think it is the BEST FOOTBALL MANAGING game i have ever played.  But you should make some changes,like as tikitaka,counter attack,long ball  ext. These will be helpful for us.we need more tactis. Thank yiu for your wonderful game.

I am playing the game for 1year now and I think you have to increase the percentage of the players when they rest for 3hrs... I think 6% is not enough specially when we have 2 games per day (league and cup or champions league), because after the game, they still have to have two training sessions and they get too tired, with no time to recover at least 50 of condition for the next match, so from ther we have no manage well by leadind "easy sesseions" and player do not develop as they should. For me the time of recovery is fine, but the points conceived are to low... at least 10% in each 3hrs. Hope you get my point. The app is üëå I love it

Worst game ever every update just gives more problems and the current problems we message these idiots about are never resolved...infact they don't even reply.. they are only about the money now.. ive gave 6 years to these losers and this is how I am repaid.. disgusting is an understatement.. avoid games made by these rude ignoramuses at all costs
I think u guys should find a way for us(we the managers) to get tokens easier . I don't understand why winning the league or champions league only gets you money but no tokens . it really sucks
description: Join over 170 million players worldwide to become the best soccer manager with the unbeatable excitement of Top Eleven! Build your club from scratch and control every aspect of your team - Create your own strategies and formations and take on Mourinho, your friends and millions of other Top Eleven managers on a daily basis. Top Eleven is the most-played online soccer manager game! Begin your journey as a soccer manager today! Name your club and build it from the ground up. In Top Eleven you have the opportunity to control every aspect of your club, from training sessions, transfers, squad selection, formation set-ups, club finances and kit designs. In this free multi-player game you can join forces and compete against friends or test and improve your skills while playing against other managers from around the globe. Choose official jerseys and emblems from the Premier League, Bundesliga, MLS, the legendary Champions League and many more soccer leagues.There are players that have managed their clubs for over 7 years and have won successive League, Cup and Champions League titles! Can you beat them? comments: Repetitive game that requires a lot of thinking. Quite addictive as I've been playing for nearly year and half now. I didn't spend a penny on game but quite a lot of time. Its very difficult to be very good without spending real cash but it's possible. You can watch adverts for coins, so be patient and play. The more you play the more you get. You don't need top characters to have great team - you can create great team with average characters if you focus on weapons. Get yourself into a good team, hit faction's minimums and you'll become great.

There are good and bad aspects of this game, but the pros out weigh the cons. You can absolutely level up incredibly high without spending a single penny on this game. You just need patience. One of the funniest aspects of this game is its long term playability. There is always something to do every day and in the long run it all adds up to your benefit.  My only complaint is the pop up windows when you first get on. They show you you've been raided...then you have the notification that you have to check that gives you the same info. If the pop up already gives me the info, why do I still have notifications?

Rubbish repetitive game. After spending ten's of thousands pointlessly I can tell you honestly... don't waste your time or money. It's a very addictive cash cow and just a very smart way to take your money and keep you hooked. Scopely has repeatedly lied and will continue to do so. You have been warned

Ive been playing this for 2 years, love it but support is well below standard. I have a problem just now where it crashes every 5 mins and support do nothing. Its become unplayable. Avoid if you have a samsung device

The game has slowly been turning more p2w than ever before. Before 6 stars had come into play, you could easily get any 5 stars. Even some p2w toons were able to be accessed later on in some events. With 6 stars, this really isn't the case. This has also caused the Road to Survival community to become more toxic and started making the game unfair/not fun for other players.

I like the strategy involved in playing the game. The only thing I think I would change is when you kill an enemy and he comes back to life,  they should come back as a zombie. .not keep all their ability before death. .otherwise it keeps you interested.

descriptionHTML:
The Walking Dead Road to Survival is the definitive Walking Dead strategy RPG game, brought to you by Robert Kirkman, creator of The Walking Dead comic series.

Build your team of Survivors and develop battle strategies to lead them into battle in an uncompromising story, fraught with danger. Fight for survival against walkers and humans alike, using strategy to attack enemy weak points and deep RPG progression to decide your path. Build a town to keep the walkers at bay, but be warned – The horrors that lurk outside aren’t the only threat, and your decisions are all that stand between life and death.

Based on an all-new story from award-winning Walking Dead writer Jay Bonansinga, the dark aesthetic of this game reflects the uncompromising decisions you will need to make as you strategize for survival.

Stand with Michonne, Rick and other survivors from The Walking Dead, and join the epic battle against the darkest enemies from the Governor to Negan.

THE WALKING DEAD: ROAD TO SURVIVAL FEATURES:

Fight Walkers & Survivors
• Battle against fierce opponents and use your best strategy to survive
• Headshot! Land critical hits and deal crippling blows to your enemies
• Charge opponents with special melee and ranged attacks using deadly weapons like Michonne’s katana

Collect & Recruit Survivors
• Collect new Survivors from The Walking Dead universe, each with their own specialized battle strategy

Upgrade Your Survivors
• Level up and customize Survivors to enhance their fighting strategies, weapons and skills
• RPG progression makes your Survivors stronger as they cut down more walkers

Strategy Gameplay - Capitalize on Strengths & Exploit Weaknesses
• Battle strategy is key to scoring powerful hits – but watch out for retaliating strikes
• Your battle strategy is all that’s keeping the Survivors of Woodbury safe – Strategize and strike to win

Maps & Locations From The Walking Dead
• Explore a new 3D map featuring real locations from The Walking Dead comics

Build your Community Base & Expand into the Wasteland
• Build houses to hold Survivors, a Town Hall to expand your city, a Workshop to craft items, and more

PvP - Raid Enemies
• Use your battle strategy to raid enemy factions for resources in the All Out War online mode
• Strategic Multiplayer battles in a wide-open world filled with potential enemies and vicious walkers.

Alliance Factions & Online Strategy
• Multiplayer alliances and battle strategies keep you safe. Join allies in a faction to create a battle strategy and pool resources in the harsh world of The Walking Dead
• Battle and build together with friends in multiplayer role-playing strategy gameplay

Battle in Iconic The Walking Dead Locations
• Fight alongside your faction for control of areas from The Walking Dead
• Battle to conquer and defend locations like Alexandria, Woodbury, Sanctuary, and more

Make Strategized Decisions to Change the Story
• Decisions impact the story mode and make each game campaign unique
• Write your own Survivor story in this dynamic and compelling Walking Dead RPG

Live In-Game Events
• Play to obtain valuable resources and new, exclusive Survivors.

Walkers tear at your city walls, while desperate Survivors rip apart the town’s foundations from the inside. When the time comes to fight, what will you choose?
developerAddress:
3530 Hayden Avenue
Suite A
Culver City, CA
90232
recentChanges: Now you can customize your profile by choosing any recruit in your roster to represent you on leaderboards, in chat, and more!
summary: The #1 Official Walking Dead Strategy RPG - Recruit your team to fight Zombies!
title: The Walking Dead: Road to Survival

comments: It's a nice game, with a great graphics and such but the auto-update for extra files it's kind of annoying. Is there anyway to turn it off? Because we have to waiting for it to be downloaded before can play again. Can we choose to update whenever we want?  Anyway, this is a really nice game and I've been playing it for a long time. Keep up the good work!

I love the game. There's nothing wrong with it because I feel like it's the old game that I grew up with. But what I hate is that the prices for packs, lp, sp and simoleons went high. The prices before was okay but now I don't think I will spend anymore for packs that give only like 5vip points. Such a fun game but aimes for large microtransactions.

I really enjoy this game, and love developing my Sim's homes and the world. Unfortunately, my game won't open. It hasn't for about a month now, even after this new update. It shows me the loading screen for five minutes, then crashes. It would be wonderful if there could be a fix for this.

Love love love it! This game is actually better than The Sims Mobile... 2 problems,, 1st. The Modern houses with second floor, so expensiveüò≠! 2nd. The time it sometimes takes ages just for one activity!üòê but hey, everything else.. TOTALY AWSOME! üòç thanks so much for creating this game. Cuz its so hard to download the sims 4 in a Mobile. üíï

This is actually cool and I really love this game. However, the expiration of most of the quest that i'm having are only 2 days to finish. I think it's unfair, and the materials needed are too expensive. Sims are busy on finishing tasks so they won't be able to go to work and earn. So I'm not totally enjoying the game.

When you get an event sometimes it only lasts for like 2 days which really isn't enough because some actions take 1 day. Please extend event times and don't give like 5 events at the same time. Also you should be able to log in other ways apart from Facebook because lots of people don't have Facebook. Please make other ways for us to login  so we can get more neighbours.

comments: I am only giving ABF a 3 right now. I have played ABF since the beginning of it's time. I feel as if the coin rewards are very slim in the higher leagues. I am a Diamond Star 4 and I feel as if the higher the level the higher the reward but, the rewards are all the same. When you work your way up you want to feel rewarded! If coin rewards increase in the higher levels so will my rating!!!!!

I would give it 5 stars, but they've changed a few things. It's now more difficult to earn coins for power-ups. So in order to win the tournaments, they've put people in the position of having to make purchases more often. Needless to say, I don't play as often anymore. I've also noticed that several of my friends don't play anymore either. Too bad, the game used to be a lot more fun.

Been playing this game for years. Loved it in the beginning.  Seems the lower I rate the game as they try to make easier for people that are not good.  the birds I throw are nearly useless a lot of times compared to playing the same game for a star 2 player I know. And now the game is crashing constantly. Wish I could sell the nearly 100,000 bird coins I have. Seems I won't need them.

Ok so when there is an issue that needs addressed, sometimes it take a couple of days for the tech people to get to it. But overall the game is awesome! This is the only game that I still play every day from the time I got a smart phone, which has been several years!

I love playing angry birds friends. I'm an adult woman and have played since they came out with the game. Scoring in first place many times. Recently there seems to be too much graphics and sometimes using plays from other games or other angry birds games. If people are submitting what they have thought out, please make sure it stays within original angry birds friends game. Some levels are too far out there.

I loved this game to keep in touch with a few friends but please take those stupid Dignity ads off... They do not close and always end up missing up my game. I have to close the game out and start all over. Loosing many power ups and coins in this tedius game making it more frustrating than fun.

comments: Why is the game shutting down every single time I try to go to a neighbors farm?!? I click to go to the next neighbor & it shuts down with no warning & takes me back to my home screen & I have to reopen the app... 3/16- sick & TIRED of this app closing when I try going to neighbor farms!!!!!!! So tired of this app closing... Will increase stars once bug fixed. Friends are quitting due to this plus all the items costing RC... Game seems to care more about those who can pay to play... Sad...

What did you guys do! I opened the game and was told to update so I did. When I opened the game it took me all the way back to the beginning. I lost everything.all the coins, all the work I did on the islands. Don't know wat your programmer's did. But it pissed me off. I will not start over.i enjoyed the game played it for years. 700+ days played without interruption.

Very addictive! Some of the missions are impossible to finish without using your real money. Would recommend but with a warning: don't get your hopes up! Takes a very very vey vey long time to make progress if you don't use real money...

I can't believe you wouldn't offer an update to access this app? We the collective have spent hundred of dollars over the course of time. Your suggestion to contact fun plus?? We've been told that Android does not have an update available? Neither can I access the game on my fire. I've spent money throughout 115 levels. I'm sick to my stomach.

I have some problem I want to know My theme in game missing because? I delete cache  now i can see my theme only. But i can't see other neighbors theme  my friends can't see my  theme farm too i want to know what happens? Please help me My ID FBTFYZU thank you.

The game app opens and closes immediately on my iPad, my Amazon tablet and my Android phone. This started to happen at 12:01 CST today  What's going on. I spent a lot of money and if I can't play I want refunds.

descriptionHTML:
Beautiful and fun farming simulation game. Raise cute farm animals and harvest diverse crops to make your farm a success! It's up to you to make your dream farm by the seaside. Start building your dream farm now.

■■ Game Features ■■
✓ Played by over 60 million people all around the world!
✓ Tired of upgrading the Barn? Enjoy unlimited Barn space.
✓ Prepare more than 400+ dishes in the kitchen.
✓ Plant, harvest and produce over 200+ unique products!
✓ Compete with other farmers in the new Farm Beauty Contest!
✓ Daily orders and new missions added regularly for more fun!
✓ 500+ unique, cute, and well-designed decorations!
✓ Adopt pets and costume them with pet apparel and equipment. Now you can breed pets to make new baby pets!
✓ Exotic Island Farm: Explore a Mine, Garden!
✓ Marine Sea Resort: You are now the owner of the Sea Resort! Complete resort orders and build the best resort for visitors to come to!
✓ Visit neighbors' farms and sample their newest dishes to earn prizes, help clean decorations, and trade for needed farm products!

Family Farm Seaside supports 21 languages including; English, Arabic, Dutch, French, German, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian Bokmål, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

※ Product Usage Details
- Recommended Specifications: CPU Quad core 2.3GHz, Ram 2GB
- Minimum Specifications: CPU Quad core 1.5GHz, Ram 1GB

※ Access permission notice for gameplay
STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.
PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.
CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.

※ App Notes
- This app requires an active internet connection to play. Please make sure your device is connected while playing.
- Family Farm Seaside is completely free to download and free to play. However, some items in the game can be purchased with real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

※ Contact Us!
- Family Farm Seaside Custmer Support: https://funplus.helpshift.com/a/family-farm-seaside/
- Need more neighbors and want to get game news and tips? »»» Like 👍 our official Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/familyfarmseaside
- Privacy Policy: http://www.funplusgame.com/privacy_policy/
developerAddress: PO Box309, Ugland House, Grand Cayman, KY1-1104 Cayman Islands
recentChanges: - Brand new account system. Go to Settings in the game to bind your game and so you won't lose it!
- Minor bug fixes
summary: Most content-rich farm with 1000+ products to harvest and cook. Play now!
title: Family Farm Seaside

comments: App is addicting! Fun to play! Levels get difficult  as you get higher. They should offer special coin purchase of 12,000 coins for $1. Since they take 500 every time to add 5 more moves! Would keep people playing more and they would have more purchases! That's how I'd rack in the bucks if it were my app!

2ND UPDATE: 3/21/18- Thank you for adding new bathrooms and bathroom rugs! Thank you also for giving new, unique furniture on 5th or 7th consecutive days. Great job, and ty for  listening to players and making more  levels and changes and continued updating!  UPDATE: 2/2018 Please make more optional designs to find at neighbors' homes. I've been searching, and I can't find any more. Especially for the bathroom, and for the garden/flowers. That is one of the best features of the game. ty!         Thank you for the new update and new expansion!  Cant wait to achieve the new rooms. Best game!  Much better than "Scapes" Games. I like the way you can travel to neighbors to get new interior design fashions! A new idea that is brilliant. I am spoiled now! LoL Thank you and please keep up the hard work!

Good game. Fun so far. I enjoy renovating the first room and the master bedroom.  So far I have only one complaint. Why can't I get the master bedroom? While I'm all for being generous, generosity has its limits and it is MY house. It might seem small to some but it does irritate me as I do love the story as one of the best bits. I'm not the only one who doesn't like her just claiming for herself. It comes across as rather arrogant and presumptuous of her. An idea might be to give me the master bedroom and then give her another where you can design it more to her tastes as a decorator.  Apart from that story issue just keep on going.

Getting a little frustrated with this. I play on both my phone and tablet. When I try to play on my phone it asks me to update to synchronize my progress yet there are no updates available.  I have switched off and on and even uninstalled and reinstalled.  Very annoying that I cannot now play on my phone.  Just reinstalled this and it is working great now. Thank you for sorting. 5 stars all round.

I am obsessed with this game! Love that you can easily make friends with other real players and use their furniture! Mixed levels of difficulty which means you never get stuck on a board for an annoying amount of time. Only thing is that when choosing your furniture, you have to click the picture a bunch of times before it let's you preview it.

I like this game but it's frustrating how it's hard to get stars and then they want you to waste them on things like giving the cat a bath... I want to decorate the house not do all the silly side things.
description: Decorate your mansion with a match-3 makeover puzzle game! Design new home decor & furniture by matching candy, power-up with levels and renovate your entire house, including your kitchen & garden. Download Matchington Mansion for match 3 makeover madness!Match candy and play Matchington Mansion, an adventure filled fun game! Hone your interior design skills while protecting your house from a mischievous cousin, unlock new rooms, renovate your kitchen or garden and discover secrets hidden among the furniture ‚Äì all with a cast of quirky characters in tow. You can even spy on the neighbors and check out their room design choices. Are you ready to navigate this challenging match-3 home decor puzzle game?Room Design & Match 3 Makeover Madness: Top 5 Reasons to Download:Match & swap candy in a fun game to innovatively decorate your mansion!Secrets, rewards and an intriguing narrative ‚Äì piece together all the hidden objects & learn new secretsIn-game characters to meet and interact with ‚Äì follow their interesting stories while you playPlay levels with tons of room design options & thousands of DIY Decorations ‚Äì unlock hidden areas for rewardsPower-up combos, incredible boosters and tons of levels in a fun game of matching!Decorate your mansion, power-up and deck out your kitchen & garden in style. Unlock hidden areas for rewards, makeover each room with new furniture and interesting home decor. Puzzle out Matchington Mansion adventure stories with innovative matching gameplay, aided by your friend Tiffany, quirky characters and a house cat or pet dog along for the ride! Play Matchington Mansion for FREE, with optional in-game items for purchase. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings.Download our match-3 adventure puzzle game ‚Äì the MM team sincerely hopes that you like it! We are working very hard on perfecting it, so if you run into any issues while playing or you have any suggestions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out to us at mm@firecraftstudios.com.More ways to learn about Matchington Mansion:Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/matchingtonmansion/
descriptionHTML:
Decorate your mansion with a match-3 makeover puzzle game! Design new home decor & furniture by matching candy, power-up with levels and renovate your entire house, including your kitchen & garden. Download Matchington Mansion for match 3 makeover madness!

Match candy and play Matchington Mansion, an adventure filled fun game! Hone your interior design skills while protecting your house from a mischievous cousin, unlock new rooms, renovate your kitchen or garden and discover secrets hidden among the furniture – all with a cast of quirky characters in tow. You can even spy on the neighbors and check out their room design choices. Are you ready to navigate this challenging match-3 home decor puzzle game?

Room Design & Match 3 Makeover Madness: Top 5 Reasons to Download:
Match & swap candy in a fun game to innovatively decorate your mansion!
Secrets, rewards and an intriguing narrative – piece together all the hidden objects & learn new secrets
In-game characters to meet and interact with – follow their interesting stories while you play
Play levels with tons of room design options & thousands of DIY Decorations – unlock hidden areas for rewards
Power-up combos, incredible boosters and tons of levels in a fun game of matching!

Decorate your mansion, power-up and deck out your kitchen & garden in style. Unlock hidden areas for rewards, makeover each room with new furniture and interesting home decor. Puzzle out Matchington Mansion adventure stories with innovative matching gameplay, aided by your friend Tiffany, quirky characters and a house cat or pet dog along for the ride!

Play Matchington Mansion for FREE, with optional in-game items for purchase. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Download our match-3 adventure puzzle game – the MM team sincerely hopes that you like it! We are working very hard on perfecting it, so if you run into any issues while playing or you have any suggestions, please don’t hesitate to reach out to us at mm@firecraftstudios.com.

comments: Overall great game. Amazing battle systems and gameplay. A very challenging game that would encourage you to seek others allegiance to conquer other kingdoms. Unfortunately, i have one issue i can't access the chat room, no messages, cant access mh own profile. It keeps saying network error even though i am currently playing the game smoothly. If you can fix this i would gladly appreciate

If you put gold army in your garrison troops its impossible to invade you even the attacker is highest level. Attacking castle is very costly you need to attack many times for few resources. The shop is sucks. Too much chines character. I dont know my goal at all. Etc.. So many issue for this game needs lot's of improvement.

I think I would like this game but somehow I have never played it or downloaded it until today but the game is not at the beginning and I keep getting kicked off as it says I have logged into another device.  Not the first time I have ran into this problem.  Please help me fix this.  I have cleared the game data uninstalled and all that nonsense.

i would rate it 5* but i can only play the game on wifi. unable to play on Data. Asus Zenfone 3 Zoom....so i got a new phone but still required me to start up the game with WiFi then i can play on data. very annoying.
Still lags like crazy slow gameplay when will the new race be introduced the lags are becoming too much especially when entering a dungeon and why can't some heroes be bought with lanari

descriptionHTML:
Featured globally by Google Play!

◆ "This new strategy game gives you full control in a world full of dwarves, magic, and monsters. It’s the perfect marriage of MMO and strategy" - PocketGamer

◆ "Art of Conquest could very well be the mobile game fantasy and strategy fans have been waiting for " - App Spy

◆ "Players take full control of the battle. Art of Conquest is a breath of fresh air in the world of base-building strategy games"- 148Apps

◆ "The mobile RTS I never knew I wanted to play"- HaoGamers

◆ "A fascinating mix of many disparate genres all mixed into one title"- TouchArcade

◆ "A genre hybrid that blends RPG, RTS and MMO together to create something special" - DVS Gaming

◆"AoC reminds me of strategy games I played as a kid, but with much better gameplay and perfect for the mobile platform"- Kripparrian, Twitch & Youtube Content Creator


Explore a huge magical world!

Besiege enemy strongholds to expand your kingdom, slay nefarious dragons with a band of legendary heroes, and challenge players around the world to epic real-time battles!

FEATURES

● CHALLENGE your friends to thrilling real-time duels
● COMMAND hundreds of individual troops on a single - breathtaking field of battle
● SUMMON dozens of mythical heroes, each endowed with powerful abilities
● CHOOSE from five mighty races to raise your army
● BUILD your stronghold and besiege the enemy
● SIX embittered kingdoms strive to survive
● EXPLORE the beautiful, hand-crafted world of Nore
● DEFEAT evil bosses and loot unfathomable rewards

Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/artofconquest
Twitter：https://twitter.com/Art_of_conquest
Official Website：http://artofconquest.com

comments: The last event - to win sewer rat Trevor - was truly lame. ESG's greed is astounding and turns a good game into a grind. And despite many pleas, they still won't let you restart the game. Let us turn the extra cards into liquor, then we'll have a chance for a great game.

It is impossible to win the short events for Europeans that need their sleep! The events start around midnight and there is no way you can make up the lost time when starting in the morning without spending a lot of hash or real money on the 1 day events
For some strange reason, since the update my game will not get past the load screen, 89% to be exact.  Be great if you can fix this. S8+
businesses quickly pay worse, liquor from trunks are small amounts, cards are always hard to find, events are a waste of time. there's nothing good about this game, it's a rabid cash grab.

It's awesome... I like the graphics....and some of the dialogue. Great to pass time..... I'm just getting tired if going to jail....then have to start over....when I could have money when I get out.....so I won't have to depend on a job when I get out.... I can live off my money ...but then continue having my money work for me

It crashes on he boss fight at end of season 4 everytime I try...  :( otherwise I thought it was good but seems difficult to get the amount of liquor to upgrade characters without spending real cash! :(

comments: Stop..do not download. This game has a bug and will stop responding when you get to the higher levels.  Support has not been able to find a fix.  After a certain level, the clues you will be given are the same every time and will be for an earlier game.

Fun little time waster. Nothing locked behind p2w. Makes you think of the full picture. If I were to criticise one side of this game is that many words are repeated on different pictures. I have lost count how many times "windows" was a answer BUT overall very fun.

Very addicting!  Hard to stop playing! Would like to be able to select any square to enter a letter so I can try different letter combinations when trying figure out a word. Right now, it seems you have to enter the letters largely in order.
A little bit glitchy but a good way to waste hours when you're bored. Keeps asking to rate the app. Dont bother collecting coins to buy background as the disappear the next day.

Great you will fly through levels. And then one answer will stop you and get in your head. It will be soooo obvious you will kick yourself. Thankfully you can send to a friend to help through facebook
LOVE TO PLAY THIS GAME! NO PROBLEMS WITHE FREEZING UP OR MOVING TO NEXT LEVEL. SIMPLY ENJOYABLE FOR YOUR BRAIN.

comments: Here I am like many others, unable to get into my game after update. Was level 53, recently earned the Chinese dog and had lots of upgrades to my farm. I would have been excited about the upcoming birthday event if I could access my game. Fix soon or I will delete this and all other zynga games I funnel my hard working money into

Great game, love achieving all the quests, also love the show animals, I wish I could do more than one with a partner though. I wish that during an update that it wouldn't stop the game for the players, showing grassy area with no coins or keys and level 1, so I could continue to play. But I know I just have to leave it for a while and wait till the update is finished, which is hard because it is so addictive. Some people need to remember though that this is a free game.

Liked this game until now. I recieved some keys from the game. I used them then they said they had had some technical difficulties and some players should not have received them then promptly took my remaining keys off me!  This was they're mistake not mine. I find this churlish and ridiculous. It's put me right off the game!

Since Jan this game has gone to hell in a hand basket. Every update I have to fight to get stuff back they y'all took from my game. This game use to be fun, now I don't care if I play it or not. Y'all only care a out the people who spend money on your game, not the loyal ones that's been playing since it went mobile. I'm very disappointed!!

I just started playing this game and was really liking it. In one day I made it to level 15 and had made a purchase using real money. The app froze and I tried everything is fix it but it erased my whole farm and made me start over. I am soooooo mad!!!! And I'm mad I spent money and lost everything. Really not impressed at all

When I first got it it worked fine. (Yesterday). Now every time I get on it'll load but will freeze and not let me do ANYTHING AT ALL. I've tried everything from closing the app to restarting my phone. Please fix it because I really like the game.

descriptionHTML:
**App Store Best of 2014**
Escape to the world of farming, friends and fun! Go on farm adventures to collect rare goods and craft new recipes. Raise animals and grow your farm with friends. Join a farm Co-Op to trade and share or play on your own in Anonymous Mode. You can play FarmVille anytime, anywhere… even when not connected to the internet. Best of all, the world’s most popular farming game is free to play!
** ”FarmVille is back and this time, it’s portable!” – TIME **
** “”Officially not just for Facebook anymore”” – Los Angeles Times **
** “” They may have built the best FarmVille game of the series”” – Kotaku **
- CRAFT a variety of baked gourmet goods like classic country apple pies
- HARVEST farm fresh crops of your favorite fruits and vegetables
- CUSTOMIZE your own farm for charming country living
- COLLECT hidden and rare items as you discover a new coastal farm
- NURTURE and raise a wide variety of adorable animals like your very own farm dog
- EXPLORE a new FarmVille story filled with special farm adventures
- BUILD a lush family farm by the coast so all your friends can visit
- FISH with your fellow farmers and sell your catch at Pike’s Landing
- GARDEN by the beautiful blue ocean as you decorate your farm with flowers and fresh produce
- TRADE and chat with friends or play anonymously with people from all over the world
- ESCAPE to the coast then connect to your Facebook farm to send free water
- EARN daily rewards with the Mystery Chest and take a spin at the Prize Wheel”
Additional information:
• The game is free to play; however, in-app purchases are available for additional content and in-game currency. In-app purchases range from $0.99 to $199.99 USD.
• Use of this application is governed by Zynga’s Terms of Service, found at www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service.
• For information about how Zynga uses personal data, please read our privacy policy at http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.

comments: Not a bad game but it's typical like some other games. It starts off with the levels being super easy, letting you build your confidence to get you thinking you're really good.  Now I understand the higher the levels the more difficulty there is but not to the point where they make it almost impossible trying to get you to buy more chances. Another words they're trying to get you to pay to win and advance not necessarily on skill level. Very sneaky. Uninstalling. It's fun for a while but overall I do not recommend.

Love this game, but it freezes up. I go to try and reinstall it after a few days but it won't let me reinstall the game. Just stays at the same  level last completed. Still having the problem of when having to reinstall I lose all my lives and charms. Love the game but hate ,owing all my lives and charms
I love this game but damn, why does the videos seem to always freeze up. I mean, don't get me wrong, it's a good game and all, so why don't you guys just fix the glitches. Thank youü§î

The update took me from level 400 back to level 1 very upset be first I wasn't getting my daily play rewards so I figured like everything else it may need to update and the update blow my whole progress. I'm so pissed is there a way to fix this?

I actually enjoyed the game and would give it four or five stars except 200 coins and multiple items were taking away simply because I got logged out if Facebook. Also several levels were lost.... This I understand, glitches happen. What I don't understand and don't accept is the lack of response from the developer. I've sent several emails and have yet to get a non automated response.
I installed the game about 3 times and gave up. Can't connect with Facebook and when playing it suddenly stop and say it's not responding.

comments: This is an all around great game. PG I sent you an email about why not 5 stars in a few areas.  Will do 5 if they are resolved.  I will add this is my very first time spending money on in app purchases.  Edit: some issues fixed new ones arise.  Still playing though.  Fun game

Overall game is very good n addictive, been playing the game for awhile now. 1 major issue of the game is bugs that cause the game to lag esspecially after every game update. Reali hope Pocket Gems will look into this matter seriously and build a better game foundation. I will review my ratings when the game is more stable.

LOVE THIS GAME!! unlike other timed games you don't have to wait around.  When things are upgrading you can literally spend hours if you want just attacking other bases and breeding dragons.  Graphics are amazing and this is one game that constantly has me coming back.

Wonderful game, all these pay to win comments are slightly misleading. There are several power ups and time reducers that come fairly easy if you participate in events. Which, the events are almost always going on so you don't get bored!  Only problem I have is that the app keeps uninstalling itself from my phone. Not sure if it's the app's fault or my phone, but it doesn't happen to any other app on my phone...

PG needs to fix a lot of stuff. They never listen to the community and with the Atlas update has destroyed many alliances by creating a class divide between teams of all ranks. Huge let down and am afraid of the future of the game when game design decisions like this are allowed to occur.

Fun until you have to wait a day to do something. How can you play a game if the game won't let you play, but by good it takes up space. So you want me to have a game taking up space in my phone but I'm can't play the game. So it is literally a waste of space.. developers are stupid and selfish.
description: War Dragons is a visually stunning 3D real-time strategy game that puts you in control of the ultimate dragon army. Join a guild, help your teammates launch attacks, and hold off enemy raids in true real-time fashion.BREED LEGENDARY DRAGONSWar Dragons has more than one hundred unique dragons possessing different attack styles, spell abilities, and classes. Breed your dragons to create an even more powerful army. See if you can unlock the furious behemoth Khrysos and dominate the battlefield!COMBINE FORCES WITH FRIENDSStart or join a guild to combine forces with other dragon lords. With true synchronous multiplayer, you can chat with teammates in real time and coordinate attack and defense strategies against other guilds.BUILD IMPENETRABLE FORTRESSESStrategize and build your island fortress with the optimal combination of lightning, ballista, and archer towers to best protect your base against enemy attack.ASCEND TO THE THRONEParticipate in a wide variety of weekly events with the chance to win rewards, such as rare dragon eggs and treasure hunts, for you and your guild. Claw your way up the leaderboards to assert yourself as one of the world‚Äôs top dragon lords.EXPLORE THE CHAOTIC BEAUTY OF WAR DRAGONSThe game was built on the Mantis Engine, a proprietary 3D game engine, featuring state-of-the-art graphics and cinematics. Experience mobile games like never before with the ability to visually explore all facets of its stunning world.PRAISE FOR WAR DRAGONS‚ÄúThe 3D graphics are spectacular for a mobile device, and this makes War Dragons stand out as the best-looking game of the bunch.‚Äù-GamesBeat‚ÄúWar Dragons from Pocket Gems gives us a taste of what it‚Äôd be like to unleash giant flying lizards on whatever poor ground-bound schmucks are fated to scurry under their shadows.‚Äù-Gamezebo‚ÄúThere's a combat section where your dragon will be flying through an enemy' encampments, and you deal damage to everything as you fly by. You'll also be building your own bases, forming guilds to help work with other players, and just trying to be the biggest, baddest, dragon-taming emperor of them all.‚Äù-Touch ArcadePlease note that War Dragons is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items with real money. If you want to limit the ability to make in-app purchases, you may create a PIN in the Settings menu from within the Google Play Store.Your use of this application is governed by the Terms of Service available at http://pocketgems.com/terms. Collection and use of your data are subject to the Privacy Policy available at http://pocketgems.com/privacy.
descriptionHTML:
War Dragons is a visually stunning 3D real-time strategy game that puts you in control of the ultimate dragon army. Join a guild, help your teammates launch attacks, and hold off enemy raids in true real-time fashion.

BREED LEGENDARY DRAGONS

War Dragons has more than one hundred unique dragons possessing different attack styles, spell abilities, and classes. Breed your dragons to create an even more powerful army. See if you can unlock the furious behemoth Khrysos and dominate the battlefield!

COMBINE FORCES WITH FRIENDS

Start or join a guild to combine forces with other dragon lords. With true synchronous multiplayer, you can chat with teammates in real time and coordinate attack and defense strategies against other guilds.

BUILD IMPENETRABLE FORTRESSES

Strategize and build your island fortress with the optimal combination of lightning, ballista, and archer towers to best protect your base against enemy attack.

ASCEND TO THE THRONE

Participate in a wide variety of weekly events with the chance to win rewards, such as rare dragon eggs and treasure hunts, for you and your guild. Claw your way up the leaderboards to assert yourself as one of the world’s top dragon lords.

EXPLORE THE CHAOTIC BEAUTY OF WAR DRAGONS

The game was built on the Mantis Engine, a proprietary 3D game engine, featuring state-of-the-art graphics and cinematics. Experience mobile games like never before with the ability to visually explore all facets of its stunning world.

PRAISE FOR WAR DRAGONS

“The 3D graphics are spectacular for a mobile device, and this makes War Dragons stand out as the best-looking game of the bunch.”
-GamesBeat

“War Dragons from Pocket Gems gives us a taste of what it’d be like to unleash giant flying lizards on whatever poor ground-bound schmucks are fated to scurry under their shadows.”
-Gamezebo

“There's a combat section where your dragon will be flying through an enemy' encampments, and you deal damage to everything as you fly by. You'll also be building your own bases, forming guilds to help work with other players, and just trying to be the biggest, baddest, dragon-taming emperor of them all.”
-Touch Arcade

Please note that War Dragons is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items with real money. If you want to limit the ability to make in-app purchases, you may create a PIN in the Settings menu from within the Google Play Store.

Your use of this application is governed by the Terms of Service available at http://pocketgems.com/terms. Collection and use of your data are subject to the Privacy Policy available at http://pocketgems.com/privacy.

summary: Build, breed, and customize the ultimate dragon army to annihilate all others!
title: War Dragons

description: THIS GAME IS LIFE-RUININGLY FUN!From the writers of The Simpsons, comes the city building game that lets you create your own living, breathing Springfield! When Homer accidently causes a meltdown that wipes out Springfield, it‚Äôs up to you to clean up his mess‚Ä¶ we mean, help him rebuild it!                                                                                                                                                                                           Collect Your Favorite Characters                                                                                                                  Help reunite Homer with his loved ones - Marge, Lisa, Maggie (and even sometimes Bart) ‚Äì as well as his not so loved ones, like Ned Flanders. Re-populate Springfield with your favorite characters, from Barflies (Barney Gumble) to Wise Guys (Fat Tony). Add them all, we won‚Äôt judge! Dress your characters to the nines with options like Daredevil Bart or Lizard Queen Lisa, and relive scenes from your favorite episodes of The Simpsons!                                                                                                                                                                                                               Take Charge of Your SpringfieldCan‚Äôt control your own life? Now you can control the lives of the citizens of Springfield instead! Make Apu work ridiculously long shifts at the Kwik-E-Mart, have Moe smuggle illegal animals, or make Homer toil poolside all day‚Ä¶ that last one might not be so bad.Build Your Own SpringfieldThink Homer deserves to live next door to Moe‚Äôs? Or the monorail can survive a few more sharp twists and turns? Or Krustyland needs 40% more cartoon violence and 40% fewer health inspectors? Well you can finally make Springfield just the way you want it! Expand your town to the Waterfront, grow its businesses with the glamourous shops of Springfield Heights, and enjoy its sights, all with only a few taps.Experience Unique Simpsons StoriesCatch exclusive animated scenes and new hilarious stories from the writers of The Simpsons. You know they‚Äôre good because they write for The Simpsons! Tapped Out is the most life-ruiningly fun Simpsons game you can play! Always Something New for Your Favorite TownSpringfield might perpetually be on the verge of destruction, buy hey, at least it‚Äôs never boring. descriptionHTML:
THIS GAME IS LIFE-RUININGLY FUN!
From the writers of The Simpsons, comes the city building game that lets you create your own living, breathing Springfield! When Homer accidently causes a meltdown that wipes out Springfield, it’s up to you to clean up his mess… we mean, help him rebuild it!
Collect Your Favorite Characters
Help reunite Homer with his loved ones - Marge, Lisa, Maggie (and even sometimes Bart) – as well as his not so loved ones, like Ned Flanders. Re-populate Springfield with your favorite characters, from Barflies (Barney Gumble) to Wise Guys (Fat Tony). Add them all, we won’t judge! Dress your characters to the nines with options like Daredevil Bart or Lizard Queen Lisa, and relive scenes from your favorite episodes of The Simpsons!
Take Charge of Your Springfield
Can’t control your own life? Now you can control the lives of the citizens of Springfield instead! Make Apu work ridiculously long shifts at the Kwik-E-Mart, have Moe smuggle illegal animals, or make Homer toil poolside all day… that last one might not be so bad.

Build Your Own Springfield
Think Homer deserves to live next door to Moe’s? Or the monorail can survive a few more sharp twists and turns? Or Krustyland needs 40% more cartoon violence and 40% fewer health inspectors? Well you can finally make Springfield just the way you want it! Expand your town to the Waterfront, grow its businesses with the glamourous shops of Springfield Heights, and enjoy its sights, all with only a few taps.

Experience Unique Simpsons Stories
Catch exclusive animated scenes and new hilarious stories from the writers of The Simpsons. You know they’re good because they write for The Simpsons! Tapped Out is the most life-ruiningly fun Simpsons game you can play!

Always Something New for Your Favorite Town
Springfield might perpetually be on the verge of destruction, buy hey, at least it’s never boring. Whether it’s Halloween monster invasions, superheroes run amok, or chaos caused by one of Homer’s “great” ideas, you’ve got never-ending options to tap!


**This game downloads additional content on first launch that can be up to 1.5GB based on device. We recommend connecting to WIFI the first time you play. This game is also supported with regularly occurring content updates that require additional downloads when released. Please be patient while it loads (we promise it’s worth the wait).**

descriptionHTML:
Join over 80,000,000 people who are already playing this top-rated FREE puzzle adventure! Enter the world of Minutia and collect cute characters, level them up and defeat the Slugs! With more than 2,000 levels, enjoy hours and hours of fiendish fun!

"Must List!" - Entertainment Weekly
"Best Fiends is the addictive result of a one-night stand between Angry Birds and Candy Crush!" - PC Mag
"Best Fiends is well-polished and super-cute!" - 148apps.com

STORY:

The little creatures of Minutia lived in peace and harmony until the meteor smashed into Mount Boom, bringing with it a strange force that transformed the Slugs who lived there into an army of greedy, greenery-gobbling pests.

Now, the Slugs are taking over the world, munching a path through Minutia and sliming up everything they touch!

But a brave band of heroes is fighting back! Left alone when the Slugs conquered most of Minutia, these unlikely champions are on an epic quest to solve the mystery of Mount Boom and beat back the Slug advance.

To get to Mount Boom, they’ll need to become… the BEST FIENDS!

FEATURES:

* FIENDISH PUZZLES Casual puzzle gameplay that is easy to play, hard to master.
* COLLECT & LEVEL UP Build a team of Best Fiends and discover their special powers!
* THE BEST OF BOTH WORLDS Line matching puzzle game with RPG character development!
* DAILY EVENTS Play and win something new every time you open the game!
* COMPETE AGAINST YOUR FACEBOOK FRIENDS Win massive rewards!
* IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE Dazzling graphics and finger-tapping music!
* WATCH ANIMATIONS Discover awesome Best Fiends videos!
* STAY TUNED More levels, characters, gameplay and some surprises coming soon!

PLEASE NOTE! Best Fiends is completely free to download and play but some game items may be purchased for real money. To disable this, turn off the in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

comments: I really hated this game at first, when i was trying it on a friend's phone. It has really grown on me since then, i love it. I've been playing it for years now and still love it; the graphics are amazing, the game play is smooth, my clan is great, there's always new stuff to do or new bots/weapons to acquire. Yes, there are some people playing that kinda ruin a battle for your team but Hey, it's just a game and you still get points if you lose. Do your best and have fun.

Great start! No glitches. Performs smoothly! One of the best games on Android!! Must download Belive me I have never spent a single penny of "real" money and the game has never been unfair to me. Its really very good game. They found a sweet spot to balance both paid and free players. You just need to go on playing. I got the costliest robot of the market for free. Keep playing you'll eventually be strong enough and then you'll never stop to play.

After being so long on the game I can see that the development team behind this game is pretty committed. I can see they really put effort into debugging, improving and renewing some elements of the game, I've decided to increase the star counts for War Robots (This is the original one). It's one heck of a game for mobile device I can tell you that. As for attaining the "best robots" or the "best weapons" in the game, it's hard but it's not impossible.  Just take part in the festive events... and you don't neccessarily need the "best bots" to annihilate your opponents...

This game is very much Pay to Win. So expect some people to crush you.  All the "gambling" games are fixed to make sure you get the lowest possible reward. Don't waste your gold gambling. All that said this game is worth 5 stars just for the gameplay. The graphics are amazing and the game is fun even when you end up against someone spending hundreds of real dollars on robots and gear. Be patient. You may not always win or do well but in time you can give all but the most hardcore spenders a run for their money (all pun intended)

It will be cool if we can upgrade not  just one robot but all!! And pls double the gold I rlly need it right now for just 1 orkan And also why is it so hard to get a weapons like with puzzle logo on it it's like 10,000 can you imagine that! If I made the game I would do just 6,000 or 5,000! One more make a single player like player vs AI and it will say easy medium hard

Fun for a little bit of time killing. I really enjoyed the gameplay and Graphics. However don't bother playing this game unless you are going to spend money on it. You quickly realize that everything you need to buy to upgrade your robot cost money or some other in-game currency that you have to spend money in order to get
description: War Robots is an action-packed multiplayer game with 6 vs. 6 team battles in real-time! Join the ranks of the Metal Warriors! "If you are looking for something new and love robots and multiplayer battles it's worth the download to check it out since initially it won‚Äôt cost you anything." - Droid Gamers"War Robots is an excellent game that works well no matter if you play it on your Android smartphone or tablet, and it‚Äôs such a good multiplayer game that it can give people a competitive challenge while on the move." - AndroidHeadlines"As a high-end, team-based online multiplayer mech game on Android, it's also fairly unique to the platform." - Android PoliceIt's a time of war, pilot! Are you ready for surprise attacks, intricate tactical maneuvers and the many sneaky tricks your rivals have in store for you? Create a war machine to fit your own play style;‚Äì create your own clan and lead it to glorious victories;‚Äì join epic PvP battles against rivals from all over the world;‚Äì complete military tasks for bonuses and earn the Best Pilot title.Onward, soldier! Victory is yours!Want to talk about the game or find allies?Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warrobots/Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WWR_by_PixonicWatch new videos on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/WALKINGWARROBOTS Find all about WR on our Knowledge Base: http://faq.wwr.mobi/hc/en-us/Important note: This application requires a stable internet connection.Enjoy the game!
descriptionHTML:
War Robots is an action-packed multiplayer game with 6 vs. 6 team battles in real-time! Join the ranks of the Metal Warriors!

"If you are looking for something new and love robots and multiplayer battles it's worth the download to check it out since initially it won’t cost you anything." - Droid Gamers

"War Robots is an excellent game that works well no matter if you play it on your Android smartphone or tablet, and it’s such a good multiplayer game that it can give people a competitive challenge while on the move." - AndroidHeadlines

"As a high-end, team-based online multiplayer mech game on Android, it's also fairly unique to the platform." - Android Police

It's a time of war, pilot! Are you ready for surprise attacks, intricate tactical maneuvers and the many sneaky tricks your rivals have in store for you? Destroy enemy robots, capture all the beacons, and upgrade your weapons to increase combat strength, speed, and durability of your battle robot. Prove yourself in each map and use different strategies and tactics to emerge victorious from battle!

MAIN FEATURES:
– 34 battle robots with different strengths;
– more than 30 weapon types, including ballistic missiles, energy and plasma guns. What will you choose?
– many possible combinations of robots and weapons. Create a war machine to fit your own play style;
– create your own clan and lead it to glorious victories;
– join epic PvP battles against rivals from all over the world;
– complete military tasks for bonuses and earn the Best Pilot title.

Onward, soldier! Victory is yours!

Want to talk about the game or find allies?
Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warrobots/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WWR_by_Pixonic
Watch new videos on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/WALKINGWARROBOTS
Find all about WR on our Knowledge Base: http://faq.wwr.mobi/hc/en-us/

Important note: This application requires a stable internet connection.
Enjoy the game!

comments: Like ot a lot. Taskforces need to be improved drasticly. Focus on playing with others makes it a lot more fun. EDIT: still no real task force improvements, why it doesn't open straight onto you TF or why I have to go through several buttons to see people starts is stupid. sorting this out make my review 5*

This is not another Clash of Clans clone, but definitely pushes the boundaries of the clan genre. Good graphics, fun gameplay, and balanced in terms of units vs. defences for your island. While diamonds can be purchased by real-world money, the game doesn't trap you into needing them. The weekly mini-game missions help keep things fresh and assist in moving your base up the tech tree if you're patient. SuperCell is continually expanding the game to keep it interesting. Definitely worth a download!

Very addictive and always checking on my base, upgrades etc. Strategic game play, however too much pressure to buy diamonds as it takes FOREVER! !! for some things to upgrade. Seriously. ..2 days for an upgrade??? Only other issue is the limited time "special abilities"...they're fun but it makes it far too easy for someone to raid your base and take all resources needed to get the upgrades. Lots of fun and love the graphics

The graphics are amazing for this type of game. And I think that's why so many people love it. The only thing I wish that their could be is offline play. Just block the chats and player raids and only allow campaign attacks and their would be many more players able to play... Bcs sometimes I don't have data or wifi where I am and it's a pain bcs I love Supercell games. And ik why there isn't offline play, bcs the other players that attack you. But their must be some way around that like maybe a whole offline mode. Well if u read this ty and it's a great game keep up the amazing work you do providing us with amazing games...  ~Bladez

I have played this game since it has come out and I have seen all of the changes and they have shaped that game for better over the years the game has been out it has improved and is one of my best games I have ever played. But the down side is that it is really hard to get resources at first but then before you know it you are full and you have nothing to do about it. Also when getting the heros they should make that base a bit easier because the lower level people can't attack till the have a lot better troops.

Great game, but too slow. While I love the lack of pay to win, I'd wish for a way to speed up resource gathering: I've cleared out every similar level player in my area, and spend days waiting for RSS to build up so I can upgrade. Which is necessary before I can access a larger zone. No point buying speedup gems, as I've never anything to use them on!
description: Welcome to Boom Beach: come with a plan or leave in defeat!Fight the evil Blackguard with brains and brawn in this epic combat strategy game. Attack enemy bases to free enslaved islanders and unlock the secrets of this tropical paradise. Create a Task Force with players around the world to take on the enemy together. Scout, plan, then BOOM THE BEACH!PLEASE NOTE! Boom Beach is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Boom Beach: come with a plan or leave in defeat!

Fight the evil Blackguard with brains and brawn in this epic combat strategy game. Attack enemy bases to free enslaved islanders and unlock the secrets of this tropical paradise. Create a Task Force with players around the world to take on the enemy together. Scout, plan, then BOOM THE BEACH!

PLEASE NOTE! Boom Beach is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.

FEATURES
- Play with millions of other players, raid hundreds of enemy bases for loot
- Battle for control of precious resources to upgrade your base against enemy attacks
- Explore a huge tropical archipelago and discover the mysterious power of the Life Crystals
- Face fearsome Blackguard Bosses and uncover their evil plans
- Join other players to form an unstoppable Task Force to take on co-op missions

Under our Terms of Services and Privacy Policy, Boom Beach is allowed for download and play only for persons 13 years or over of age without parental consent.

Note: A network connection is required to play

Parent's guide:
http://www.supercell.net/parents

Privacy Policy:
http://www.supercell.net/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service:
http://www.supercell.net/terms-of-service/

Itamerenkatu 11-13
00180 Helsinki
Finland
recentChanges: NEW
- Prototroops! New experimental tank blueprints are now available from the Trader.
- New Temporary Gun Boat Ability - The Cryo Bomb!
- Added more Blackguard Basebuilder Bases into the Archipelago.
- Added language support for Finnish!
summary: Storm the beach and win the day!
title: Boom Beach

comments: the new fusion medals added make it so you can not fuse heros without spending money this game is officially broken theres no free way to advance anymore dont download. its very sad i like the idea behind the medals but whos going to grind with 0 progress for 8 months and still not get thier first 6 star .... its messed up

All in all a fun game which u dont have to pay for.. on lvl 104 now and still enjoying the game and actually progressing too.. thumbs up from me! Update: dropped down to 3* after update. Totally been made to p2w now by adding stupid fusion medals.. was a hrund before but now almost unplayable.. greed have ruined the game for me and will probably uninstall.. many others also when u go in chat room.. not good epic summoners, not good at all.. good game ruined again :(

Latest update with fusion medals ruined the game. Got stuck like many other players. Fusing was hard enough without them (ie collecting 4 same 4 star heroes plus 4 same 3 star, PLUS random 4 star heroes... Ridiculous) to get 5 star one, now you stuck waiting to lvl up your current ones to pass stage boss and MAYBE get fusion medals... Ruined very good game.

What the hell are you people thinking,.  Fusion Medals are the most ridiculous thing to add to the game.   It was bad enough the game cost so much to play, but then you really screw us over good with Fusion medals.   Crooks,. You guys should be in jail. Class action law suit.  Horrible,.   Don't play this game, waste of your time and big money.

They absolutely ruined this game with the last 2 updates! Be prepared to spend a fortune to be competitive! They took away the best parts of the Game! Added another item you need to make heroes that are very difficult to get! Then they reduced the number of dark soul you get when disassembling heroes! I'm a paying customer, don't mind supporting development but not when you feel taken advantage of! Don't recommend this game! Very Very Greedy company! Planners should Be Fired!

New updates have killed game experience.  Now not only do you have to wait to gain xp for adventure levels,  you are now limited on fusing characters.  Lack of ability to gain fusion medals limits game play. Very few other actions log in and play 10 minutes a day and then nothing to do for another whole day.  No ability to move at your own pace.  Everything is limited.  To those that can endure slow pace only way to gain in game is slowly over time with daily log ins.

descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers

The alliances of Good and Evil have been forged. The final battle between epic warriors and heroes on both sides is about to start. Ride the crest of the Idle RPG wave with Epic Summoners!

Prepare your best summoner heroes for the fight. Join friends and players from across the globe as you embark on an epic action journey of enchantment to explore the Magic Ladder and the secrets contained deep within. Lead your action troops -heroes and warriors- into the light and overcome all battle challenges that lay before you to emerge victorious in an epic war! The world's destiny is in your hands!

ENGROSSING ACTION RPG GAMEPLAY
Your summoner heroes can’t wait to fight auto-battles against the enemy on your behalf! Recruit and gain experience with every powerful war hero in a legendary battle in this idle game!
Epic equipment and legendary summoner heroes and warriors challenge waiting for you!
Earn awesome combat rewards even when you’re offline. No need to stress when life calls!

ENDLESS TACTICAL AND STRATEGIC FUN
Plan your battle troops tactics and maneuver with your legendary hero to secure victory, it's your free action RPG destiny!
Collect, upgrade and use your equipment wisely to show off your strength as leader on an legendary epic adventure game!
Simple, yet effective strategy combat allows you to enjoy this RPG at home or on the go! Plan your characters tactics and troops maneuver and dominate the battlefield to defeat every evil challenge hero and enemy warriors adventure troops!

THRILLING ACTION BATTLE CONTENT TO KEEP YOU ON YOUR TOES
Summon and recruit summoner heroes and legendary warriors troops, deploy, defend, fight, collect and upgrade to accomplish your RPG challenge!
Between the Expedition Airship, Arena, Magic Ladder and Wishing Pond, there’s a huge world to explore in this idle war game and new creatures to find!
Your interest will never waver with our steady stream of great war content! Challenge your friends and defeat players from all over the world in this free action RPG!

A HIGH QUALITY VISUAL AND AUDIO FEAST
Exquisite warriors' aesthetics and creatures artwork in this free action RPG adventure full of fun and challenges!
Jaw dropping epic combat and maneuver animations in the arena and awe inspiring action battle challenge effects!

THROW DOWN WITH PLAYERS AND FRIENDS
Step into our battle warriors RPG Arena and compete with skilled players from all over the world! Recruit new legendary summoner heroes and warriors troops with different abilities to defeat every evil enemy!
Change your tactics and action maneuver against rivals to see your name climb the rankings and beat your friends best scores!
Win awesome battle rewards on your way to claiming the ultimate victory wih your army in this action hero war idle game!

Start now this epic adventure challenge with your best legendary hero and powerful warriors action in a fantasy adventure with different creatures and battlegrounds in a non-stop free RPG! Your destiny is to lead your magic summoner legendary heroes guild army and war troops in a battle adventure to the death!

descriptionHTML:
When the zombies approach, you have to defend yourself! Don't want to blindly await death? Call up your school girls! Over 30 million players across the globe are waiting to play with you! The war has just begun...

【Storyline】
After a massive viral attack, the world has befallen to a disaster in which zombies spread all over it. The last human beings are stuck inside the ruins of a school, and you are their commander. Here, you can collect and train beautiful young girls with different talents to be your personal zombie killers. They’re ready to eliminate zombies outside the school for you.
A huge wave of zombies is coming and you’re the last hope of saving the earth and mankind! (ง •̀ω•́)ง

【Features】
• The crazy storyline of this game will suck you in
• Collect and train numerous Zgirls to be your zombie killers
• Upgrade your base to resist all kinds of raids from zombies and foes
• Manufacture ultimate equipment to support your forces even better
• Abundant quests and events help you quickly develop
• Play with friends or foes among players from all over the world
• Face and take down terrifying zombies. Go, Zgirls!


【Contact】
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarGameZgirls/
