comments: This game is a lot of fun get to customize some great cars . A lot of my favorites and i was surprised to see some cool muscle cars . Very unique collection of cars. This is actually better than their console games. Well recent carbon and most wanted are amazing. The newest are hot garbage. This one is fun.reallywish there was free roam or a sand box room where you can admire and test drive  what you have grinded out so many hours to get. Only bad thing. Also the boxes are too expensive leaving having to grind way too much just for absolutely anything. By the time you get anything good this game servers will be empty.

Thank you for making this awesome game, I love it! I've not had this much fun playing a Need For Speed game in years.. Update 2.9.1 is fantastic. Although after updating, I'm having trouble connecting to the game servers... :/ Hope it gets sorted soon! nevertheless, I look forward to future updates. ;)

It's a great game, graphics are ok, smooth playing. But. There are some ideeas that may do something different. Think about a chat room, or a place where players can do some trades. Think about adding the possibility for players to get vip points for watching videos, or maybe one day..open world gameplay. And there could be a lot more features. Thumbs up if you agree.

All round best racing game I have played so far! That said, the game becomes very difficult as one goes above REP 60. It becomes very time consuming to proceed in the game without spending actual money. Useful stuff becomes harder to obtain via docks and via older races, which is frustrating.

The gameplay/races r so short. It takes less than a minute to finish it. And the police cars than u see in the gameplay don't even do anything they just keep going on on there own, sometimes getting to finish line before u. So basically this would be a perfect game for a three year old but incredibly boring for anyone over the age of 7

The game is pretty good, being a free mobile game, it is not trying to hide it's PTW features, but you can do mostly everything without having to spend a penny. One suggestion I think needs to be put in place is a confirmation window when you go to skip a level, because I was doing the speedhunter event for the Mazda MX-5, and accidentally hit the skip race button and lost a lot of gold, maybe not letting me even get the upgraded car now.
description: Race for dominance in the first white-knuckle edition of Need for Speed made just for mobile ‚Äì from the developer that brought you Real Racing 3. Build your dream ride with an unbelievable range of cars and customizations. Launch yourself between chaos and control as you hit the loud pedal and roll into underground car culture. Win races, up your rep, then kick into more races, more customizations, and more cars. Make your choices and never look back. Tonight we ride!This app offers in app purchases. You may disable in app purchases using your device settings.CUSTOMIZE EXTREME RIDESPick up the real-world cars you‚Äôve always wanted, from the Subaru BRZ to the BMW M4, McLaren 650s, Porsche 911, and more. Then trick them out with the hottest customization system on mobile, from spots like the Mod Shop and the Black Market, giving you over 2.5 million custom combos to play with. Your rides are waiting ‚Äì take them to the stages or streets to go head-to-head versus the competition and prove yourself.  DRIVE FAST ‚Äì AND FEARLESS Steer onto the streets of Blackridge, driving reckless and juiced as sparks fly. Accelerate over jumps and around debris, into traffic, against walls, and through high-speed Nitro Zones. Flip on the nitrous and thrust yourself into another level of adrenaline-fueled driving and drifting. Around every corner is a fresh race as you clash with local crews and local cops. It‚Äôs a world full of wannabe drivers ‚Äì can you stay in front and earn respect? RACE TO WINNever back down as you race anyone crazy enough to take you on, leave them gapped, and increase your rep. Dig, drift, drag, and roll your ride to wins with police on your tail, hitting each inch of the map hard by the time you reach the big end. Burn rubber in over 1,000 challenging races ‚Äì and that‚Äôs just the starting line. Be notorious, own the streets, and score the world‚Äôs best cars. Because one ride is never enough!---------------------User Agreement: terms.ea.comVisit https://help.ea.com/ for assistance or inquiries. descriptionHTML:
Race for dominance in the first white-knuckle edition of Need for Speed made just for mobile – from the developer that brought you Real Racing 3. Build your dream ride with an unbelievable range of cars and customizations. Launch yourself between chaos and control as you hit the loud pedal and roll into underground car culture. Win races, up your rep, then kick into more races, more customizations, and more cars. Make your choices and never look back. Tonight we ride!

This app offers in app purchases. You may disable in app purchases using your device settings.

CUSTOMIZE EXTREME RIDES
Pick up the real-world cars you’ve always wanted, from the Subaru BRZ to the BMW M4, McLaren 650s, Porsche 911, and more. Then trick them out with the hottest customization system on mobile, from spots like the Mod Shop and the Black Market, giving you over 2.5 million custom combos to play with. Your rides are waiting – take them to the stages or streets to go head-to-head versus the competition and prove yourself.

DRIVE FAST – AND FEARLESS
Steer onto the streets of Blackridge, driving reckless and juiced as sparks fly. Accelerate over jumps and around debris, into traffic, against walls, and through high-speed Nitro Zones. Flip on the nitrous and thrust yourself into another level of adrenaline-fueled driving and drifting. Around every corner is a fresh race as you clash with local crews and local cops. It’s a world full of wannabe drivers – can you stay in front and earn respect?

RACE TO WIN
Never back down as you race anyone crazy enough to take you on, leave them gapped, and increase your rep. Dig, drift, drag, and roll your ride to wins with police on your tail, hitting each inch of the map hard by the time you reach the big end. Burn rubber in over 1,000 challenging races – and that’s just the starting line. Be notorious, own the streets, and score the world’s best cars. Because one ride is never enough!

---------------------
User Agreement: terms.ea.com
Visit https://help.ea.com/ for assistance or inquiries.

EA may retire online features and services after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates

Important Consumer Information:
This app: requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply); Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement; collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details); contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13.

comments: This game relies on internet connection far too much to actually be able to play while traveling. I have been disconnected several times in the middle of getting the golden statues, so it not only takes my tickets (which are hard to come by), it also doesn't give me the golden statue when I won it and the internet went down.
I love the game but three times now it has not given me my diploma for jobs I passed in Hawaii with is keeping me from moving on to the next level.  It's very frustrating.
Nice idea but crashes too often. I like the way you can travel to different countries and learn about different places. Unfortunately it crashes too often

I spent a good amount of time today trying to figure out why I was not getting job diplomas. I pass the quizzes with enough points but it doesn't give me the diploma. I even updated the game just in case. Advice?

Super fun game, play as much as you like, don't have to spend money, travel around the world and learn about different cultures. Usually only very minor loading issues but probably because of my own connection. Add more diplomas!
How do I use vip travel card? It was said that it cover all the trips, but when I want to travel, I have to buy a ticket. I dont understand the purpose of tbe card.

comments: I love this game. Its very addicting and fun, but I find that there are barely any female dragons. This upsets me very much and I would like for this to change. The only females I see are the dragons with names like  motherly dragon, belle dragon, viktoria dragons, and sleeping beauty dragons. There are also descriptions like "add some girly pink to your collections with the gummy dragon"(which is also coincidently a girl). Then I see cool legendary dragons, but OH plot twist they're all boys. This is a very fun game no doubt on that, but please, stop with the sexism and make cool female dragons. Thank you.

Still Having Lot's of Fun! Cool to mix different dragons just to see what u get!  I just opened my 6th island, When I first started playing this game I think there were only 3 or 4 islands & maybe about 300 to 400 dragons. I'm having trouble keeping them long enough to get the next island!üòâüòÑüòÅ!!

Game would be great except for the fact that you can't do certain things without bugging people on Facebook for help. I just want to play the game. I can't level my dragons past 10 without building a special building which you build without gems or bugging people. No way to get gems other than extremely slowly by completing achievements which take days to complete and give 1-3 gems. Supposedly you can watch videos for gems but there is absolutely no place on the game that allows this. If your friends on Facebook don't play this game they can't help you and you are screwed if you truly want to enjoy the game. You can't win battles with level 10 dragons. You can't breed more than one dragon at a time without gems. You can't expand past 2 islands without gems. If you get the required gems to level your dragons past 10, then there is another super expensive building to level them past 15, and get, guess what, you need gems for that too. Other games allow in game friends which this one doesn't and that is frankly ridiculous as it's a "social" game. Other games allow other ways to obtain gems like watching videos or trying other games which this one doesn't. There isn't enough time to complete special events for special limited dragons unless you can get gems. Overall, the game would be fantastic if gems were easier to come by and you could make in game friends instead of having to rely on Facebook friends!

Just a few gripes. 1st of all I LOVE DRAGON CITY. Been playing for years. About your survey, I would never. You ask for too many permissions. Tree of life....when I get a Dragon here comes the same Dragon adding up for hatching. Like why? 815+ dragons are more than enough. Why do u keep adding, adding, adding. We could NEVER get all of them as it is. Why more? Love me some Dragon City like a said in the beginning.

The game is amazing, addicting and a lot of fun just to collect and level up dragons. The events that are constantly coming on always make you feel like you have something to do. However when of the events are very unbalanced and, if you are against one of these people, not very fun. The heroic races are a great way to compete with other players to add a powerful dragon to your collection but some people take the fun out of it by spending 100's of gems to ensure that they come first. The ability to use gems during these races should be removed as it is highly unbalanced, or at least add another way of collecting the heroic dragons without having to compete with people who pay to win.

THIS IS THE BEST GAME EVER!!! I totally recommend it to EVERYONE who loves addictive games and dragons. I find myself constantly playing this game all the time! I honestly feel like I can't say how much I LOVE this game with words. Again, this is the best game a player can have. Just one thing, I wish there were more ways to get gems instead of just buying 'cause I can't buy anything. So please make gems more easier to get. Also please make the islands worth less gems.üòä

descriptionHTML:
Ready to take on the hottest role playing game out there and bend fire-breathing dragons to your will? Are you the one to claim the title of top Dragon Master in the world? Accept the challenge and prove your might!

Build a Dragon City on floating Islands and fill it with farms, habitats, buildings… and dragons! Collect and train your cute babies and evolve them into impressive beasts that will defend you in the PvP Arenas!

Join forces with other Dragon Masters in Alliances, interact in the chat and obtain rewards from the Alliance Chest.

Combine dragons of Fire, Nature, War, Legend and lots of other elements to hatch rare hybrids and expand your collection. You can also obtain dragons from exclusive events!

FEATURES

- Complete the Dragon Book! There are over 500 dragons to breed and collect.
- New dragons join the game every week through breeding events and special islands.
- Challenge yourself at the Dragon Quests and fight against other Masters in the PvP Arenas to collect exclusive dragons, claim Warrior’s Chests, and climb up the leaderboards!
- Summon dragons of the at the Tree Of Life and try their skills.
- Unlock advanced features like the Ancient World and the Guardian Dragons.
- Be social: Join Alliances to play with other masters, chat with them, and open Alliance Chests.
- Log in with Facebook to save your game and play on all your devices - That way you can take your baby dragons everywhere.

There are over 80 million Dragon Masters. What are you waiting for? Join the fun!

If you already love our dragons… Drop us a nice review :)

Dragon City is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

Follow us on Twitter: @DragonCityGame
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DragonCity
Subscribe to our Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/DragonCityChannel

Check out other cool games by the creators of Dragon City: Monster Legends and World Chef!

- Start opening Alliance Chests! By joining forces with the Dragons Masters in your Alliance to complete tasks, you'll be able to reach milestones and open Alliance Chests containing Primal Dragon Orbs!

comments: First off to all those saying too many ads, there aren't any ads. What you're seeing is game packs that can be purchased to help you advance within the game. I love the game. Everythingis great. I just wish they would give everyone time to adjust to previous items before creating something new. And also the pricingis too high. $20-$50 is fine but $99 is way too much.

This game has become a cash cow for the developers at MZ. New features are added making the game more complex and diverse weekly. Costing players money. While old features players are familiar with and depend on break down  After contacting MZ you get a nice form letter stating thank you for bringing it to there attention but they hope you understand these things take time to fix.

This game should be awesome, but the updates just come too fast now. I bought 2 packs this week and still got zeroed as soon as i dropped shield. By the time you spend 2 days clicking upgrades, someone is stronger than you and just waiting for you to try to use your new stuff.

This game was fun about two years ago before MZ started trying to milk players each month for money.  If you buy a package from them,  which ranges from $14.99 to $399.99, make sure you get what you pay for. ..many times you don't get everything they promise; especially with the BOGO packages.   MZ will do little if anything to correct the matter.  Also, even after you spend tons of money, if you wait long enough they will give you the same stuff for free to all players.   My advice...find another game to play. ..something more fun and worthwhile. ..and not sponsored by MZ.

If you want to be at top of this game then be prepared to spend more than the price of a top end BMW in one year. I am not kidding. MZ releases major game changing upgrades every day for several $99.99 packs. Then you get tge worst customer support in the industry. Terrible software quality control and business practices that mirror drug cartels.

Mz took a once decent game and ruined it.  The weekly changes are senseless change is to be gradual.  Im finally walking away.  Im done with ur bots, done with admin accts and done with daily chances.  More and more people have quit and droves more will follow.  Choke on the money u got from all  of the foolish people who actually paid.  You deserve none of it

comments: Game has only 1 speed, too fast. If you want to follow story line, forget it. Also hard to figure out what's going on upgrading equipment and skills. No help, and no fun if you enjoy the leveling up your character part. Basically if you want to watch your character bounce around and  not know what's going on then this games for you. To be fair, guess you would pick it up sooner or later ; (

Great game love it, but now we're getting a merge, FWI 4399game don't make all the players go back to level one Plz! No one wants to start over because of merging players! It's not appropriate, and why, again Why do we have to start over! PLZ CHANGE YOUR MIND PLZ! üò¢

Like the game but there's a huge problem... there is a hacker trying to portray themselves as the developers using the raiders name from Malaysia. If any of u see an email with the name of raiders game masters report it if u can don't give out info

So far so good. An easy game to play while doing other things like watching shows/homework/ect. Lot of people complain about the auto-play. But you can turn it off if you want. I actually like the auto feature. To each his own

comments: This is a great game for any Bleach fan   Don't listen to the people who say developers don't care and only want money... this game was originally Japanese and they are transferring it over to English and this takes time.. this game is great the characters look great the game play is very good and even... lvl system is easy n fun and you get what u put into the game. Yes some characters are harder to get then others but that's what makes the game fun and worth playing.. yes the game has a VIP system for those that want to spend money to get better things or characters but that doesn't mean you have to do it to enjoy the game...

I used to love this game but after two app reset wipes, I'm over it sorry going to brave souls who's with me?! Update: after reaching out to the admins on I was able to recover my data from my Google account. The data can not be transferred from ios to Android but that's fine. Thank you admins, sorry for the salt.

Even though the descriptions and dialogues in the game are bit off it doesn't completely take away from the experience of the game. It still does have some bugs, like the dialogues for instance, but the game is really addictive. It's one of very few games that I've been playing religiously for the past few months, probably longer. That's the one of the main reasons why I'm giving 5 *'s. The game has an ENORMOUS amount of potential, I think if the devs got licensing rights then it would improve the game so much more. One thing I really do not like about the game is that it is kind of a pay-to-win game. You have to spend real money to advance quicker or become stronger in the game faster. Other than the cons, it really is a fun and addictive game. If you love anime, if you love fan service, if you love action games, if you just love Bleach in general then you will definitely love this game.

Not very good it fell short of the other apps...it still missing half the content of the others while making it impossible without paying to collect keys.. shard collecting is lacking ...unless you want to pay for anything halfway decernt gameplay you won't find it here

Been playing for the past month. I've had zero issues that I can think of that I've read others having. It's a fun and addicting game. I can't wait for all of the other characters to be added in, only thing I dislike is wanting to play them but they aren't in it. Though I understand why. Great game would certainly recommend.

Only installing because i spent hundreds in the last one. Devs only care about your money, don't fix or take forever to fix issues, and the game is basically pay to win. Yiu can still get decently for free, but don't expect to get to the top that way. Take the 1 star reviews seriously... A lot of ppl stopped playing because of this games BS...

comments: Warning! Once you start playing Angry Birds Match you'll never want to stop! I love this game. I have been looking for a game that isn't so easy I get bored or too hard I get angry! This game is perfect! The only thing I would like is could you possibly offer other ways to get more lives? Like watch a video to fill up ( like angry birds pop) or spin the wheel? I just hate waiting soooo long when I run out of lives, because I want to keep playing!!!!

I've enjoyed this game, but I haven't been able to open it for several days. I hate to uninstall and lose all my progress. Any help would be appreciated. Ok, so after about a month of not loading it started working...for a month now it's down again. I upgraded today, 2/19, and still won't open, grrrr! Help!! Changed my 5 stars to 1! The game constantly freezes, closes and then won't reload. I've reinstalled 4 times and that's it I'm done. Really disappointing as when it runs it's so much fun.
For some reason right in the middle of playing it has been quitting and then I lose that life. Very frustrating. Is there and update available?

I love this game but for like 3 months since i updated I can't play and I just updated again and still the same doesn't let the game download it frozes, can you please fix that, or let me know what i can do, I dont want to uninstall it so I don't loose my progress.  Starting to get aggravated.  Thank you.

I like this game a lot and would give higher reviews but a lot of times if I am playing a level and have one move left it ends the level and I never get to make the move. It's some kind of glitch in the game. I think it's trying to get me to buy gems and coins. Very frustrating and annoying.
It seems to me that the objects to move are too small, it is always moving wrong way that I am trying to move. You should be able to select move by tapping, then swipe.
description: Match the toys, stars, stuff and things to collect everything those cute baby birds from the Angry Birds Movie ask for! Because who can say no to a face like that?The pigs are trying their hardest to ruin the Hatchlings‚Äô party, but nothing can stop these little guys! Of course not without some help from the big birds. Red, Chuck, and Bomb are there to help the Hatchlings whenever they get into trouble... which is pretty often. It‚Äôs going to take a lot of matching, a wide variety of outfits, and heaps of help from you too, but we just might be able to get this party started! descriptionHTML:
Match the toys, stars, stuff and things to collect everything those cute baby birds from the Angry Birds Movie ask for! Because who can say no to a face like that?

The pigs are trying their hardest to ruin the Hatchlings’ party, but nothing can stop these little guys! Of course not without some help from the big birds. Red, Chuck, and Bomb are there to help the Hatchlings whenever they get into trouble... which is pretty often. It’s going to take a lot of matching, a wide variety of outfits, and heaps of help from you too, but we just might be able to get this party started!

FEATURES:
– Meet over 50 delightfully darling Hatchlings!
– Find the Hatchlings to earn valuable gifts!
– Visit the Hatchlings to try out new outfits, or just say hello!
– Simple, fun, and casual match three gameplay!
– Match 4 or more items and bring out the Angry Birds!
– Over 1000 fun and challenging levels, and more to come!
– Different challenging puzzles await – pop pigs, collect delicious treats, and more!
– Use cool Boosters to best even the trickiest of levels.
– Connect to Facebook to synchronize your progress!
– Play offline!
– Warning: Critical levels of cuteness.

-----------------------------


Need some help? Visit our support pages, or send us a message! https://support.rovio.com/


-----------------------------


Angry Birds Match is completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available.


Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eula
Privacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacy

- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.

- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.

comments: Game is amazing Love it. Customer service well you have none. All you get is automated message and no way to speak to someone about any issues. You give them what they need and no one fallows up on it. All you get back is the same automated response. Then they remove your ticket. So if you have problems with the game don't bother contacting them it's a waist of your time. THERE'S NO ONE THERE FOR YOU. Can't get my account back. That's all I want. It's simple NO???????

Another month, another violent smash and cash grab. Putting an entire LT behind a character requirement that 99.9% of the player base has next to no chance of getting with obfuscated "odds" that require one to spend 1000s of dollars for a "chance"(not even guaranteed) to get a character. At this point, I'm only updating the game to keep my reviews more relevant and higher weight.

It's a good game. Awesome graphics, great gameplay,amazing superstar etc. But not good for free player because you don't get good superstar and rate of getting better superstar is very very low. Even some time in 4 pulls. I didn't get any 2 star silver card. Please make rare superstar drop rate more or I can't go any further in this game and make this game more free player friendly.

Basically I have been playing this game over the past year... It is a totally addictive and 100% entertaining game... Only downside which has forced me to stop playing is that I have just acquired a new phone and attempted to load the game with my login details (for both Facebook & Google) but have found that I now have to start from the beginning again... I've now become mildly disappointed unless this can be fixed I don't think I will be playing again as I put too much time into this for me to start from the beginning again!!!

It is my favrt game ever when i play this i stuck with this game I want to say something  now it's giving  too many ads and a problem  when I log out it says only one thing again and again that this account using on another device  but it's not real and what I do I am help less and I can't get new powerful superstars üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠when I open with cash he always give me duplicates.. Give some new cool events like wrestlemaina T-shirts..

Love playing this game until google services crashed my phone and when I came back on to the game after having to reset everything, I lost access to my account. I have contacted customer services and all they do is send a pregenerated message that answers and resolves nothing!!  5 days and still receiving the same message back.. Even my faction leader has provided information to determine that my account is indeed my account and that I am active in his faction. But still SCOPELY send the same annoying generated message. WORST CUSTOMER SERVICES EVER!!!

descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers
Spring into action with this special 50% value-added WWE Champions Acrobat pack to upgrade all of your favorite Acrobat Superstars. Use your Acrobats in the King of Wrestlemania event starting March 23.

Your WWE dream rivalries are happening live in WWE Champions, the free action puzzle RPG game that pits the WWE’s greatest Superstars of all time and today against each other in the ultimate quest for stardom. Collect WWE Superstars from Raw and Smackdown Live alongside your favorite Legends, fighting your way through generations of the greatest WWE Superstars and all out mayhem.

Send your team into a WWE ring to test your fighting skills. Win, and your WWE champions will live on as immortals. Lose, and face defeat at your opponent’s hands. Team up with other WWE fans to battle for reputation, power and bragging rights in WWE Champions! #LetsSettleThis

==WWE CHAMPIONS FEATURES==

WWE Role Playing Game
• Use RPG skills to earn XP by fighting in the ring and upgrading your WWE champions to increase their power and customize epic fighting RPG moves.
• Fighting RPG gameplay lets you combine a variety of skills and upgrades to create a completely unique team to defeat your opponents.

MATCH 3 Game with Signature WWE Moves
• Match 3 pieces and obliterate rivals with signature WWE moves like John Cena’s Attitude Adjustment and The Rock’s legendary Rock Bottom.

WWE Champions and Events
• WWE Champions is always evolving, so join the WWE Universe in weekly bouts and fighting games.
• Re-create upcoming WWE Monday Night RAW and Smackdown battles, enter monthly title events and recruit up-and-coming WWE Superstars.

COLLECT Iconic WWE Superstars
• Collect tons of WWE Superstars and assemble your dream roster of champions from the 80s, 90s and today.
• Collect WWE favorites like The Rock, Undertaker, Macho Man Randy Savage, John Cena, Triple H, Big Show, Andre The Giant and more.

BATTLE in 1-on-1 or Tag Team Online Games
• Match 3 puzzle pieces to attack, build up energy and even pin your enemies using signature WWE moves.
• Battle skillfully to unleash devastation on your rivals in epic battles that you can finish in less than five minutes.
• Online team-ups with friends - tag team against rivals or battle against your friends for ultimate bragging rights.

CREATE the Ultimate Alliance
• Form a super team with your friends to take over the WWE Universe!
• Heal each other's injured Superstars and give gifts to your teammates as you fight for dominance in and out of the ring!

STRATEGIZE with your alliance members in the Faction Headquarters
• Players can coordinate to complete exclusive Expedition missions for rewards, earn faction lockboxes in the Head Office, and earn Faction coins that can be redeemed for valuable items in the Swag Store.


WWE Champions is the ultimate puzzle RPG to feature all of your favorite WWE heroes. Enter the brutal world of the WWE, play puzzle games to defeat your rivals and collect new WWE Superstars to build the ultimate team. Download for free and start battling today!

comments: After the latest update, I've only gotten one set of daily quests which populated right after the update. After that, I haven't received any additional daily quest where I can win some gems. Why is that? Now the only way for me to earn more gems os through the free gems  (by watching adds), getting a high enough ranking in battlez, or buying them.

I think the new update is nice battlez is awesome and the good news is that my phone doesnt crashes anymore and when I played Inzanity it did'nt lag great rework but 1 question, WHY DID YOU REMOVE ULTIMATE BATTLE AND DEMONSTRATION MINI GAME THEMES TO EVERY WORLD?? Im sick of every level with just only themes

I think the new update is very cool. It adds some multiplayer into the game. When I heard of this new update I rushed to my phone and started playing. It turned out to be good I was happy and thought it would turn out well. Then after that I remembered pvz one. It's multiplayer mode was much better. One player would be plants and the other zombies. Why could they not have made that. It was such a good idea. I would personally play that mode more than this. But it's just my opinion. Thanks for reading.

Since last update it is very unstable and keeps crashing. Also every time i finish the last inzanity it crashes then once reloaded says expired so ive lost out. In fact im not that interested anymore. Im not a fan of battlez and it all seems geared to that now so had fun while it lasted.

I HATE YOUR UPDATE. Battlez mixed battle between players who bought plants with money with the players who don't is totally unfair. There are many players out there like me who play everyday collecting coins by coins and gems by gems patiently waiting for a good plant offer that we can buy with gems. Buying plants with money is not on the budget. I'm not angry. I'm sad. Because PVZ is always one of my top listed games. Now it's pathetic. Crashed. Unfair. Expensive.

Just like.But EA just want money right? You just wasting money.Money cause something bad.This wirld need to follow the truth path.Not money path.I dont like those plant,pinatas and more that need to buy with money.Useless.

Amass an army of amazing plants, supercharge them with Plant Food, and devise the ultimate plan to protect your brain. 100 Million Downloads ‚Äì This app has received more than 100 million overall downloads. Winner: Best Mobile Game at E3 ‚Äì Game InformerWinner: Best Mobile Game 2013 ‚Äì MashableWinner: Game of the Year 2013 ‚Äì Slide to PlayDISCOVER HUNDREDS OF PLANTS AND ZOMBIESCollect your favorite lawn legends, like Sunflower and Peashooter, along with hundreds of other horticultural hotshots, including creative bloomers like Lava Guava and Laser Bean. Go toe-to-missing-toe with a massive array of zombies at every turn, like Jetpack Zombie and Mermaid Imp ‚Äì you‚Äôll even have to protect your brain from rampant Zombie Chickens! GROW POWERFUL PLANTS  Earn Seed Packets as you play and use them to fuel your plants like never before. Power up attacks, double-down defenses, speed up planting time, and even gain entirely new abilities. Boost your plants to ensure those zombies are lawn-gone!JOURNEY THROUGH SPACE AND TIME Battle across 11 crazy worlds, from Ancient Egypt to the Far Future, and beyond. descriptionHTML:
Play the award-winning hit action-strategy adventure where you meet, greet, and defeat legions of hilarious zombies from the dawn of time, to the end of days. Amass an army of amazing plants, supercharge them with Plant Food, and devise the ultimate plan to protect your brain.

100 Million Downloads – This app has received more than 100 million overall downloads.

Winner: Best Mobile Game at E3 – Game Informer
Winner: Best Mobile Game 2013 – Mashable
Winner: Game of the Year 2013 – Slide to Play

DISCOVER HUNDREDS OF PLANTS AND ZOMBIES
Collect your favorite lawn legends, like Sunflower and Peashooter, along with hundreds of other horticultural hotshots, including creative bloomers like Lava Guava and Laser Bean. Go toe-to-missing-toe with a massive array of zombies at every turn, like Jetpack Zombie and Mermaid Imp – you’ll even have to protect your brain from rampant Zombie Chickens!

GROW POWERFUL PLANTS
Earn Seed Packets as you play and use them to fuel your plants like never before. Power up attacks, double-down defenses, speed up planting time, and even gain entirely new abilities. Boost your plants to ensure those zombies are lawn-gone!

JOURNEY THROUGH SPACE AND TIME
Battle across 11 crazy worlds, from Ancient Egypt to the Far Future, and beyond. With more than 300 levels, ultra-challenging endless zones, fun mini-games, and daily Piñata Party events, there’s always a new challenge to complete. Plus, ready your best defenses – Dr. Zomboss is waiting to take you on at the end of every world!

EXPLORE MORE WITH THE TRAVEL LOG
Stumped about where to go next? Consult your Travel Log to embark on exciting Quests created just for you. Complete Scheduled Quests before time runs out, or take on a series of Epic Quests and earn special rewards.

Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement.

Thanks for playing!

comments: One of the best game i've played, so many reward systems, good control and great graphics. Keep up the gpod work, hope to see more new hero. One last thing, the co-op mode has some bug where u created the room but unable to start the game even when u have enough player. Please fix that, thank you.

I think it's a good game. Suck that you have to pay money to go up against other people that already have SS Hero's. Just wanted to say y'all should make at least more S hero's that are FTP so y'all can get people to get back into the game I don't want this game to die off.

The game is really addictive. Hours of game play and activities. I really like it. However, since it's international the time for coop game should be more flexible so i can join with my friends at suitable time. Tournament matching is a little bit unbalanced, either it's a raid or it's a total defeat. And heroes skills should  give more details on stats, so we can plan effectively. Thank you for such a good game.

They are about to make it more of a money trap with an update that screws f2p and budgeted p2w. They say they have free events and events so part time p2w have fun. Then why are people talking about quitting? These are high paying players. I know you plan on making it so hero's bought for special skills like stun and silence won't work if there's a big gap. You've made it so hero's bought for the purpose of moving these budgeted p2w are useless. So it's in favor of real p2w. It should be a reverse. Make the lower people have a better chance not a worse one.

I found an issue, when I defeat the boss by bleed damage, the victory screen doesn't show up. It just stuck at the boss level with its dead body lying on the ground. I hope you fix this. Great game by the way.

Heroes Night Watch unique skill is not working. It stated any enemies that hit the magic barrier will be stopped immediately but when I use it in arena enemies pass the barrier like nothing. It had been a month and nobody seems bother about this.
description: TAP, SWIPE & SLING your heroes to send them smashing towards hordes of monsters, unleashing explosive power on impact and looting epic treasures!ALSO FEATURES‚Ä¢Simple Control, Super Fun:Issue orders, take aim and cast skills, all easily controlled by a finger swipe!‚Ä¢Turn-based combat and tactical thinking:Plan your moves, adjust formations and build up combos to overcome your enemies!‚Ä¢Strategic Team-building & Hero Collection: Each hero comes with a set of unique stats & skills that greatly affects how your plan & plan!Try out different setups to gain the upper hand!‚Ä¢Multiplayer Game Modes: Fun With Friends & Prove Your StrengthPlay Co-op levels with up to 3 buddies, share the extra loot & fun!Or battle head-to-head against other players in real-time PVP duels!Hyper Heroes is free to download and play, however, some in-game items can be purchased with real money.If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.A network connection is required to play, and Wifi connection is recommended for multiplayer games.Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/hyperheroesOur service mailbox: hyperheroes@90kmile.com‚Ä¢ Device Permissions:[WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE]:  We need this permission to write and read users save files that stored locally on the device.[READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE]:  We need this permission to write and read users save files that stored locally on the device.
descriptionHTML:
TAP, SWIPE & SLING your heroes to send them smashing towards hordes of monsters, unleashing explosive power on impact and looting epic treasures!

ALSO FEATURES

•Simple Control, Super Fun:
Issue orders, take aim and cast skills, all easily controlled by a finger swipe!

•Turn-based combat and tactical thinking:
Plan your moves, adjust formations and build up combos to overcome your enemies!

•Strategic Team-building & Hero Collection:
Each hero comes with a set of unique stats & skills that greatly affects how your plan & plan!
Try out different setups to gain the upper hand!

•Multiplayer Game Modes: Fun With Friends & Prove Your Strength
Play Co-op levels with up to 3 buddies, share the extra loot & fun!
Or battle head-to-head against other players in real-time PVP duels!

Hyper Heroes is free to download and play, however, some in-game items can be purchased with real money.
If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

A network connection is required to play, and Wifi connection is recommended for multiplayer games.

Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/hyperheroes

Our service mailbox: hyperheroes@90kmile.com

• Device Permissions:
[WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE]: We need this permission to write and read users save files that stored locally on the device.
[READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE]: We need this permission to write and read users save files that stored locally on the device.
developerAddress: Room 18S, 27/F Ho King Commercial Centre, 2-16 Fa Yuen Street, Kowloon, HK.
recentChanges: Network frameworks reworked that may improve performances in various multiplayer game modes.
Fixing solutions for many of the known issues related to Arena, Guild Wars, and Friends/Chat channels.
New Festival events, heroes, and promos.
summary: Hyper Heroes is a fast-paced Action RPG mixed with unique pinball-like gameplay.
title: Hyper Heroes: Marble-Like RPG

comments: Good app but few glitches. One day I was playing against computer. It made a miraculous move of eating my pawn at a place where none of my pawn ever existed. Awesome. :P Net connectivity is as good that when other apps show good connection under high speed wifi, ot shows no connectivity. Lol

Freakking great. Best chess app EVER!!!!. I have the free one and it can teach you tactics, help you in situations and if you dont want that no need to do it. You can even costumize your wallpaper or theme. Skill ratings 100-2600 playing real people. Or you can play a computer, 400-1200 or 1400 i think. Great app, get it you wont regret it.

I think this app is horrible simply.. I'm a diamond member, but I don't think i will be for much longer. There's other chess sites that don't disconnect and lag so much. Main dislikes is the constant disconnection, no order at all in the videos section. Tactics, lessons and drills bugs and crashes when turning the mobile or screen goes off. Specially drills bugs and just repeats the same one over and over when you finished instead of going to the next one. Also, app was unhappy I was logged in on my turned off computer.. come on..

I cannot respond to chats. The support team promises they will fix the issue, but it's only lies so that I can give the app a decent rating. Now my custom board, pieces, and background settings get reset every 2 days. Frustrating app.

The last update sucks! Premove is not at all intuitive. It now just shows the block which we want to move the pawn and doesn't move the pawn itself like before. The toast message that showed 'challenge rejected' was better than the current one. Dislike it!!
I have no connection issues but some times game discontinues with showing no n/w.pls solve otherwise good game Finally uninstalled... Worst team.

comments: Cannot get in touch with support. When Pennypop ran the game, they were very helpful and easy to get ahold of. Now I can't reach anyone and my account is in limbo (even after having been a dedicated player years ago). Be warned, it's not the game it was and until it steps up on customer service, I wouldn't put any money into it.

Tried reinstalling on a new device and it couldn't connect to facebook. Couldn't recognize my email (even though I get emails from them). Kept trying to get me to make a new account. I'm sorry, but when I play something off and on for roughly half a decade, then I'd like for the app to work so I can retrieve my account. Fix it, and I'll change my review because I really do love this game.

I'll give this game a higher rating only if the game support will release my epic monster, which is permanently locked for mission at the dig site. A glitch that they fail to do anything. No response, no support.

I'm revising my review.. I use to love this game. Now it's becoming more like a pain in my behind to even play. The game is not allowing me to do normal things that I'm suppose to be able to do. It's really making me angry!
I really love the hell out of this game.. Those haters who say its slow its not.. your phone is. your CPU is tacy as F plz don't blame the game..

Takes 2 mins to load then you have to press "try again" 20 times then wait for 2 mins and repeat everything 100x before it can load then just after you beat a boss you have to press try again 100x then it crashes. Best game ever.

Data connection required to play.

descriptionHTML:
A top 10 strategy game all around the world!
4.5 stars! A top-rated game!

Are you ready to step into the pit and punch someone? Your favorite Clash of Lords 2 Heroes are fighting in a free-for-all frenzy against a force of frightening fiends! Control the action and become the greatest warlord in all the land. To survive you’ll need wit, will, and we couldn't think of a word for strength but you get the picture. It's time to Clash!

Clash of Lords 2 is a strategy game with fun and innovative twists on the genre. Recruit over 50 Heroes and their mercenaries, build and defend a base, and fight alongside your friends in over 10 PvE and PvP modes! Get ready to Clash!

Game Features:
✔ You control the action! Activate Heroes’ skills in real time!
✔ Pair Heroes and Troops with our unique Mercenary system!
✔ Play it Your Way! With over 10 PvE and PvP modes, there's always something fun and different to do!
✔ Fight alongside your friends! Join a Guild, and clash with players from all over the world! You can even battle against players from different countries!
✔ Free to Play! Log in every day to win free Heroes and Jewels!

Note: This game requires an internet connection to play.
Visit our Facebook Fanpage at: https://www.facebook.com/clashoflords2

This is definitely a fun bingo app. Where it's lacking or otherwise could be improved, comparatively to ther Bingo games, is the daily spin wheel & daily sign in bonus. Daily 24hr sign in should provide a much larger number of free tickets & include daily free power ups. Earning one or two power ups w a single spin of the wheel is anticlimactic! Power ups are a vital way to  daily tournament advancement, bingo wins & simy make playing more fun. Completing a pizzule is impossible without power-ups or making a purchase. However, a big win for this app. is the ability to sign in each new day to a new tournament which helps level the playing field. Special tournaments and/or the add' side bonuses, like the "turkey daub" made playing & making a purchase worth wild!

Good, keeps me coming back for more. The only thing I don't like is there is no way of getting that many puzzle pieces in the time. Could you maybe let us play till we get the Puzzle Complete to get the rewards.

I am addicted to this game. I think you should get more power ups instead of ticket's. Cause you run out of power up's. I feel you should get bingo power up's instead of ticket's. On the bonus spin they should add bingo power up's of 4. I need more bingo power up's. And would like to get power up's for daubing every number called each game. I need more power Up's. And the game should give you tickets when you get every number that is called correctly on each card every game that you play.

The new additions of the outlaws was great, but then you added all these "special" days that serve no purpose but to make people spend money. I have spent plenty already but not for every game. Sorry guys, bad move. Too greedy.

We are in a new era of war game, where your strategy matters as much as the size of your base and power of your Armada. The game challenges you to become the best navy commander. You must have a keen eye on the battlefield to dominate the action and bring order with your navy to spot,scout and sink enemy ships!

World war is only the beginning - Dive into the action packed sea battles now!

Features:
1.Build your own empire
✪ Base: Build and develop your own navy base
✪ Carrier: More than 100 kinds of carriers around the world
✪ Aircraft: 200 most advanced helicopters, fighters, and bombers
✪ Warship: Exclusive performance for each destroyer, cruiser, and battleship

2.Build the strongest fleets of the ocean
✪ Carrier: Enhance and upgrade carriers, build the strongest core of fleets
✪ Aircraft: Enhance and upgrade aircrafts to unlock fighting skills
✪ Warship: Unlock more advanced warship with higher combat effectiveness
✪ Technology: Supply your commander with superior resources and power

3.Create unbeatable alliance and rule the world
✪Join an alliance where you can get help from members, and obtain exclusive gifts
✪Participate in alliance interaction; raise your rank up to commander
✪Alliance war on weekend, winner will be the king of the ocean
✪Cross servers battle, all players fight for the highest honor once a week

4.Play with global commanders
✪Play with millions of players from around the world
✪Text translator and Emoji are available
✪Customize your avatar
✪Choose the flag of your own country, find more allies and fight for your nation!

5.The best strategy naval war beyond mobile
✪Beat pirates with variety of strategies for the rewards
✪Against sea monsters with alliance members for the higher rewards
✪Massive PVP&GVG war, destroy and grab the resources of the enemy
✪Challenge World Boss 3 times a day

6.Unstoppable game experience
✪Great Post-Apocalyptic sea world with authentic 3D graphics
✪Wage epic war on the interactive world map
✪Fast paced battles will keep you awake 24/7

Check out the best 3D navy strategy game -Battle Warship:Naval Empire now! A war game to end them all!

Visit our Facebook Page at: https://www.facebook.com/warshipsNE

Attention! Battle Warship:Naval Empire is a free to play navy themed war game, but some items and features can also be accessed using real money. If you do not wish to use these features, please configure your settings in your Google Play Store app and set up password protection for purchases.

comments: Was an enjoyable game till the lagging starts constantly getting kicked and looted while waiting to get on game,And customer support are a joke,check your internet connection,No it's your game that we pay money for. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME DOWNLOADING

It's a great Game. My only issue is there are bullies in the game and you have to always be on to Protect your Fortress and Buoys or they will be destroyed and then you loose everything. Seems everywhere you go there are bullies. And they take forever to do a server merge when you're server is dieing. But overall still a good Game. Also there needs to be a server merge for a few servers. Some of the servers are dieing and some players are quitting because there's nothing new and the targets are slim to none. And alot are written to Joy City and asked for a merger and get nothing. Something needs to be done
Great work in new update joycity. You guys always remove one bug and add tons of other bugs in every update. After March update I can see what I'm typing in chat box until I send it.
Fun game if you keep buying packs.   Too many daily updates that keep you waiting to play until update is done.  Very lousy customer service.
Latest update today 21/3 terrible played for 30 secs froze had to turn off happened few times in a row now please fix

Is a scam as I brought a pack for the quest and it wouldn't count towards it but has no info telling people about the problem but Has potential to be a great game but when I wrote to joy city stating the server I play on is pretty much dead and hard to find active people they told me to create a new profile on a new server after putting hours and spending alot on this game they need to sort out there customer care team after being told that it's wrong especially player like me and others who spend money on game and also sort out all these dead servers to make the game exciting again

descriptionHTML:
Battle enemy pirates and join a pirate alliance to dominate the ocean. Dive into epic quests with your favorite pirates and relive their tales in Pirates of the Caribbean: Tides of War.

In this real-time strategy game, you’re the captain of your own pirate haven. Build your pirate base and recruit notorious marauders to join your mighty corsairs. Battle supernatural creatures and fearsome pirates to dominate the ocean!!

Relive the classic stories from Pirates of the Caribbean and battle alongside some of your favorite pirates like Captain Jack Sparrow, Will Turner and many more. Join them in epic quests on the high tides in the story mode.

Become the most cunning and fearless pirate that ever lived in Pirates of the Caribbean: Tides of War!

Game Features:

THE OCEAN IS YOURS TO RULE
✔ Start your adventure in the most original pirate war game!
✔ Become a legendary pirate captain and choose your own portrait.
✔ Obtain equipment to customize and strengthen your captain.

BUILD YOUR PIRATE BASE
✔ Build a powerful fleet and recruit fearless pirates for the battles to come.
✔ Build and defend your base from incoming enemy pirates looking to loot your resources.

PREPARE FOR A PIRATE BATTLE ROYALE
✔ Plunder your enemies to become the one and only PIRATE CAPTAIN of the Caribbean.
✔ Plan out assaults against millions of other pirates from all around the world.
✔ Dominate the ocean by creating or joining a pirate alliance and assemble an unstoppable force.
✔ Battle against supernatural creatures and other sea rovers on the open seas.

RELIVE THE ADVENTURES OF CAPTAIN JACK SPARROW
✔ Immerse yourself into the story mode.
✔ Dive into EPIC QUESTS featuring Pirates of the Caribbean movie plots and characters.
✔ Partake in the great tales of favorite pirates like Captain Jack Sparrow, Will Turner, Captain Barbossa and more!

Download now to start your Pirates of the Caribbean adventure!

Customer Support: https://tidesofwar.zendesk.com/hc/en-us
Terms of Service & Privacy Policy: http://policy.joycity.com/en

◆Access Authorizations in JOYCITY Games
1. Access to Make and Manage Phone Calls (READ_PHONE_STATE)
(When the game starts) It is essential to be able to identify the device for Guest Login (immediate start). Access to [Make and Manage Phone Calls] includes information to identify the device, and you will be unable to login to the game if you deny the access request.

2. Access to Photos, Media, and Files (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE)
(When game updating) We need your permission to save the update files onto your device's SD card. [Pictures, Media, File Access] includes the authority to access SD card. If you refuse the request, you will be unable to login.

* Phrases used in [ ] may differ based on the device and OS version

comments: It's pay to win for sure. However, if you play daily and stick to monthly and quarterly cards you'll rack up gems and heroes quickly. It took me over a year to get my VIP high enough to get the monthly meta heroes. I get an hour or two a day out of it and even when I didn't have the monthly paid heroes I had a fun time. I don't mind spending $15/month for the amount of time the game helps me kill.

I'm a paying customer, which they call "VIP" but you best believe you are far from important. I had an issue with a purchase in December, but support takes a week per message to reply and isn't useful at all about the issue and tells you they can't help. Should have let Google refund the money before the 48 hours instead of giving their support a chance.

Don't download the game . If u want to win u must spend thousands dollars. A huge skins with control every month 2 new heroes with amazing power. Every month making new heroes and the old ones getting trash. Random game no strategy. Just click for pic. Ucool don't do anything. Don't download!!! I played more than one year and every month it's getting worst. The forgetting about players. They think only for cash. Ucool one of the worst organisation..if u don't spend a money please don't start the game .nice pictures  and that it )))

This game was a very well balanced game between free play gamers and those that put money into it. Not anymore. If you want to be competitive you must put handreds of dollars each month (no joke). Very dissapointed in the way this game has become.

A very good game but a pay to win. I myself paid 73$ and I am VIP 8. This game can be fun without paying but to get the most out of it atleast  buy an annual card for 30$. If you have even more to throw away try buying all the cards when they run out get a new one. (Mainly Annual and Season Card. Week card isn't a must have). Also if you are new to the game wait for a new server to start. That way you wont fall behind. I am on server 210 and have also played on server 207. I was in this game when it was brand new and purple heroes were the best. I was in 1 of the 1st servers and f2P I quit the game at lvl 50 though. All in All if you want to play this game prepare 100$

The menu is very unresponsive when scrolling. Also, when killing enemies, particularly after using a special ability, the enemy simply freezes and then fades away - there's no animation for the death of the enemy and this is disappointing and detracts from the immersion. Otherwise it's a good game, but significantly more heroes would be necessary to keep me interested.
description: Join with your friends in the best and latest action RPG multiplayer online battle arena, HEROES CHARGE! Collect and train your heroes, gather your teammates, strengthen your heroes and wipe out the enemy in thrilling, addictive and fast-paced games. Over one hundred quests for you to partake in the story that YOU tell. Which heroes will you choose? = AN EXCEPTIONALLY RICH AND ADDICTIVE GAME = - Choose between over 50 unique and varied Heroes, from melee bruisers, agile archers and powerful mages - Fight and explore through the world of Kron, find rare heroes and see if you have what it takes to persuade them to join you! - Develop and upgrade your skills while collecting equipment sets that infuse your heroes with power over your foes! - An immersive experience with friends or go solo on your own in numerous battles - Blend cooperation with your friends as you battle against competing guilds for elite prizes - Develop team play and strategies to rule the world of Kron - Build or join a guild of friends - Fight through the PVP Arena for awards fame! - Collect and develop rare heroes! - Fight against a horde of enemies in challenging special events! NOTICE: Heroes Charge is a completely free-to-play game, however there are some game items that can also be purchased for real money. If you don‚Äôt want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings. comments: It's okay, should have more items in the storage bays, it's supposed to be just like a regular storage unit and it's not even close to that. And I believe the other buyers could say different things instead of the same phrases over and over. Maybe y'all can make it a little more realistic.

Good time waster. I bought it just to get rid of the ads. I have a shop now and the game is more fun. Update : they updated the game, but STILL didn't add any new levels! Come on, Devs. Update- new levels finally, but don't know what they are- not enough money to see them!

Fun until you get to Miami.. absolutely impossible to make 100 000.00 to unlock the next level.  Computer outbids or up bids you so that you either give up or lose your money.  No daily incentives to keep brining you back.  Unless you are willing to spend real money for boosters and money to move on.. play to Miami and then delete.. impossible to move forward after that.

The game was addictive and fun until you get to Miami. 100k to unlock that level is absurd and unrealistic. Its to hard to make that kind of money playing and now its just playing the same level over and over trying to get enough. Now its boring!! I'm disappointed, I really enjoyed playing until that point.

Was a great game until I got to Miami level 19 now just bloody stupid & waste of time. I went to 4 straight auctions couldn't buy a unit because competitors bid more than what the units worth how are you suppose to level up & move on when the designers of the game make stupid unrealistic flaws in the game no bidder is going to bid in real life on items they can't see or know are there so why put this into the game? Fix this issue & I will adjust my review accordingly!
Good game. I like the game however  this is the 4th time it has asked me to do a review. I have done this all 4 times with no reward and it still keeps asking me to do  it. Very frustrating
description: The greatest risks always lead to the biggest payoffs, but only to the select few bold enough to take them! Venture into the high-stakes world of storage auctions, run your own pawn shop and build your reputation as the smartest and quickest bidder on the scene!  HIGHLIGHTS - OUTBID your opponents in thrilling storage auctions! Time is money, so you only have a few moments to make your decision: use your intuition and be quick! -COLLECT hundreds of items from diverse sets: you can get everything from old basketballs to rare antiques and even alien artifacts! -PROFIT lots from your lucky choices and get invited to the most exclusive auctions in many different cities! -BECOME the richest bidder and challenge legendary gamblers to show them no one can best you in an auction! descriptionHTML:
Your story begins here!
Wanna enjoy living on campus with amazing friends?
Wanna find love with the mysteriously luring vampire?
The choice is yours!

The wiser your choice is, the more interesting your story gets.
You can never put your phone down as these weekly-added stories make you insatiable!

◆Campus Hacker◆
Alice the partygoer and Faith the unexpected are your roommates.
When Norman the football player decides to move in to your flat, things get a little crazy...

- Norman the football player, Peter the gamer, and Dean the aspiring actor are the candidates. Who can make you fall in love?
- Problems at home can be solved if your choice is correct.
- Your choice of an answer also affect your friendship and their lives. It's something to consider when choosing an option.

◆Untold Darkness◆
Alex St. Cyr is a member of the famous on-campus residence the House St. Cyr.
On the way home after a party, you witness a girl who gets attacked by a man with fiery red eyes.
How does this incident affect your life?
And what are the secrets of the St. Cyr family?

- Sexy and daring boys like Alex and Max make the story more thrilling!
- Solve the mystery of the St. Cyr family.
- Work hand and win the journalist competition!

◆Yearbook◆
Your friend Daisy goes missing when you come to meet a detective who has recently moved in to town.
Carl the detective and his assistant Stanley as well as Troy the classmate want to help you locate Daisy.
Will you succeed in saving Daisy?
Carl's dark past gets revealed as the search makes a progress...

- Solve the mystery of Daisy's missing case.
- Use your impressive memory to help Stanley locate his missing item.
- Disguise and attend a party to catch the pickpocket!

◆Hit the Floor!◆
Worst day ever! You lose job and boyfriend on the same day!
While wandering the city feeling sucky, you run into your ex Ken in front of a bar.
Remembering the good old times, you decide to start all over.

- Work hard to sign the record deal!
- David the producer, Adrian the pianist, and Ken the ex. Who has the ability to shine you on the stage the most?

◆Features◆
- Add stories weekly.
- Offer HQ graphic.
- Divide up into genres.
- Customize the look of a protagonist.
- Change storylines depending on options.
- Choose appearances depending on occasions.
- Bookmark your favorite episode!

Official Website: http://myshelfapp.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyShelf.NTTSolmare/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MyShelf_Solmare
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/myshelf_solmare/

◆About Us◆
NTT Solmare is a Japanese company based in Osaka, Japan. We strive to make the best simulation apps for adults. Our sims are free! If you like romance novels, visual novels, or cute guys, then we think that you will love our games!
So download one of our free games today, and find out why our games are so popular!

descriptionHTML:
Bored with typical MMO Strategy game play? Play War and Magic! Every action counts for battle victory.

It’s time to show your strategic mind and capture the legendary honors in the most exciting REAL TIME MMO ACTION STRATEGY GAME! The well-designed battle system may challenge your strategic and tactical thinking. Command every action of your troops and every decision counts in the battles. Power is no longer the key to victory, but tactics and strategy.

Ally with worldwide players and fight for the highest throne in this magic world. Build an empire with advanced technologies and structures. Protect your homeland and fight against enemies with legendary heroes and powerful troops. Support each other within the alliance and fight for the honors together. Only the winners from the clash could be commemorated as legends!

FREE to play! Get it now!


Real Time Tactics and Strategy
- Improved game play for chessboard battlefield – every strategic action counts!
- Strategically mix and match various heroes and soldiers for powerful troops.

Build an Empire
- Forge powerful equipment, level up your structures and technologies for greater power.
- Real time resource management – maximize every bit of your resources and grow as fast as possible!
- Look out for the enemies! Improve your defense ability and never let them succeed in plundering.
- Participate in various daily competitions which could strengthen your empire power.

Trigger an Online World War
- Released worldwide in 8 languages. You could ALLY or FIGHT with other players worldwide in real time.
- Attack your enemies and colonize the land! Also, be careful about improving your defense ability.
- United we stand, divided we fall! Share troops and resources with alliance members to support and strengthen each other. Remember, you are not alone!
- Battle for the throne! Conquer and defend the three world cities, struggling for the crown of the King.

Explore the Magic World
- 8 legendary heroes and 17 types of soldiers with unique skills and spells for you to choose from.
- Seek exotic monsters in the extensive world map and captive them for your troops.
- Visit relics covered under the mist and grab the treasures.

descriptionHTML:
If you love Hidden Object Games, epic adventure, and romance stories, Pearl's Peril will be your new favorite!

Find objects, solve the mystery and discover a new world full of twists. This game offers graphically beautiful scenes where you will have to reveal secrets and intrigues.

Pearl’s Peril is a stunning hidden object game that sweeps you away into an age of intrigue and romance, where polite appearances give way to inner greed and familial bonds are broken by betrayal.

Make friends, fall in love and seek clues in hundreds of hidden object scenes.

*YOU WILL LOVE PEARL’S PERIL*

● EXPERIENCE THE BEAUTY
No other hidden object adventure game can match Pearl’s stunning, hand-drawn scenes. Hundreds of unique locations transport you to a historic era when adventure pilots like Pearl were just beginning to open up our world.

● DISCOVER NEW ROMANCE SCENES
An epic story-driven game you’ll experience over years of gameplay! It will leave you with many dramatic scenes and stories to cherish and experience over and over again.

● UNRAVEL THE MYSTERY
Have fun! Find romance! Fall in love! Get swept away! Be shocked! But beware… in a world where power goes unchecked and hidden ambition knows no bounds, nothing is ever as it seems.

● BUILD YOUR PARADISE
As you journey through Pearl’s exciting challenges and hidden object gameplay, always return to Artemis Island to rebuild and expand – to create a paradise that you will love.

Join more than 40 million others when you play the most beautiful, deepest, highest-quality an epic hidden object adventure game on your mobile device. Adventure is waiting for you, so get started today!

~

Pearl Wallace lives the exciting life of an heiress and socialite in the 1920’s in New York City. That is until her father’s sudden suicide plunges her into a world of intrigue and mystery. Despite overwhelming evidence to the contrary, Pearl knows in her heart that her father’s death was no suicide. She will stop at nothing as she seeks to unravel the series of events leading to his untimely death and find the hidden villains who were really responsible. Money, danger and even death is no object as Pearl works to clear Samuel Wallace’s name.

As an ace pilot and cunning detective, Pearl flies headfirst into a whirlwind of adventure which takes her around the world from the depths of Africa to the heights of the Eiffel Tower. However, she’ll need your keen eye if she’s going to find the evidence she needs to confirm her suspicions that her father didn’t commit suicide at all. He was murdered!

Travel with Pearl to her family home on the Polynesian island of Artemis and help her find clues as well as piece together the puzzles, revealing the truth about mysterious secret orders locked in a struggle to determine the rise and fall of nations. Join our heroine as she unveils the hidden story of deception and betrayal that involves nearly everyone she has ever known or loved. Stand beside her as she seeks and finds hidden strength. Along the journey find the wealth to rebuild Artemis Island to its former glory, while discovering loyal friends, love and ferocious enemies that will test your limits.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Having problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us here: http://woo.ga/PPhelp

Become a fan of the game by keeping up with the latest stories, rewards, and competitions here:

http://www.facebook.com/pearlsperil
Visit us at http://wooga.com
Like us on facebook.com/wooga

Pearl’s Peril is free to download and play but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

You may require an Internet connection to play Pearl’s Peril and access its social features. Pearl’s Peril may also contain advertising.

Terms of Use: http://www.wooga.com/legal/terms-of-use/
Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/

comments: Absolutely sublime! This game is so awesome it's exactly what I want in a dragon game! Although there are microtransactions, you can absolutely play this game without spending a cent to progress! I have never ever payed real money to purchase gold, food and all other resources and I've played this game for almost two years The two tips are a little bit of patience and to keep on breeding. Even if you've already bred a certain pair of dragons, selling unwanted eggs is the best and quickest way to make gold

Once you get to level 100, breeding a dragon is almost impossible to nil. Very frustrating. My roommate and I started this game the same time. I am level 115 and she is on 83. We will breed the same dragons at the same time, she will succeed 85% of the time on the first try, it will take me over 10 times if I even get it, this started after level 100. Good luck long term players.

The events are annoying. I have reached the max on collecting eggs. I just gather then from doing tasks. Does that mean I can't participate anymore and am just stuck. I don't understand. Why would you limit the gathering of items?

Have been playing this game for a couple of years now and I love it! Sometimes it's frustrating - especially when you'd need to buy something to be able to get all the prizes during events - but it just makes it more challenging.  VERY happy with the customer support. I had an issue with a gift not being added to my totals, so I emailed them and they fixed it without issue.

The game is definitely addicting. But when I went into the Egg-straordinary Egg hunt island and tapped on a activty, it said their was a wonky spell and it completely stopped the whole game. I've tried different things different times, and it still won't work. I have played this in the past and the same exact thing happened, but with something different.

This game is AWSOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOme. I had 1023 gems saved up and then it glitched and now I only have 34. I love this game so much! Please help me get my 984 gems back! I don't want to rate it lower than 5 stars, but this has happened twice now...üòü

comments: At first I thought it was great, but now I realise it's just another PAY-TO-WIN game... You've got no chance if you come up against a paid-for character like Batman. It's such a shame this is the way game devs are heading these days.

*Update Very greedy company-> bad rating from me! They sell packages for 200-300 dollars! What's worse is that there are people who are stupid enough to pay for it. Aside from that a very cool game. To be at the very top it is pay to win. Besides that really cool. Lots of heroes and therefore possibilities.

It's a great game don't get me wrong but as I wrote in previous reviews they just went completely pay-to-win. Nowadays you cannot win not only because you don't have the latest gacha heroes, you just can't win because they released Batman for $160 to be competitive, most broken character ever. They are also releasing legendary pets... For $400 each. So yes, forget about having a fun competition, some players are simply out of you range by how much money they have spent and that ruins the experience.

My first review disappeared so I will leave another.  This game was great at first, then it started inserting the buyable characters such as Batman, Assassin's Creed and they are so over powered, one of them can take down your whole team without taking any damage.  Game is now so unbalanced that it isn't worth playing.  Until they fix the game, it worth playing.  Unless you like wasting money to feel like a god with over powered characters.  Game is dead, play something else.

definitely one of the best game if not the best game ived ever played on mobile. when you pull a hero for free the feeling is incomparable. the strategy you need to bring down other tougher players/guilds, its all here i tell ya! and to cap it all off the customer service is GREAT. you have concerns they reply ASAP what more could one ask for?!  install now! =)

Had the potential to be good but they care more about money than a good game, once you progress so far you will constantly lose to ppl who have bought characters that are vastly over powered. They will auto reply and say plenty of ppl still have fun without out paying, I made it to level 65 and it's just not true.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to a world of Holy Paladins, Deadly Dragons, Evil Wizards and over 50 other playable heroes! Conquer kingdoms lost to a mysterious curse, and find a new adventure around every corner. Create and lead your party of legendary Heroes into battle!
Join the 80 million players already experiencing this unique Action-Strategic RPG!

In partnership with Ubisoft, Lilith Games is proud to announce that the Prince from PRINCE OF PERSIA joins Ezio from ASSASSIN'S CREED as a playable hero in Soul Hunters.
 
［LEAD YOUR OWN EPIC PARTY］
- Choose from over 50 Heroes, from Stone Collossus to Ice Dragon, Sun Goddess to Wolf Child.
- Strategically build your party with Tanks, DPS and Support Heroes. Form Your Own MOBA Party!
- Collect Soulstones scattered throughout the world to upgrade your Heroes into an unstoppable force.
 
［MASTER THE TACTICS, PERFECT YOUR STRATEGY］

Create the perfectly balanced party to overcome the most powerful foes and legions.
Master your Heroes’ abilities to protect your allies, interrupt your opponents’ attacks, or deal massive damage.
 
 
［LEGENDARY  BATTLES］
 
-Challenge players from all over the world and become Master of the Arena.
-Advance to the Epic Arena and earn the title of Elite Soul Hunter.
-Create or Join a Guild,participate in raids, and earn exclusive rewards! Clash with other Guilds in the weekly Guild Wars! 


［A UNIQUE IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE ］
-A dark curse has been cast upon the kingdoms and it’s up to YOU to Unite the Heroes and Break the Curse!
-Real-time combat with captivating visual effects and extremely deep strategic gameplay.
-Explore mysterious and magical lands to find and collect new Heroes in a captivating campaign.

FOLLOW US at:
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/soulhuntersmobilegame
Twitter @HuntersGlobal
Homepage: http://www.soulhuntersgame.com
Instagram #soulhunters
SUPPORT
If you encounter any difficulties or require support please contact Customer Service by tapping on your in-game Avatar and then Support.
developerAddress: Unit 04, 7/F, Bright Way Tower, No.33 Mong Kok Road, Kowloon, Hong Kong

comments: BEWARE!  They will take the system down and give you when it will be back up.  Only problem is they bring it up before the advertised time.  Meaning you are left vulnerable.  They do not follow their own rules.  They do not compensate players for their mistakes.  They let Chinese player buy packs cheaper and use at accounts.  If you are a Westerner do not play or pay on this game.  Their customer service sucks.  They actually try to get you to feel sorry for them.  Its amazing.  They will only steal from you.

This is definitely a pay to win game.  And I agree with previous reviews saying it favors Chinese players.  The developers claim it's not, but if it wasn't true, then why are 99% of the servers dominated by Chinese players?  Plus the Chinese to English translations are terrible.  You will barely understands what they're saying.
The game could use more tool tips and information to properly explain all of the content. If I hadn't played a similar style game before this would be difficult to understand for a beginner.
Nice that this game is helpful to a point. Yes could be a little bit more forthcoming about items and there do's and don't on Upgrades and applications
Just getting started I guess

The graphics are great and the game play is interesting but it's very independent to new players; from other players as well as the system itself. Like things that have been improved on in this genre of game in other apps are still frustrating here. Oh well, what can I expect from a freemium game? Overall it's enjoyable but I have to take it in doses; basically until I get frustrated by the gameplay or other players. All in all, there are worse was to spend your time.
