comments: Would like more customisation options for my character. This game keeps crashing for no reason and doesn't like to reward it's loyal users. It is a fun game if they just let you play it. Fun game, but the gold farming and inattentiveness to what the users want will ruin it. Great game, lots of potential if taken in the right direction, but WAY to glitchy.
Like most other games, there is too much effort to bait you into micro transactions. The older games were so much better. It's a shame the Devs have resorted to such money grabbing standards.

Kinda annoying game. Teammates won't go after the ball and watching ads sometimes doesn't let you try again.                 Season 3 level 76 is impossible I pass to my guy and he doesn't bother to move a finger.

I like the tactic aspect of it, pretty good time waster. Took me a while to beat it, but didn't have to spend a dollar to do it. The story itself is very unrealistic and after 15 seasons I completely stopped following it and focused only on the games.

Physics are stupid. You pass a high ball to your teammate. A good accurate pass. And the defender wins the header bc your teammate doesn't event jump for the header. Annoying. Also the goalie makes literally humanly impossible saves at times. He can take one step only and move across the goal and block your shot. This game needs real life human physics

What is the problem with this app? In one of your levels you say that I have to hit a goal in 6 kicks or fewer and I have to assist with my hero,when I try doing it, you just make angles that make me pass in the opposite direction and my hero is in the defence and after 1 pass my hero just remains in the defence and that's  why I do not have enough stars to unlock the next season and there are a lot of problems in the other levels also.Please improve it or give me a free season unlock or give me some free stars for every season

comments: The good:  Better than WB1 where the same words kept showing up throughout even at difficult levels.  It's also nice that it shows your previous progress in a puzzle after you're forced to clear/restart it.  And although you'll still see lots of words that aren't part of the answer, the puzzles are themed so you can ignore those non-answers.  The bad:  The ads are very loud and you can't always silence them before they play.  It does not remember your sound choice so don't even think about playing this in the library.  Also, the game now has a ridiculous background that obfuscates the answer boxes making the game almost unplayable.  Finally, there are way too many boringly easy puzzles that you have to go through before you get to see the fun ones.  I almost uninstalled before getting there.
Really makes you think this game really makes you think it's mind-boggling
First time I've tried a game like this and I love it!
I love this game.when we are free we play this game any time
Good exercise for the mind.
I'm back!!! No other word game comes close to the challenge wordbrain2 offers.

comments: I can't get in the game its get stuck on the loading screen 3/25 Loading it shows and stays there it doesn't load past 3. I have tried uninstaling and reinstalling it does nothing so I don't know if it's a problem on my end or yours.

This last update has broken a major part of the game. Spirit Rest runs rely on speed and now it seems after 10-15 minutes (of inactivity, in an idle game) the game becomes unresponsive until you force close and restart, potentially losing what progress you had made. I know this is an implementation to stop bots but it has only made the game more cumbersome than ever before for living players. Please reverse this Ekkorr! Surely you can find some other way to combat bots without placing such a heavy burden on the rest of us.

Played the game all day bought priest pack had already revived and  was on lvl 168 then created an account.. Lost everything.. Lame. Not sure if I want to go through and start over again. Probably just uninstal. good thing I only spent a buck!
I used to love this game but I had to re-install it to re-download another app, and when i connected it to facebook again my progress wouldn't load. If this issue is fixed I'll give it 5*s.
I have changed my review after one hour update. Now i can enter again my two years games.
Would be a great game in not for the American flag being replaced with a fat bashing insult image. Regret making in app purchase, would not recommend to friends.

descriptionHTML:
Legendary heroes join an endless idle RPG battle that began over a thousand years ago! Fight legendary monsters, enter online PvP role playing battles and end the reign of the Dark Prince in Endless Frontier!

Travel across endless stages of fantasy RPG action with online PvP games, offline RPG guild wars and plenty of treasures to unlock! Upgrade your character with limitless fantasy RPG power ups and take control of legendary heroes in the Endless Frontier!

After failing to defeat the dreadful Prince of Darkness, Erin vows to revive himself again and again to organize the Knightgage of Dimension! Join the automatic fantasy RPG action!

Endless Frontier Features:

1. Idle RPG Fantasy Games
★ Idle RPG gameplay in an exciting fantasy adventure!
★ Lead your knights into the heat of battle and defeat the dreaded Prince of Darkness in epic autoquests!

2. Legendary Heroes
★ Heroes number over 150 and have their own powers – Which ones will you command?
★ Monster trainer – Recruit more than 50 pets to aid you in your quest!
★ Command more than 100 kinds of army units, to become legends of war!

3. Endless Inflation RPG
★ Grow stronger each time you revive with progressive gameplay!
★ Endless levels for endless fun! There’s no limit to the amount of power you can obtain!
★ Level up and tap your way through an expansive frontier of over 9000 stages!

4. Online PvP Guild Wars and Dungeon Games
★ Online multiplayer awaits with endless PvP battles and 200 vs. 200 guild wars that offer endless fun
★ Dungeon boss battles award you with 20 kinds of unique treasures and rare gifts

5. Find Gifts and Treasures
★ Discover more than 200 relics to aid you in your autoquest
★ Get treasure chests in each stage for even more great rewards!
★Obtain gold automatically the longer you stay in the frontier, the more chances you’ll have to tap and find more treasures


Traverse the frontier, take on your friends and see why Endless Frontier is one of the best idle RPG games on the market, today!


■ Rights Information
We request the following permissions for smooth gameplay.

[ Modify or delete the contents of your SD card (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) ]
Use an external storage such as SD cards to save and load game data.

[ Find accounts on the device (GET_ACCOUNTS) ]
This right is need for the linkage and notification between your game account and google account information.

[ Read cell phone's status and ID (READ_PHONE_STATE) ]
Inquire the device information for the advertising services provided within the customer interaction and game. (Manufacturer, model, OS version, etc.)

[ The approximate location (network-based) (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION) ]
Use the network/wifi information to provide the advertisement in one of the advertising services because items can be obtained free of charge after seeing it.

comments: This game is very fun and addicting. My only complaint is there isn't enough variation in the astromons. Some of them you can tell they are based off of a certain elemental character that's say...water but then the fire version is the same looking just red instead of blue. It's strange. Maybe change up how they look a bit more like in Pokemon with all of eevee evolutions. But then again it's a free game and I have been having a blast playing it. Thank you.

As a beginner in the game, all the interaction menus and stuff you need to get to, or just wanna check out, take way to long to get to, as they're complicated and hold a lot of the game in them. It'd be great if there were an easier way to figure out what they do, to get the most out of the game as a newbie, instead of going through 30 tutorials of their own to find out. Otherwise, I love the gameplay, characters, and art. Great game all in all.

It's nice overall. But you gotta spend a lot if you want 5 star units. I already did 3-4 600 gem summons and everytime they just give you 1 4stars unit the rest are 2 and 3 stars even when they say 'chances up'.

Please fix the constant crashing during clan battles. Other than that its a wonderful games. Also it's becomes harder get gold as you level up which sucks. I love the game. Cute astromon, Wonderful evolutions, and even a nice story!

so I have been playing this game for awhile now and the only major flaw I have found is that if you choose to pay for astrogems they are ridiculous expensive for pretty much nothing. I understand it is probably so it doesn't come as a pay to win game but ya. Also I wish appearance rates for rares and up for better.  I love this game. Really not an understatement. It's the perfect time killer and for me I doesn't get old. The only thing I would change is on the hard and extreme levels I wouldn't have the astromon revert to their original forms after you catch them.

There is no other game that I have ever found quite like Monster Super League. It's fun to play, the monsters have great designs, and while spending real world money is an option, it's not required to progress. And progressing without spending money is easy. I wish there were more games like this one out there.

descriptionHTML:
# Adventure with the Astromons!
Monster Super League summons you to the fantasy world of Astromons!
From cute to stylish, catch & collect monsters of all sizes and shapes!
Collect over 550 types of Astromon in Monster Super League!

# I Choose You!
Catch wild Astromons out there in the field, or summon them by hatching the mysterious eggs!
Collect & evolve your favorite Astromons!

# Evolve and Grow!
Your Astromons will evolve to change in looks and gain additional skills.
Sometimes, they will evolve into very rare variants with even more power!

# Strategic Combat!
Even the same Astromons can differ by attributes & combat style.
Build your team to adventure through over 100 stages in various natural environments!

# Populate your Airship!
Astromons you catch & summon get to live on your airship.
Sometimes you might even have a surprise visitor!

# Socialize with friends!
Summon your friends from all around the world to chat and exchange gifts and tips!

# Become stronger in your own way!
Collect Astromons with different attributes to build your own best team.
Grow your Astromons faster by feeding fruits, and unlock additional powers with special runes!

# Immersive Content!
Dive deep into the story of Astromons through 8 different regions!
Challenge yourself in daily Dungeons for better rewards!
Battle against other players in the Astromon League!

comments: I've been playing this game, since it came out. I love it the same as I did then to now. This game does allow f2p to challenger some p2p as well. Sure there is a point where there is a wall, but at least you know your one of the strongest. Plus it makes me want to climb that wall, and topple whales.

Maybe one of the best games that still let you play to win. You can get everything with enough patience and a little luck. If you do want to pay though, it's gonna be pretty expensive and the stuff you get does not really let you advance a lot (unless you actually spend A LOT of money).

+ Easy to play + Good story line + Also easy to get the items + I like the game mechanic  - Need more challenging on battle - Need table of hero type - Inventory items don't include the gear being use  Overall i like this game, very good. Also, more hero will make this game more good. And... adding charge chain attack will be awesome  Edit: After update my account was lost, please fix it

This game is great. It doesnt beat you over the head with paywalls, you could probably play f2p and still have a ton of fun. Graphics are good and mechanics are deep and satisfying. Only complaint is the reddit coommunity, but cant blame the devs for that.

Previous rating was üëçüëç. Now üëç.  Content drought at the end of the game with some very expensive in app purchases. End game is killing the same dragon or farming the same level over and over and over...there are daily tasks which are a chore. Hoping for quality of life improvements similar to what the reddit suggests.   I really like the art style.

Great game with the most responsive and generous developers.  The only thing bad about this game is the toxic gaming community.  Full of unjustifiable whiners who are so poor they need their freebies for EVERY event or else they have a hissy fit and threaten to quit game AND also cry koz of nerfs on their heroes and threaten to quit(but really don't). They also attack every person who does spend for the game (casual spender or whale) God-forbid the devs need to also earn for a living.

comments: I have 89 power ups and cannot use them. This is the most ridiculous thing I have ever seen in a bingo game, it's cheating. Ok so they put up power ups that I don't have and want me to buy them.Here's the kicker, if I don't buy them it stays up the whole game and doesn't let me use the ones I have!!!!! Ahhh greed! What a joke. Absolutely unfair. I've never seen anything like it. So so sad. And now since the new update it takes way too long to level up!! They just more greedy with each update. Again, so, so sad.
Pricey to play on a consistent basis. Also at last number called, give us a second or so to touch screen. Lost many BINGO's that way. Makes it seem unfair to me...

descriptionHTML:
The year is 3666. The Earth's Empire extends over hundreds of worlds. Peace is kept by the mighty star fleet and the secret Order of the Keepers. You are in command of a strong team of Keepers and mercenaries tasked to fight invaders and recover fragments of a powerful weapon scattered across the galaxy.

Galaxy Rangers is a brand new online strategy game that drops you in the heat of battle and let’s you decide on combat tactics and battle formations. Build a powerful army with hundreds of units and dive into the heat of battle!

FEATURES:
● TACTICS AND FORMATIONS - Devise unique tactics and create destructive combat formations.
● ACTION-PACKED BATTLES - Watch your tactics play out and trigger special skills in intense battles.
● A POWERFUL ARMY AT YOUR ORDERS - Unlock and upgrade units to create a powerful battle force.
● EXPLORE THE GALAXY - Complete missions to discover new worlds, defeat alien bosses and progress in the story.
● ENGAGE IN ONLINE BATTLES - Challenge other players in 1on1 destructive battles.
● JOIN CORPORATIONS - Unite forces with friends in corporations to rule the galaxy.
developerAddress: Moscow
recentChanges: Bug fixes.
summary: Command a powerful army in action-packed intergalactic battles!
title: Galaxy Heroes: Space Wars

descriptionHTML:
Mahjong City Tours = Classic Mahjong + new puzzles + explore the world's best cities!

If you love puzzle, strategy, memory, and brain training challenges, you’ll love Mah-jong!

The innovative new version of Mahjong Solitaire. Explore the world's best cities as you tackle challenging puzzles. Power-ups and obstacles provide an unexpected twist to every level. Play and relax!

Features:
▶ Stunning graphics and unique Mahjong gameplay.
▶ Go on a treasure quest for the best souveniers!
▶ Win huge prizes in the weekly tournaments!
▶ New goals, power-ups, and obstacles give Mahjongg a whole new twist!
▶ Play with friends and other city travelers and enjoy your Mahjong journey together!
▶ Great fit for players who love games like jigsaw puzzles, mayong, word search, solitaire, match-3 and other ‘smart games’.
▶ A fantastic journey with over 1000+ levels!
▶ Get your own collection of beautiful tile sets for endless matching fun!
▶ Supports offline play on your own long flights and trips.
▶ Playing with others does not require Facebook Login!
▶ Free with regular updates!

Mahjong City Tours will keep you guessing - and matching - forever!

comments: Love the fact that you can now try that move you didn't understand why SiFi didn't make. It is fun and realistic enough. I didn't give it a 5 stars because of some of the programing actions available. The waypoints are sometimes more trouble than they are worth. The programmation is limited to 24 hrs. A ruler would be very useful for projections over 24 hrs. But I am enjoying myself, even if my wife doesn't understand why I should wake up at 4 am to check my course.

A good improvement. My only beef is it cost money to change your boat colour. Be prepared to spend if you need to win. Find a few friends to race against and have fun without spending. Since last update keeps eating auto sail cards but only stays on for a few mimutes

Getting close to perfection, need to keep the update of wind to closer to ugrib actual, but very happy with true effect and updates, like the new features of wind display, much better for present and future course determination.  Please look to make driving dial a bit larger, and a bit less sensitive, and possibly a 1 degree up or down feature, like the arrows  but a +1 or minus 1, as feature on present dial is too sensitive and does not adjust so refined.  From a Canadian point of view, can you look to include some races like Vic-maui, Transpac or even more amazing and local to west coast of North America, races such as Swiftsure or Southern Straights... short but very technically sweet races that are very challenging.
Shame you can buy your way to the front of the fleet otherwise good fun.  So I have crossed the finish line 3 time but just keeps saying I have run aground ?? Hopeless

Is lots of fun and surprisingly addictive.  I do mostly just the Volvo Ocean Race.  Would be nice to have an option to overlay exclusion zones.  Don't need to be enforceable, but more fun for those trying to beat the actual fleet.
Great game, but I do get frustrated by it saying wrong sail, after I close the app, and after setting the sail properly.
description: Skipper your own boat all around the world in the most famous sailing races (the Volvo Ocean Race, Vend√©e Globe, Transat Jacques Vabre, Fastnet, Rolex Sydney Hobart Yacht Race, Route du Rhum, Clipper RTW and lots of others). Race against hundreds of thousands of rivals in real time.HOW TO PLAY :‚Ä¢ Be at the helm of your virtual boat and start at the same time than the real skippers. ‚Ä¢ Use the real weather forecasts as a fine tactician.‚Ä¢ Fine tune your sails to real weather conditions.‚Ä¢ Set your course to ride the weather.‚Ä¢ Follow your boat everywhere on your mobile and tablet.THE VIRTUAL REGATTA COMMUNITY :‚Ä¢ By sailing on Virtual Regatta, you are entering the world‚Äôs largest sailing community, with more than a million active gamers.‚Ä¢ The most famous virtual races bring together several hundreds of thousands of players!‚Ä¢ Sail with the best! descriptionHTML:
Skipper your own boat all around the world in the most famous sailing races (the Volvo Ocean Race, Vendée Globe, Transat Jacques Vabre, Fastnet, Rolex Sydney Hobart Yacht Race, Route du Rhum, Clipper RTW and lots of others). Race against hundreds of thousands of rivals in real time.

HOW TO PLAY :

• Be at the helm of your virtual boat and start at the same time than the real skippers.
• Use the real weather forecasts as a fine tactician.
• Fine tune your sails to real weather conditions.
• Set your course to ride the weather.
• Follow your boat everywhere on your mobile and tablet.

THE VIRTUAL REGATTA COMMUNITY :

• By sailing on Virtual Regatta, you are entering the world’s largest sailing community, with more than a million active gamers.
• The most famous virtual races bring together several hundreds of thousands of players!
• Sail with the best! The greatest international skippers endorse Virtual Regatta.

comments: I'm a big mahjong player and this game is like mahjong on crack. i definitely recommend it to my fellow mahjong nerds. it's awesome with how many levels there are and boosters and achievements and the whole shebang. not just a regular mahjong game where you can only play the game and nothing more. if you like the whole saving up crystals and buying boosters and earning achievements jawn, then you'll love this game. side note, I also have not spent real life money on this game mostly because I don't need to. I usually will buy stuff for games only because I use the money I get from my Google rewards app cause that money goes straight into my Google play account. so it's not that I'm anti spending money on games, but I haven't yet felt like I needed to. it's not one of those where you need to spend money to have it be fun at all (well, not yet anyway! hopefully that won't change) or to be able to get past a certain point. so I totally recommend this to all my mahjong nerd brothers and sisters!

It is a shame that this game allows one to start a new mod and a day or two later sends the player back to the original mod to collect hats, lanterns or eggs. A more polite end to an uncompleted game would be "Try Again!" rather than "You lose!" This the most rude end that I have seen on any of these games.

So far its good! Just wish you would not link all your games like you do it bogs the games down. And wish you would fix it so that if you had a game several years ago in which you used your email address you could reuse it even if you can't remember your password

A different spin on the classic MahJong game. It's fast-paced  and sometimes it doesn't respond as quick as I  would like. I wish the game would allow just a little more time because it is difficult to see the different levels to find all the matching tiles.

I love this game. However I do have problems with the loading. It says there is no internet connection which is not true. I have fast ADSL and it is connected all the time. Why don't I have problems with other games then? They all work perfectly. Please look into this matter. Thanking you.

I paid 1.99 for 40 eggs and game earned the other 5... and the "unique prize" was 5 gems.... I would think it would be something a little more...idk just more. Other than that, the game is awesome. Love the whole idea. Levels, like any other of the "saga" games with mahjong.

descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers!

Embark on a magical journey in this addictive Mahjong Solitaire adventure!

Enjoy a new take on Mahjong Shanghai as you help a young girl and her grandfather traverse the globe in search of her lost parents. Make your way by pairing tiles in order to dismantle hundreds of layouts. Collect achievements for special accomplishments while taking advantage of innovative gameplay twists like Shuffle, which allows you to get out of a difficult situation, or Firecracker, a tool for blowing up multiple pairs of tiles. Visit the Forbidden City, Virupaksha Temple, the Taj Mahal and the famous Mount Fuji as you fulfill challenging quests and earn gold stars for completing levels as fast as you can!

While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

● Master over 1100 immersive levels (with hundreds more coming in free updates)
● Match 1134 types of tiles in 27 different tile sets (with more coming in free updates)
● Earn over 40 desirable achievements and utilize four groundbreaking power-ups
● Enjoy gorgeous graphics, rich sounds and regular free updates with new levels, tile sets and more
● Google Play game services support
______________________________

COMPATIBILITY NOTES: This game performs best on high-end smartphones and tablets.
______________________________

This is a "slot," which appeals to those who also enjoy a nether-universe of of scifi/fantasu. Its visually appealing, as well as, fun!!!! An AWESOME SITE!!!

Yes it looks and sounds amazing. But short of that, this slot game is completely unremarkable. Just like every other slot game out there, wins are few and far between. The hourly bonus is weak aswel. When you're at a level that requires you to max bet (25000000 or more) and you win 1000000 on the hour bonus and have nothing in the credit meter due to the lack of free spins and no bonuses, it becomes very frustrating. Assemble an army of faithful warriors in gleaming armor. Create a powerful Order and demonstrate your might to players from all over the world. Glorious victories in bloody battles for supremacy in the Kingdom and the brutal struggle for the ancient Throne are just a small part of all the adventures that await you in the lands of fearless rulers.From the moment you begin the game, the atmosphere of a medieval town in an expansive Kingdom, courageous marches, battles and ancient riches will take you on an unforgettable journey. My Lord, your vassals are waiting for your orders!Throne: Kingdom at War is free to play. You can purchase in-game currency in exchange for real money. descriptionHTML:
We welcome you to the legendary world of wise Kings, great Lords and valiant Heroes. Walk the exciting path of a city builder and warlord! Assemble an army of faithful warriors in gleaming armor. Create a powerful Order and demonstrate your might to players from all over the world. Glorious victories in bloody battles for supremacy in the Kingdom and the brutal struggle for the ancient Throne are just a small part of all the adventures that await you in the lands of fearless rulers.

From the moment you begin the game, the atmosphere of a medieval town in an expansive Kingdom, courageous marches, battles and ancient riches will take you on an unforgettable journey. My Lord, your vassals are waiting for your orders!

Throne: Kingdom at War is free to play. You can purchase in-game currency in exchange for real money. It gives you the ability to buy various boosts and items that will make your gaming experience more dynamic and exciting. If you want to switch off this option, you can set a password in the Google Play Store menu to prevent any unwanted purchases.

Game features:
- Access to a completely free mode
- High-grade graphics and sound
- Localization into multiple languages
- You can create your own Order or join an existing one
- Dynamic real-time battles with players from all over the world
- Several troop classes to choose from: knights, spearmen, ranged, cavalry, siege, scouts
- Armor, weapons and other equipment crafting for your Hero
- Numerous quests and errands with valuable rewards

We are constantly improving the app, making it better and more entertaining. You also can help us sending your feedback and suggestions.

You are a vampire hunter who is about to head to Idra Forest with your partner wolf.
The forest is believed to be where the vampire castle is.
Your mission is to visit this castle in order to save the village people.
Can you complete the mission without being consumed by vampires?



You are a witch who is led to Idra Forest by a mysteriously beautiful melody.
You soon find yourself at a hotel named Libra Sincera, where you are turned into a vampire.
A black cat comes to tell you that you have only 10 days to find the rose garden, whose roses can turn you back to human.
What's their motives? And can you go back to your normal life?

comments: I had to do this for a Tapjoy thing and I spent ALL DAY trying to get past stages. They are way too difficult before 100, that shouldn't be. Normally, I tough it out with offers but this one is not worth it even if it's 200 points. This game is UPSETTING

Over engineered upgrades which are clearly done as a gold mine for DroidHen. Result is you either pay to win or massive grind. Defender II was more balenced in this regard but still a huge grind too. I think World Raid is a myth since it has never worked. It apperently lasts about 30 second but I don't know since it mostly throws an error. I've gotten in twice and it immediately goes to Stage Cleared with >97% beast life left.

Bug that you have to wait endlessly to enter daily raid seems to be partially fixed. But: 1. Raid is even more fraudulent than before...no mattet you defense, dragon will one hit you. Fraud, there is no reason for a mechanic you cannot do anything about except exploitation! 2. I have all the upgrades and do pretty much max dmg, but there seem to be people out there that do 20 times the amount I do...except they don't, because they simply DO NOT EXIST!!! AS IN BATTLE MODE THEY ARE SIMPLY MADE UP BY THE DEVS! THEY ARE NOT ACTUALLY REAL PLAYERS!!! 3. The skill that decreases % of all dmg does not do so...it virtually does not reduce damage at all, but still it costs 50 crystals per % point. Also fraud! 4. You pay for somethin but you cannot keep it. If you change your phone, everything is lost forever! This is criminal behaviour! CONCLUSION: Probably the most fraudulent and criminal organisation out there. BEWARE AND DO NOT INSTALL, AND FOR CHRISTS SAKE, DON'T SPEND MONEY ON IT!!!
Great game. Was able to transfer data when I upgraded my phone. Simply and easy. Just sync with a FB account and load saved. Great time killer. Just need a better method for material farming
Great time killer.  Love the game play.

description: The Monsters are Back! Calling all warriors to lead your nation and defend your preciouskingdom! comments: After the latest update, I've only gotten one set of daily quests which populated right after the update. After that, I haven't received any additional daily quest where I can win some gems. Why is that? Now the only way for me to earn more gems os through the free gems  (by watching adds), getting a high enough ranking in battlez, or buying them.

I think the new update is nice battlez is awesome and the good news is that my phone doesnt crashes anymore and when I played Inzanity it did'nt lag great rework but 1 question, WHY DID YOU REMOVE ULTIMATE BATTLE AND DEMONSTRATION MINI GAME THEMES TO EVERY WORLD?? Im sick of every level with just only themes

I think the new update is very cool. It adds some multiplayer into the game. When I heard of this new update I rushed to my phone and started playing. It turned out to be good I was happy and thought it would turn out well. Then after that I remembered pvz one. It's multiplayer mode was much better. One player would be plants and the other zombies. Why could they not have made that. It was such a good idea. I would personally play that mode more than this. But it's just my opinion. Thanks for reading.

Since last update it is very unstable and keeps crashing. Also every time i finish the last inzanity it crashes then once reloaded says expired so ive lost out. In fact im not that interested anymore. Im not a fan of battlez and it all seems geared to that now so had fun while it lasted.

I HATE YOUR UPDATE. Battlez mixed battle between players who bought plants with money with the players who don't is totally unfair. There are many players out there like me who play everyday collecting coins by coins and gems by gems patiently waiting for a good plant offer that we can buy with gems. Buying plants with money is not on the budget. I'm not angry. I'm sad. Because PVZ is always one of my top listed games. Now it's pathetic. Crashed. Unfair. Expensive.

Just like.But EA just want money right? You just wasting money.Money cause something bad.This wirld need to follow the truth path.Not money path.I dont like those plant,pinatas and more that need to buy with money.Useless.

descriptionHTML:
Play the award-winning hit action-strategy adventure where you meet, greet, and defeat legions of hilarious zombies from the dawn of time, to the end of days. Amass an army of amazing plants, supercharge them with Plant Food, and devise the ultimate plan to protect your brain.

100 Million Downloads – This app has received more than 100 million overall downloads.

DISCOVER HUNDREDS OF PLANTS AND ZOMBIES
Collect your favorite lawn legends, like Sunflower and Peashooter, along with hundreds of other horticultural hotshots, including creative bloomers like Lava Guava and Laser Bean. Go toe-to-missing-toe with a massive array of zombies at every turn, like Jetpack Zombie and Mermaid Imp – you’ll even have to protect your brain from rampant Zombie Chickens!

GROW POWERFUL PLANTS
Earn Seed Packets as you play and use them to fuel your plants like never before. Power up attacks, double-down defenses, speed up planting time, and even gain entirely new abilities. Boost your plants to ensure those zombies are lawn-gone!

With more than 300 levels, ultra-challenging endless zones, fun mini-games, and daily Piñata Party events, there’s always a new challenge to complete. Plus, ready your best defenses – Dr. Zomboss is waiting to take you on at the end of every world!

comments: I love this game. It's very dynamic and the gameplay is good too. The only problem I have is every single time I do PvP... It pairs me with an opponent far greater than what I can hope to beat. Sure, that's great for improving, but it disheartens me and makes me feel like a horrible player when I can't even beat ONE PvP opponent, ever, while playing the game. I would suggest to the devs that the matching system be a little more flexible when pairing. Give us a matching system that will actually give us lesser prepared players too so we can have the fun of winning, as well. Also, I am disconnected every single time I do PvP battles and bounties. Quite unstable, unfortunately.

Amazing shooter game, awesome hero collecting game, great multiplayer game. Definitely suggest that you at least try it out. But one thing you should look out for, it's pretty easy to sink between 5 and 20 dollars a week into this. Sometimes even 40 to 60. But, it's pretty free-to-play friendly if you can't afford to buy some gold.

I really like the game. It's fun and has enough activities and quests to keep you occupied for a while. My only complaint is how they match people up for the PVP missions. Sometimes you get matched up with people with far higher power and Team level menu which makes it nearly impossible to win. other than that I really enjoy the game

Super fun game. I haven't got bored of the game because there's always events going on which is good. One of the better if not the best shooting game I've played. I think there is a slight glitch when using Steele. Sometimes after I activate his open fire skill he doesn't shoot when I press the shoot button.

Latest update definitely made the game harder. I used to run 4 gauntlet levels with little issue but now I can't get through 1 without losing people. Resurrected characters are completely unwelcome and unfair in pvp when you tell on kills for money. Probably going to uninstall, you're welcome for the money Hothead

Starts off ok but then the pay walls creep in and you are constantly bombarded with prompts to spend money. The PVP is absolutely pointless, highest power rating wins every time without exception so you know if you've won or lost as soon as it picks an opponent. Needs a lot of work before I'd consider dropping any real money on it.

comments: If you want to spend a lot of time and money only to be endlessly attacked and pillaged by players that are 2-3x your strength, then this is the game for you!   and now whole guilds can hasn't up on you!   Sounds fun, huh?  While the graphics and general gameplay are ok, more and more, its becoming pure pay to win, fighting is way out of balance.  I wound recommend this game until they fix it.

This game has a great concept. But unless you can buy multiple things through the game you get nowhere. You can build up all you want but during certain events you go into the nagative. There is no gamemanship in it just money.

Game play sucks. There is no true info to what you really want ro know about this game or on the net. No way to defend yourself solo. Unless your an idiot and spend money on free, I would not waste time on this game. Ember needs to patch a whole bunch of problems with this game. The game will most of the time always crash when you go to adventure mode or to the dungeons. Look else where, don't waste your time on this one!

It is definitely a money game, it is for people who can afford to spend money to gain the power rule and do away with the ones that can't. It glitches a lot and support will not respond. If they do, its a standard letter that may or may not answer what you are asking. Hmmm maybe a computer.  I dropped down to a 1 they continue to lag, the last 4 heros you have to buy. Instead of fixing the problems,  they are just making sure people who just want to play have fun and spend small amounts of money will be eliminated.  I know of 2 realms that are already dead. There are only 5 realms, this should tell you something. Unless you can afford to put the price of a house into this game, it wont be fun for you. It has now gone to bullying people into leaving the game, you complain  support ignore these complaints  yes war game, bully no 7/24 ke cant farm, cant grow without permission of the bullys and developers  dont care so sad

This game should look after games like lord mobile or Vikings clan war  They add option little by little to become more like them If they do that fast enough then this game is great  I prefer some thing more on this game like troop level 5 Alllll game like this has only t4 Be normal and Do something more then normal to gain more fan

Not telling you where an attack came from has ruined an already flawed game.  Definite glass ceiling to it.  Is fun until level 35, then it just feels like you are stuck in mud with random folks destroying your castle.

comments: Awesome game with a cool soundtrack, the gameplay itself isn't too challenging and has room for strategy. The only downside as far as I can tell is the terrible multiplayer system which doesn't even work most of the time. But overall this game is a great time waster and very enjoyable.

Good graphics. Good units. Awesome skills. Nice drawings. All in all, this is a really good game üòÅüëçüëåBut I have a problem. It keeps stopping everytime I open it. And I've also been addicted to this game for more than a month now üòÑ

It's been a year since I've last played this, still fun. I've been playing this from day to night as far as I could remember. Hopefully, the bugs where the downloading restarts are solved. Nice Gameply as ever, getting hooked to this once again.

This game is fun and addictive. I like that you don't have to work very hard to get decent leveled characters, and having everyone be overpowered makes the game fun. My only problem is how multiplayer is a little wonky sometimes, mainly when the app suddenly freezes during a battle.

Feels satisfying and stress-free , cute characters too. I just have one problem, when it gives me a notifications of free polygons or similar to that, I go check but I don't get anything. There appears nothing in my giftbox.

Great graphics and music and very f2p friendly for a gachapon game. Lots of banners with guaranteed top tier units so if you follow the Discord or Reddit community's advice on when to pull, you can make the free gems go a long way. The more characters you have, the more quests you can do to get more characters, so it may seem slow in the beginning but eventually your character collection will snowball until you have more waifus than you know what to do with!

descriptionHTML:
Play the smash hit that’s been downloaded over 8 million times!
Fun and intuitive! Multiplayer or Solo, an addicting Puzzle RPG with a twist.

THE ULTIMATE MATCH ‘N SMASH GAME
Simply tap the screen to instantly connect and smash panel pieces. Connect up to six pieces for a devastating Crash Panel. Smash enough pieces to unleash a Fever Attack. That’s Crash Fever!

JOIN THE MULTIPLAYER PARTY!
Play solo or join the party with worldwide co-op multiplayer action. Go on quests as a team. Work together, strategize and attack! Exchange IDs with friends, and share characters with other players. Social features help you feel a part of the active Crash Fever community.

EXHILARATING CHALLENGES. THE FUN DOESN’T STOP!
A simple twist on match-style gameplay cascading with fun. Take on regular quests, or try your hand at a variety of challenges. With Crash Fever you can always find new challenges, limited event quests, fun daily quests and more each week.

A PUZZLE GAME WITH CHARACTER
Collect, enhance, and awaken legions of units, build your own party and embark on fantastic quests in an anime-inspired virtual world. Then discover the mysteries of the Hatcher, filled with powerful Ultra Rare units and more.

FEATURES
• Simple one-tap controls let you quickly link pieces together or unleash a barrage of bombs.
• Regular quests, limited event quests plus much more each week.
• Solo or Co-op multiplayer action with up to four players. Work together, strategize and attack!
• A fun-loving community of players! Join and invite friends or a meet new ones on quests.
• Collect, enhance and awaken your characters to build the ultimate party.
• Build teams with Demon, Samurai, Dragon, Mech, Fantasy tribe units and more.
• Complete Weekly and Special Missions for exciting bonuses.
• Unleash panel-shattering chain reactions, over-the-top animations, and frantic Fever Mode!
• Addictive puzzle and role-playing fun. Match ‘em and smash ‘em!

NOTE: Crash Fever is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. A stable network connection is required to play.

Follow Us
Like the official Crash Fever Facebook page to keep up with the latest news.
https://www.facebook.com/CrashFeverEN/

comments: This is just amazing! Once you get started it gets a little tough, but you can have other people help you if your stuck. I love the easy gameplay and the graphics, The only problem I have with it is how hard I is to get ninja pearls without money, I'm young and dont have a credit card or job yet so I miss quite a few opportunities. I highly recommend to any Naruto fans.

This game is very great and can be addicting. The only problem u have is that when ever I try to play a mission it always says there is a communication error. I would really like to keep playing the game, so if there is anything you could do about it- that would be great.

your servers are bad.. trying to hunt Chino but 2 times already when we finish the last map and i see the yellow card of the last boss, then i get connection lost and don't get a thing in the end.. it is really frustrating to play for 15 minutes, see your goal fulfilled but then.. nooooo, you don't get the cards in the end

I love the game, but during multi-player, especially in impact missions, let us continue even if player 1 gives up. It's extremely annoying when you play to the boss, and their hp is very low,  and player 1 leaves and all that time was for nothing. Let player 2 and 3 continue, even if player 1 and 3 or 1 and 2 quit, let that last player control the other two. That's the only improvement I can think of for the next update.

I'm only putting it as one star in hopes the devs see this, but please find a better way to recover accounts. I've been a fan of this game for years and when I logged in I was logged out, I have no idea what my transfer info is because I've only had to do that once. I don't want to just start over, please find a better way for people to get their accounts back once your update logs them out.
It's not the best game but because I am a fan of naruto my interest in this game might be different than others would think. Overall its a decent mobile game but it could use some more improvements.

descriptionHTML:
NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja Blazing – Join the battle with your favorite NARUTO characters, fighting in Shinobi Formation Battles across the story of the renowned anime!

Fight hordes of enemies and complete missions using the all-new Shinobi Formation Battle system: a strategic RPG fighting system that unleashes exhilarating combination attacks with your allies. Master team field skills, discover new ninjutsu and become the next Hokage in the first-ever Ultimate Ninja mobile game!

NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja Blazing Features:

Battle Enemies with Your Ninja Dream Team!
• Control over 100 NARUTO heroes, each with their own unique attacks and tactics
• Fight enemies using ninjutsu, powerful special techniques and combination attacks
• Unleash ninjutsu abilities for powerful offensive strikes, defensive abilities that can stop enemy movement, and more

Mission Mode Based On the Original Anime Storyline!
• Mission Mode allows you to relive the experience of the NARUTO story
• Battle through stories from the original series

Ninja Skills and Powerful Attacks!
• Fighting skills include close-ranged and combination attacks for massive damage
• Ninja Field Skills can turn the tide of battle in your favor
• Fighting closely with your team allows for great opportunity, but also great risk

Fight Ninjas from Around the World in Online Multiplayer Games!
• Battle against other ninjas in multiplayer mode
• Join together and take on missions with up to 3 other ninjas

New Games in Monthly Phantom Castle Events!
• Compete against other ninjas for the most points and aim for the top in a special mode that can only be accessed during special events
• Battle against a multitude of enemies that await you as you climb the Phantom Castle

Join the battle with your favorite NARUTO characters! Download NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja Blazing now and become the next Hokage!

I Folloewd all of the list the developer told me to do now I lost my game all everything I have done the loss of alot of real money an still have got refund or info how to. I loved this game. I will update my review with 5 stars when the game us updated again to the way it was.

description: The Tribez is not just a game where you build a farm! The Tribez is an adventure where you travel to a distant past full of secrets, mysteries, and many hours of addictive exploration of an unknown, but beautiful world!  You are invited to visit a primitive world inhabited by a peace-loving people, who have been hidden beyond a miles-deep portal from time immemorial. Build your own stone-age village, explore territorieshidden by mountains and seas, farm fertile lands, and lead your tribe, which considers you sent by the gods, to prosperity.  The Tribez is a world in which you feel alive!REVIEWS:‚ÄòThe Tribez‚Äô is the insanely popular empire-building game that‚Äôs revolutionizing the idea of social gaming.‚Äô (http://www.thedailybeast.com/) ‚ÄòThe design is so beautiful and there is so much detail that it's a real pleasure to navigate through the scenes and help the villagers.‚Äô (http://www.appszoom.com) ‚ÄòWhat makes The Tribez genuinely pleasant to play is the attention paid to the graphics.‚Äô (http://www.gamezebo.com)KEY FEATURES:‚úî This game works when you‚Äôre offline too ‚Äì play it on a plane, in the subway or in the car. Enjoy! ‚úî Simple, intuitive controls. ‚úî Adorable characters you‚Äôll love! Meet the farmer, the builder, the tax collector, and many others!‚úî A beautiful vibrant world you'll be immersed into instantly.‚úî Lively animations make the prehistoric world come to life. You‚Äôll be mesmerized by how the crops growon the farm and how the builders work on construction sites.‚úî Tons of items, characters, buildings, and decorations.‚úî Truly inexhaustible possibilities to develop your own stone-age empire by producing goods, increasingyour population, expanding your borders and attempting to farm the best lands.‚úî Hundreds of captivating quests: search for treasure and artifacts, discover distant islands, explore mysterious caves, grow unusual crops on your farm, and much, much more!The game uses in-app purchases. In-app purchases can speed up gameplay. descriptionHTML:
The Tribez is not just a game where you build a farm! The Tribez is an adventure where you travel to a distant past full of secrets, mysteries, and many hours of addictive exploration of an unknown, but beautiful world! You are invited to visit a primitive world inhabited by a peace-loving people, who have been hidden beyond a miles-deep portal from time immemorial. Build your own stone-age village, explore territorieshidden by mountains and seas, farm fertile lands, and lead your tribe, which considers you sent by the gods, to prosperity. The Tribez is a world in which you feel alive!

REVIEWS:
‘The Tribez’ is the insanely popular empire-building game that’s revolutionizing the idea of social gaming.’ (http://www.thedailybeast.com/)
‘The design is so beautiful and there is so much detail that it's a real pleasure to navigate through the scenes and help the villagers.’ (http://www.appszoom.com)
‘What makes The Tribez genuinely pleasant to play is the attention paid to the graphics.’ (http://www.gamezebo.com)

KEY FEATURES:
✔ This game works when you’re offline too – play it on a plane, in the subway or in the car. Enjoy!
✔ Simple, intuitive controls.
✔ Adorable characters you’ll love! Meet the farmer, the builder, the tax collector, and many others!
✔ A beautiful vibrant world you'll be immersed into instantly.
✔ Lively animations make the prehistoric world come to life. You’ll be mesmerized by how the crops growon the farm and how the builders work on construction sites.
✔ Tons of items, characters, buildings, and decorations.
✔ Truly inexhaustible possibilities to develop your own stone-age empire by producing goods, increasingyour population, expanding your borders and attempting to farm the best lands.
✔ Hundreds of captivating quests: search for treasure and artifacts, discover distant islands, explore mysterious caves, grow unusual crops on your farm, and much, much more!

The game uses in-app purchases. In-app purchases can speed up gameplay.

description: Players are beckoned by exciting, active action RPG in which you can immerse yourself in. The plot of the heroic online game consists of fierce fightings between opposing sides. Battles on the Arena in the Coliseum of Thrones will not let you get bored, because you will be taking part in unexpected breathtaking battles. If you are not a pro in such dangerous combats, you can start polish your skills raiding Knights, fighting Orcs, Dragons and defeating looting merchant. Our strategy RPG has everything players need. The game requires internet access, so you can play this online game in any place where there is an Internet connection. Fascinating world of this role-playing game is constantly updated with new and exciting events. Every monster in the game is completely unique and interesting. The feature of the game is the ability to talk to other players in the chat in real time so you can enjoy communication as well. Destroyers of Darkness is a world of bright colors, all possible battle in PVP, simple and intuitive interface, great quests and other things that will not let you get bored. Fascinating world is open to everyone and if you want to leave your name in the history of online games you would better start playing with us right now!

comments: Love this game but when you are competing with SWGOH for mobile SW content I expect it to be better end game and more Special events. At lvl 8 and there's no more rewards or incentives , so I guess I'm done.   Also, As a busy person I have limited time to play and taking the entire game offline for maintenance, like right now is not a good way to keep me interested.  Dumb move devs.   Edit: good job with update but still need light and dark missions past level 7

You should be matched with someone in your Tier, not 4 Tiers above you. When you play against fellow Guild Members you shouldn't have your levels edited. There should be an option to leave matches during the match. It doesn't make sense to lose because you had something else to do. And here's my biggest problem "Oh hey, you won that match, here's 30 points." "Oh you lost that match? Lemme just have 51 points from you." It also doesn't make sense to have heroes with blasters against melee heroes. They end up at a disadvantage.  Fot example, I was just matched with a level 3 Kylo Ren, as a level One Padme. Sooo fair.

First the unbalance between the factions. Now the match making.. Are you folks fckng serious about it? Your matching a lvl 11 to 13 or 14? How could I win with my lvl 10 troops vs lvl 15 troops? No matter which side I play.. I have a lvl 3 hux and your great system matches me to a lvl 5 anakin with lvl 13 af walkers? Tell me this is a joke.

Won't let me put cards down at mid Battle again and again. Connection will slow you down not your opponent it seems run into this issue way to much. Then issues like won't let you move or play anything but energy goes up

Absolutely love this game. As a life-long Star Wars fan this ticks NEARLY all of the boxes. However, there is one thing that bothers me, hence the "nearly". And that is the matchmaking. I'm in tier 5 division 3, and for some reason it decides to pick a person from tier 7 division 2. Of course, I lost because it's unfair. Please sort this out.

My favorite game on mobile right now. It's a mix between a MOBA(League of Legends)  and Clash Royale. You control a hero AND manually deploy different troops in your lane. I've never spent a dime and own all the heroes in game so it is not really pay to win at all. All around great game.

descriptionHTML:
In Star Wars™: Force Arena, players will fight in some of the most intense real-time multiplayer battles in the galaxy!

Lead your own customized squad of Star Wars™ units into intense action-packed skirmishes requiring both elevated strategy and direct control.

Unleash powerful abilities that can single-handedly turn the tide of battle as you deploy a wide array of special cards to reach your ultimate goal: the destruction of your opponent’s shield generator.

Star Wars™: Force Arena seamlessly blends a robust character collection system, advanced upgrades, and intuitive touch controls to deliver the ultimate mobile gaming experience.

Lead your squad. Master the arena!


● BATTLE or join forces with other players and friends from around the globe in real-time 1v1 or 2v2 PvP arena battles.

●LEAD a team of iconic Star Wars™ troops, including Darth Vader, Luke Skywalker, General Grievous, Han Solo, Princess Leia, and even new Star Wars™: The Last Jedi characters such as Rey and Kylo Ren!

● COLLECT character cards and upgrade your favorites Star Wars™ units while leveraging powerful character duos that boost your effectiveness in battle.

● COMPETE to earn rewards, special characters and other bonus items by participating in events as you climb to the top of the leaderboards on your journey for galactic dominance!



※ This app offer in-app purchases. You can disable this feature by adjusting your device’s settings.

By downloading this game, you are agreeing to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 3 years of age to play.

comments: This game is so lopsided. Long losing streaks. Waiting for 1 card to make a good meld, meanwhile my opponent is pulling them out right and left. I can be 2 points away from winning and they just pull 2 melds out of their hat for a win. Uninstalling! Make your game fun.

So... if this isn't a scam... how can I quit a game before it's over and immediately be paired with the same opponent. Every time I've had an opponent drop out, it takes a few seconds to notify me they left the game. Every day a new reason to NOT pay a cent for this fraud. I play out of sheer boredom.

Players with higher ranks should not be able to play  against players that are lower rank with less experience. Plus the ring challenge if you don't reach  the 30000 you should get the amount that it stops on, instead of 1000 points.

Want to love this game, but it just constantly cheats!! It would be more enjoyable if you could have so many free plays per log in to just enjoy some play, like other games do. Instead you run out of gems right away after being cheated out of one or two games, which really stinks!!  I'm not paying through the nose just to enjoy playing a game. You are too greedy and a big fat CHEAT King and it has really disappointed me, because the game would be great fun if I could actually play it!!!

Uninstalling...too many hiccups! Costs too much too play a simple game of cards. This game is all about making a lot of money for 'King' corporation. Can't really say anything nice about this game. Pretty much agree with the reviews. (didn't even have installed for 24 hrs.)

I agree with the cheating and everything everyone else is talking about, but I also have a problem with the automatic card shuffle in the middle of your turn. Wait for the players turn to end, then shuffle.  I have lost several games because of this.  I now have a 3 lose rule because of the way this game messes with you and then I'm out and won't play for days or weeks, because I refuse to pay for a game that cheats.

descriptionHTML:
Play the traditional card game rummy with a multiplayer twist for mobile. Set over the rooftops of 1920’s London and hosted by a group of cats, we want you to join our club and play the world at cards!

Make your way through the card clubs of Lucky Lane and play against opponents from all over the world, in this brand new live player versus player game!

There’s no closing time, it's never too late and we’re always open for business with special live events over the weekends – download now for free, and play the world at cards with Shuffle Cats!


Shuffle Cats features:
· The classic card game updated for bite-sized fun on the go!
· Live, multiplayer games with people from around the world!
· Unlock new and exciting challenges that offer inventive ways to play.
· Boost your play by using Lucky Charms against your opponent.
· Intuitive and highly polished - card games never looked so good!
· Lighthearted interaction with other players, using fun chats and live card movement.
· Easily sync your progress between your phone and tablet devices.

If you love playing Candy Crush Soda Saga or Farm Heroes Saga or you love classic card games like rummy, whist and solitaire, download Shuffle Cats now and discover an exciting new way to play card games for free on your mobile!

Visit https://care.king.com/ if you need help!

Shuffle Cats does not offer “real money gambling” or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social gaming does not imply future success at “real money gambling”. Internet connection required. Shuffle Cats is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

comments: Used to be one of the best time management games available but they no longer fix the glitches.  There hasn't been any updates or new venues for a long time so think the game is being phased out. The game is free but you do need to buy gold with hard cash to progress. No longer worth downloading, my advice is to find something else to play.

It is an awesome game. It is very addictive and I feel very invested in it. If you don't want to spend any of your real money to buy gold, you sure don't need to. It takes a hell lot more to get everything you want but it's still playable. It has some bugs, sure, specially regarding your wireless connecting but it's nothing major. The levels are really hard sometimes but makes up for the good challenge. Thanks, devs, for the awesome game

I love this game. I play it almost everyday. The only thing I don't like is when you spend your supplies to play even when you win you still lose those supplies to play instead of keeping your supplies so you can continue to play on. Other then that. It's amazing. So download this app and have some fun today, tomorrow, or whenever you have some past time. Thanks Chef Ramsay.

I love the game. But there's some bug issues like   1) login to claim 10golds - didn't happen. Where'd the gold? 2) now I can't even login to social. It keep loading, then kinda leave it at that.   I would rate it 5 stars once this is resolved. It's really getting on my nerves.

Game could be cool but has way too much stuff crammed into the tiny screen of most phones. Graphics need to be simplified so that you can see things easier. Overall, the game freezes and crashes every time I try to play. Spend more time making this game stable and easy to see and it might be more fun.

Up until five days ago I wasn't having any problems with this game and I played it nearly everyday. Now I can open the app but nothing happens when I click on any part of the game. This has kept me from being able to do anything with the game for nearly a week. I've missed out on events and opportunities to move up on leaderboards. Please fix the app. I enjoy the game and I don't want to lose progress because of a technical error.

Make partnerships, upgrade buildings and grow ops, customize your city and become the biggest player in the dope world.Features:* New Feature: Enterprise! descriptionHTML:
Let's get growing! Enter the world of Hempire. Follow the story of Uncle Danny from small-time grower to plant business mogul. Make partnerships, upgrade buildings and grow ops, customize your city and become the biggest player in the dope world.

Features:
* New Feature: Enterprise! Customize Enterprises with 7 of your fellow Hemperors!
* Grow and customize popular plants from the classics like Northern Lights and Sour Diesel.
* Use the lab to breed and discover new strains and remain at the top of the industry.
* Craft extracts like shatter and oil, and edibles like cookies and brownies.
* Upgrade your grow op with new equipment, lights, and generators as your business grows.
* Complete deals with game characters to unlock new features and strains.
* Decorate your businesses with trees, items and vehicles from a dune buggy to race car.
* Generate huge cash by selling your custom products
* Invest your money in local businesses and real estate and develop your city.
* Start with one plant and grow your company into a billion dollar enterprise.
* Multiplayer Competition. The Hempire Cup: Compete against other players to breed the highest quality strain winning trophies in the Hempire Cup.

Grow your Hempire. Your potential is limitless.

Join us online:
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hempiregame
* Instagram: hempiregame
* Twitter: @HempireGame
* Website: http://hempiregame.com

Please note Hempire is a free-to-play experience, but some game items are available for purchase using real money. A network connection is also required.

descriptionHTML:
"Samurai Love Ballad: PARTY -Sengoku Princess-
Bring one of the most exciting periods of Japanese history to life with the latest romance app in the Voltage PARTY series!

◆Story◆

In the war-torn Sengoku Era...
To save your brother's life, you go to serve at the castle.

But...who would await you there but the samurai who would stop at nothing to rule Japan...!

Though both of you know death is waiting...

"I swear to protect you...on my sword, and on my very life itself..."

His hidden charms pull you into a desperate love of warring hearts!

Meet twelve brave samurai with their own passionate desires...

The love stories that will turn the tides of history...all start with you!

◆Meet the Samurai...◆

▼Oda Nobunaga

"I'll show you all...my divine rule."

Ruthless, cold, and filled with righteous anger,
Lord Nobunaga strikes fear in the hearts of men.
But will the heart of a woman bring out something more...?
--------------------------
▼Akechi Mitsuhide

"Even if it costs me everything...I will have you..."

Loyal to Lord Nobunaga, but kind to a fault.
Regarded as the perfect samurai...but will he be a perfect love?
--------------------------
▼Sanada Yukimura

"I swore to protect all those worth protecting...with my life."

His blade turns the tides of Fate in battle.
But, it is said that his true weakness lies in the hearts of women...
--------------------------
▼Kirigakure Saizo

"Protecting you happens to be my job."

The capricious heart of a man who will do anything for money...
...carries the dark secrets of the ninja...
--------------------------

More characters to come!!

--------------------------
▼The One-Eyed Dragon: Date Masamune
"Women? Never much cared for them..."

▼The Dragon's Claws: Katakura Kojuro
"You will find no happiness at my side. Are you content with that?"

▼The Miracle of Sengoku: Toyotomi Hideyoshi
"I fight because you care enough to see me home."

▼The Spear of Sengoku: Maeda Toshiie
"When the chaos is over...I will tell you everything."

▼The Archer of Tokai: Tokugawa Ieyasu
"I will show you that you are nothing but my pawn."

▼The Fox of Sawayama: Ishida Mitsunari
"Say nothing, lest you ask for death."

▼The God of Samurai: Uesugi Kenshin
"I will bring carnage down upon whomever I must...if it is to keep you safe.”

▼The Tiger of Kai: Takeda Shingen
"As long as you are with me, I will never die."

◆How to Play◆
１．Install the app and start a new game
２．Choose your favorite samurai
３．Read the story, make choices, and make your samurai fall for you!
４．Choose between two endings in every Main Story!
５．Create and dress your own heroine!
　　Use lavish kimono, hairstyles, makeup, accessories and more!
６．Live in and decorate your own castle!
　　Visit the samurai, feed them onigiri, and collect bonus items!
７．Ally yourself with your friends!
　　Make allies with fellow players and bring your clans together!
８．Keep choosing new characters to expand the world of the Samurai!

◆Perfect for...◆
・Lovers of movies, dramas, & romance novels!
・Those who want to star in their own love story!
・Lovers of historical intrigue!
・Lovers of traditional Japanese fashion!
・Fans of dress-up doll games & apps
・Beginners to Romance Games/Apps
・Fans of anime & manga
・Fans of free mobile games
・Those who want a virtual boyfriend but want more than a traditional romance
・Fans of beautiful, dramatic illustrations


Important Information:
・Make sure you have a good data connection when playing the game in order to avoid data loss.
・If you uninstall the application, you will lose all your in-game purchases and records (gems, items, etc.)
・This app is available on Android devices that support Adobe Flash (Android 2.1 or higher is required; Android 4.0 or higher is recommended.)
・ If the app is not available, please use your browser to access it.
・We cannot accept returns, exchanges, or offer refunds on any gems or items, or Avatars purchased within the application.
・For more info

description: The true love in Jianghu is like constant burning flame, dazzling, fierce and enviable. The newest update Commit For Life offers player a chance to experience Jianghu romance. Get ready to adventure with the ‚Äòone‚Äô of yours, hop on the special mount for two, defeat anyone in your way with custom martial skills, new companion. For Fame, for gold, and for love, are you prepared enough to Commit? Panoramic Martial Arts KingdomPowered by the second generation Flexi Engine, Sword of Shadows takes players on an authentic journey through an ancient martial arts kingdom, as they become legendary warriors. We've paid incredible attention to detail to ensure that Sword of Shadows raises the bar in terms of what 3D mobile games can accomplish visually.Revolutionary Flying Skills & Sky BattlesIn Sword of Shadows, players can literally take flight, allowing them to experience a martial arts battle like never before. The Eight Fighting Flying Skill allows players to soar above their PvP opponents. Players can also learn the Ultra Flying Skills to fly across Sword of Shadows' expansive map.Fast-Paced and Dynamic CombatSword of Shadows' fast-paced and dynamic combat mechanism allows players to adjust the combat mode based on the circumstances of the fight. Players will master a range of martial arts abilities and battle tactics, including the ability to block feints and break through defenses to defeat opponents. The Snail team has also added refraction and displacement effects to increase the visual impact of Sword of Shadows' unique martial arts moves.Five Unique Schools to JoinThe path to martial arts mastery begins in one of Jianghu's five Martial Arts Schools! Each school has unique qualities that provide endless opportunities for character customization. Are you a swift and silent Tangmen ninja? Or are you more Emei, as brutal as you are beautiful? Between the five featured schools in Sword of Shadows, players are guaranteed to find the path to martial arts mastery that is perfect for them.==Connect==Visit our official site to learn more about Sword of Shadows: http://sword.snail.com/en/ Join the Sword of Shadows community and learn more on Facebook and our official Forum: Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/SwordofShadows/ Community Forum: http://swordbbs.snail.com/en/
descriptionHTML:
The true love in Jianghu is like constant burning flame, dazzling, fierce and enviable. The newest update Commit For Life offers player a chance to experience Jianghu romance. Get ready to adventure with the ‘one’ of yours, hop on the special mount for two, defeat anyone in your way with custom martial skills, new companion. For Fame, for gold, and for love, are you prepared enough to Commit?

Panoramic Martial Arts Kingdom

Powered by the second generation Flexi Engine, Sword of Shadows takes players on an authentic journey through an ancient martial arts kingdom, as they become legendary warriors. We've paid incredible attention to detail to ensure that Sword of Shadows raises the bar in terms of what 3D mobile games can accomplish visually.

Revolutionary Flying Skills & Sky Battles

In Sword of Shadows, players can literally take flight, allowing them to experience a martial arts battle like never before. The Eight Fighting Flying Skill allows players to soar above their PvP opponents. Players can also learn the Ultra Flying Skills to fly across Sword of Shadows' expansive map.

Fast-Paced and Dynamic Combat

Sword of Shadows' fast-paced and dynamic combat mechanism allows players to adjust the combat mode based on the circumstances of the fight. Players will master a range of martial arts abilities and battle tactics, including the ability to block feints and break through defenses to defeat opponents. The Snail team has also added refraction and displacement effects to increase the visual impact of Sword of Shadows' unique martial arts moves.

Five Unique Schools to Join

The path to martial arts mastery begins in one of Jianghu's five Martial Arts Schools! Each school has unique qualities that provide endless opportunities for character customization. Are you a swift and silent Tangmen ninja? Or are you more Emei, as brutal as you are beautiful? Between the five featured schools in Sword of Shadows, players are guaranteed to find the path to martial arts mastery that is perfect for them.

==Connect==
Visit our official site to learn more about Sword of Shadows: http://sword.snail.com/en/
Join the Sword of Shadows community and learn more on Facebook and our official Forum:
Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/SwordofShadows/
Community Forum: http://swordbbs.snail.com/en/

comments: Smurfymurf.  Now that's a Smurf! Did they ever mean something to you? Then you just have to get it ! Super nice!!! And technically very well done too !!!   Oooooooooops !!!! Update few days later...   Suddenly the game keeps crashing randomly...   Tried it for days....   Can hardly survive a single level now...    Very sad....   The game itself is still excellent.... This is by far one of the best games I have played like this all year. Very addicting, easy, but challenging enough to keep you wanting to come back play some more. Haven't found something I don't like about this game just yetüòÅ

Fun game, my daughter enjoys playing. ..easy, yet challenging at the same time.  One irritating issue...every time there's an update, or just opening the app, turns on the game's notifications..and have to turn it off constantly. ..otherwise it would be a rare 5 star rating from me.

Hate it. Too difficult. No helping aid. Not funny, but stressful. I left the game at level 83. Why you made it ugly like this?
Like with all other games this game is rigged, once you get to a certain level you are set up to fail unless you buy coins. I don't play games so I can go broke on coins, I don't like this.

description: Magic: The Gathering and the original match-3 RPG are re-imagined in Magic: The Gathering ‚Äì Puzzle Quest, a deck building, strategy and match-3 game Kotaku says, ‚Äúis a marriage of two distinct games into a unique new experience.‚ÄùLATEST FEATURES‚Ä¢ Booster Crafting ‚Äì Create your own booster packs to complete card sets.‚Ä¢ New Card Sets ‚Äì Collect cards from Ixalan, a swashbuckling dinosaur walking world filled with unknown treasures and perilous creatures.‚Ä¢ New Battles Await ‚Äì Play new events and improved rewards.MAGIC: THE GATHERING ‚Äì PUZZLE QUEST FEATURESCollect & Craft CardsCollect some of Magic: The Gathering‚Äôs deadliest spells like Star of Extinction and creatures like Kopala, Warden of the Waves. Now with Booster Crafting, create your own booster packs to add to your collection. Build the ultimate deck and face off against people from around the world.Match to Cast SpellsMana gems are the core of your strength and power. Match-3 or more to collect enough power to cast deadly spells and creatures.Play with FriendsJoin a coalition and play with your friends to win bonus rewards in tournaments. Band together and fight opponents from around the world!Win Rewards and Climb the LeaderboardsEnter daily events and player-vs-player (PVP) tournaments and challenge your decks against others from around the world. Climb the leaderboards and collect a multitude of rewards to build even better, more powerful decks!Recruit Your Champions for BattleThe mighty mages and warriors of Magic: The Gathering are your heroes in battle. Pair them with your very best deck and enter the arena fully prepared to decimate the competition. Each Planeswalker comes with unique abilities to activate that enhance your cards or wreak havoc on your opponents. Build up their levels and watch their abilities grow into an unstoppable force.
descriptionHTML:
Magic: The Gathering and the original match-3 RPG are re-imagined in Magic: The Gathering – Puzzle Quest, a deck building, strategy and match-3 game Kotaku says, “is a marriage of two distinct games into a unique new experience.”

LATEST FEATURES
• Booster Crafting – Create your own booster packs to complete card sets.
• New Card Sets – Collect cards from Ixalan, a swashbuckling dinosaur walking world filled with unknown treasures and perilous creatures.
• New Battles Await – Play new events and improved rewards.

MAGIC: THE GATHERING – PUZZLE QUEST FEATURES

Collect & Craft Cards
Collect some of Magic: The Gathering’s deadliest spells like Star of Extinction and creatures like Kopala, Warden of the Waves. Now with Booster Crafting, create your own booster packs to add to your collection. Build the ultimate deck and face off against people from around the world.

Match to Cast Spells
Mana gems are the core of your strength and power. Match-3 or more to collect enough power to cast deadly spells and creatures.

Play with Friends
Join a coalition and play with your friends to win bonus rewards in tournaments. Band together and fight opponents from around the world!

Win Rewards and Climb the Leaderboards
Enter daily events and player-vs-player (PVP) tournaments and challenge your decks against others from around the world. Climb the leaderboards and collect a multitude of rewards to build even better, more powerful decks!

Recruit Your Champions for Battle
The mighty mages and warriors of Magic: The Gathering are your heroes in battle. Pair them with your very best deck and enter the arena fully prepared to decimate the competition. Each Planeswalker comes with unique abilities to activate that enhance your cards or wreak havoc on your opponents. Build up their levels and watch their abilities grow into an unstoppable force.

11500 W. Olympic Blvd., Suite 460

This gamebis fun,i just got the game 5 ninutes ago and im doing very good on this game.you can farm gold. [By countunelessley killing enimies.]my guy deals 17.60 milloion damage per tap.i give this game 5 stars

Game is actually mindlessly fun. Climb the ladder and get stronger, and win tournaments. However, the game is not balanced for casual players and the development put a huge emphasis on pay to play. If you want to climb you really have to give up your life and keep climbing, and pay so you can simply redo your skills as you gain more. Hard to justify committing so much time.

Love the game! That is until I got a new phone(LG G6) that is plenty capable of playing this game. Now it opens to a black screen and sits there. I'd love to continue to play, but unless this is fixed, I'll look for something else, not that I want to...
The new Valentine's update is annoying. Whenever I try to log into my existing account it keeps on saying unable to connect to server. Please fix I still like this game.

comments: Awesome game. just a few comments. you guys should have the stuff that's automatically generated (mining for example) running in the background even while the app is closed because otherwise you're just getting maybe 100 every now and then and you feel like you're getting nothing. would be nice for the money that comes every minute to also still run even while the app is off

Great idle game that you can play as much or as little as you want, even if you only have a few minutes. My only gripe is all the inactive guilds. Finding a guild with an active guild master is virtually impossible, and when the gm quits all guild upgrading is over. It's also frustrating that all the upgrades you earn for a guild stay with the guild so if your guild master comes back after 6 months and kicks you, you get to start from scratch with no bonuses.

This game is actually really good. Not as confusing as the picture shows. Lots to explore.   The only thing I would change for a 5 star it to not stop us from battling after 1 hour of playing.  Hypecrafter NX youtuber Sighing out.

description: You are presented with a unique opportunity manage a large industrial enterprise, to go from a ruined factory to the industry leader! Buy machines, hire employees and start production. Do research and upgrade your equipment. The success of your enterprise depends on the strategy you choose!Industrialist is the economic strategy.
