descriptionHTML:
You are presented with a unique opportunity manage a large industrial enterprise, to go from a ruined factory to the industry leader! Buy machines, hire employees and start production. Do research and upgrade your equipment. The success of your enterprise depends on the strategy you choose!
Industrialist is the economic strategy. In the game, you will find dozens of unique machines (turning, milling, drilling, machining centers and others), various employees (workers, engineers, and service men), and interesting research to upgrade your production.
Expand your factory by building new facilities. The number of workshops is not limited, it all depends only on your ambitions, knowledge, and experience! The game works without the Internet!

comments: This game was absolutely perfect and was very much enjoyable, but now to unlock the full experience you have to pay. One of the reasons I enjoy this game and recommended it to my friends is because it is one of the only games that isn't locked behind a paywall. Overall, I have had countless hours playing this game, and trying to land on everything and return successfully. Instead of the microtransaction, why not institute a merit-based system for unlocking parts?

Very great!  Here are a few suggestion from me to make your game more enjoyable :)  1. Can you please make the earth scale correctly because its diameter is around 12.000 km and moon orbit is around 380.000 km  2. Please make a smaller powerful engine like the 9 engines of the falcon 9  3. Please make a button that is simple to cycle from another rocket to another one to ease the attempt of landing a booster  4. Please add an ocean on the earth for some splashdown  5. The last one. Im a free 2 play player and i cant enjoy a majority of the new update :*(

This game is awsome. Loads of fun. Told my friends about it. Could you add a free sandbox mode and more free parts. Thanks. Keep up the good work. Shouldn't have added micro transactions. It just ruined the game for me. Had to take it from a 5 star to a 3 star. Please bear this comment in mind for future updates. This game was 100% free when i downloaded it in december last year. Since then, you added a new build system, free parts which make the game absolutely amazing, and then you add pay for parts. Thats just buzzkill.

Very fast and simple rocket building and great graphics. I wish there was a sandbox mode with infinite fuel. Also there is no indication for loading screens when you hit the launch button. Somethimes you think you tapped the button and end up sitting there for a minute or two wasting time.  Edit So glad they made a small payment option. Well worth the money and glad to support

Great!  Only thing I miss is the ability to rendezvous and dock with another object.  In a moon landing, you could leave a stage in lunar orbit and pick it up for the outbound burn.  Also, karman line should be 100 km??  Edit:. Great updates.  I have no idea how to use docking to reattach parts that have been undocked though.

Can you please add option to center the map on the rocket/vehicle when being in the map mode? It is difficult to switch between near objects in the current version, since I assume the map is stationary relative to the body in which influence sphere we're in at that moment. Also, a "docking guide" would be cool in some future update
description: This is a game about building your own rocket from parts and launching it to explore space!‚Ä¢ Realistically scaled planets, with some up to hundreds to kilometers in size, and million of kilometers of space between them.‚Ä¢ Realistic orbital mechanics‚Ä¢ Open universe, if you see something in the distance, you can go there, no limits, no invisible walls.Current planets and moons:‚Ä¢ Venus ( A planet with a extremely dense atmosphere)‚Ä¢ Earth ( Our home, our pale blue dot)‚Ä¢ Moon ( Our celestial neighbour)‚Ä¢ Mars ( The red planet with a thin atmosphere)‚Ä¢ Phobos ( Mars inner moon, with rough terrain and low gravity)‚Ä¢ Deimos ( Mars outer moon, with a extremely low gravity and a smooth surface)Discord: https://discord.gg/v8u5Y9CVideo tutorials: Lift off tutorial: https://youtu.be/vPbPrbR0qcQMoon landing: https://youtu.be/5RgPDlBNaN8
descriptionHTML:
This is a game about building your own rocket from parts and launching it to explore space!

• Realistically scaled planets, with some up to hundreds to kilometers in size, and million of kilometers of space between them.
• Realistic orbital mechanics
• Open universe, if you see something in the distance, you can go there, no limits, no invisible walls.

Current planets and moons:
• Venus ( A planet with a extremely dense atmosphere)
• Earth ( Our home, our pale blue dot)
• Moon ( Our celestial neighbour)
• Mars ( The red planet with a thin atmosphere)
• Phobos ( Mars inner moon, with rough terrain and low gravity)
• Deimos ( Mars outer moon, with a extremely low gravity and a smooth surface)

Discord: https://discord.gg/v8u5Y9C

Video tutorials:
Lift off tutorial: https://youtu.be/vPbPrbR0qcQ
Moon landing: https://youtu.be/5RgPDlBNaN8

Major performance improvements.
Added clear all debris button.

comments: Tactical monsters is a great turn based strategy game. There's enough complexity to make it interesting but not so much that it's overwhelming. It has both single and multiplayer game mode options as well as fun challenges. Collecting cards is addicting and fun. Warning, it makes you want to play  more! One of my favorite things game is how fast it is. Battles are quick but still enjoyable. It is possible to do well in this game without paying. One last thing I like about this game is the support. The developers are constantly updating the game and fixing issues.

Great game, but after the last update the game isn't stable, when you play pvp often the timer freezes and you can't do anything beside closing the game, or you just cant do any action, and then you miss your turn, please fix it, and I'll give it 5 stars because the game is really awesome. Problem solved!

i uninstalled the game but i made sure to bound my account to googleplay however when i installed the game again i cant get my previous progress and have to start over again please fix this.... Overall the game is really good for people who like to play strategically.

For a game called tactical monsters, I was unpleasantly surprised that most units are actually humans and not monsters. Fighting is very basic with only having melee and ranged arrows. No magic, no way to buff allies, not many choices in combat. Overall a very boring and lackluster tactics wanna be type game. Hexes for movement are also very small and no back button to take back moves. I would not recommend playing this on a phone at all- Reply to Camex Games: First, try using spell check next time. Second - I did play several missions past the "tutorial" and none of the units given had magic or skills that opened up the game past a hack n slash. Third - Its not my problem to play dozens of hours in your mediocre phone game waiting for it to get interesting. If your game isn't good within the first hour, no one wants to keep playing for the next 10 hours. Fourth - how many monsters you have hidden in the game is irrelevant, as the units you get at the beginning of the game are mostly human, in a game called Tactical MONSTERS. Fifth - Giving monsters 3 basic skills that don't offer much tactical option when you can't customize them, isn't interesting. Sixth -- Add a back button

Game is awesome! One of the best tactics game I ever played, and I play those a lot. Would be a great implement if we could zoom in or out during battle, and also some little story on campaign would make it more enjoyable. 4.9*

descriptionHTML:
***** Globally featured by Google Play

***** Selected by "Android and Me" as Top 10 Games

***** Selected by "Android Police" as Top 30 Notable Games

***** "The game’s fast-paced 3 to 5 minute battles seem like the perfect fit for mobile." - Pocket Gamer

***** “IT’S JUST DAMN GOOD. Once you spend some time building a deck, it’s really worth it. The [PVP] matches becomes intense. They only last a few minutes but they feel very action oriented despite being turn-based.” – Gameranx

***** ".. I'm loving the look of Tactical Monsters... there's no lack of content in Tactical Monsters Rumble Arena. And since this is a social game with clans, you'll be able to trade monsters with others..." - Touch Arcade

***** “Tactical Monsters: Rumble Arena is a hex grid, turn based strategy game where ghost, ghouls and everything in between come to blows in fast-paced action.” - IGN

=GAME SUMMARY=
Experience the rush of 3-5 minute strategy battles in the world of Tactical Monsters comprised of monsters from all corners of the world. Whether you are competitive in real life or virtual reality, this is the ultimate competition game for you!

=GAMEPLAY GENRE=
Form the most monstrous team and conquer the real-time multiplayer gameplay. Outsmart and destroy your opponents by strategically positioning your monsters before battle and tactically controlling their actions in battle.

This is a turn-based, hex grid tactics gameplay with monsters from all time and space. From Franky the Frankenstein, to fantasy monsters like Medusa and Griffin, to culturally established creatures like WuKong and the Mummy, to monsters you’ve never seen before such as Bigfoot and Nobu the ghost samurai. Each monster have their own unique background and jobs. Each monsters have unique skills such as magic skills, physical skills, or even world-ending skills like the nuclear warhead from Dr. Walter’s Mecha Machine.

=SOCIAL INTERACTIONS=
Play tactics with your friends in 1 on 1 virtual battles, form a clan to trade cards. Exchange tactical knowledge with players worldwide in the world chat and clan chat. Build your own clan defenses to fend off the enemy raiders and be the #1 clan in the world!

=PLEASE NOTE=
Tactical Monsters is strategy tactics game that is completely free to download and play. However, some optional game items can also be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. An internet connection is also required.

=FEATURES=
- Battle through Adventure Mode to recruit unique monsters.
- Upgrade the monsters to unlock ridiculous monstrous and destructive skills
- Endure through the Guerrilla Warfare Mode (Survival Mode) to defeat the never-ending BOSSES.
- Sharpen your tactics by visiting Training Grounds.
- Duel players in real time live PVP to take their thrones and claim the world treasure chest.
- Set your optimal defense formations and layouts in Mine Defense.
- Ally with your clan mates to chat strategy, to share cards and be the #1 clan in your country
- Discover free items, rewards and monsters.
- You might like this game if you like to like turn-based games, strategy games, hero growth and heroes collection games, RPG games, TRPG games, games similar to western chess, Chinese chess, war chess. This tactics game is also similar to other turn-based hex grid or hexagonal games.

=SUPPORT=
Email us at support@tacticalmonsters.com

Follow us on Facebook to get news, updates:
www.facebook.com/tacticalmonsters

Twitter: @TacticalMons

Join our Discord channel to chat strategy:
https://discord.gg/XYHhgB4

*Get 500 FREE gems by joining our Discord group and entering your player ID in the #newbies_free_gems channel
*Tactical Monsters is fully developed, owned and operated by Camex Games.
*Camex Games partnered with Lemix Games to bring you some of your favorite characters from Monster Castle.

comments: I wasnt sure about this series at first, but it's really grown on me. The unique art style, interesting characters and immersive world make this an incredible game, especially considering it's a free mobile app! I would definitely love to see more sims like this in the future, (especially with the bad boy type). Seeing it transfer to desktop would be awesome! Overall, everything about this game is wonderful but, like everyone else says, the amount of energy given for free isn't enough! I think it would be wise to either lower the cost of energy actions take, give more free energy out, or split the story into parts in which 1 part can be played for free each day. Other than that it's a great sim!

My absolute favorite of all of the Is it Love games. Colin is an amazing character with an equally amazing backstory, and the way he connects with the MC is just incredible. The twists and turns in each chapter leave me craving more of the story. The energy they give you is somewhat lacking, but I'm used to it by now. Highly reccomend!

Really don't like how the guy treats the girl, what a scumbag! Plus I've been playing for over a week and the plot is unbelievably slow, the energy doesn't last long enough. There are much better otome style games out there.

Well the energy situation is beyond annoying. You only get very little for free and the prices for the energy and just WAY too expensive. I do like the story a lot though and will probably take 8 years to complete the story so I don't have to pay 50 bucks

OK, so I absolutely agree with everyone that the energy you get for free is nowhere near enough & packages are too expensive for what you get. I know, I've bought many. This story particular started bad, but now that I'm at the end, I'm hooked. Please continue to update. I have lots of bought energy going to waste!!

I don't really like the concept of earning energy every 24 hours. But I've got to say every time i see that message when my energy runs out. It leaves me on a cliffhanger and it keeps me in the story. Even if the energy wasn't there i would still play the game to my hearts content! Overall AMAZING story and characters!!
description: Is it Love? Colin is an  interactive story  in English.Like in a TV series, new episodes (chapters) are regularly released.You can download this love game for free. Will you find Love? Will you make it in the musical world? Story: "You come from a small town, you have a well-ordered life: Basic studies, a very respectful boyfriend and parents who decided on your future. You've always dreamed of becoming a pianist, But your father didn't look on it with a favourable eye, so you did what was expected of you. And then, one day, you felt trapped in your monotonous life. So you decided to leave it all behind and move to New York. But, after so many years, having put your dreams aside, your piano gathered dust and your mojo disappeared. At the Carter Corporation, you found a stable office job and good friends. And one night, Matt invites you along to a rock concert. A concert that changes everything. Your encounter with Colin, the leader of the group, turns your world upside down. This black-hearted character as stirring as he is inaccessible will awaken that old fire that burned in your heart: your love of music... " Main points: ‚úì Experience a true love story‚úì Your choices influence the course of the episode‚úì 100% in English.‚úì Become a rock starAn Otome is a visual novel type game in which you are the heroine about to live true romance (love story) with possible twists (Love, seduction, betrayal, marriage...) descriptionHTML:
Is it Love? Colin is an interactive story in English.
Like in a TV series, new episodes (chapters) are regularly released.
You can download this love game for free. Will you find Love? Will you make it in the musical world?

Story:
"You come from a small town, you have a well-ordered life: Basic studies, a very respectful boyfriend and parents who decided on your future. You've always dreamed of becoming a pianist, But your father didn't look on it with a favourable eye, so you did what was expected of you. And then, one day, you felt trapped in your monotonous life. So you decided to leave it all behind and move to New York. But, after so many years, having put your dreams aside, your piano gathered dust and your mojo disappeared. At the Carter Corporation, you found a stable office job and good friends. And one night, Matt invites you along to a rock concert. A concert that changes everything. Your encounter with Colin, the leader of the group, turns your world upside down. This black-hearted character as stirring as he is inaccessible will awaken that old fire that burned in your heart: your love of music... "

Main points:
✓ Experience a true love story
✓ Your choices influence the course of the episode
✓ 100% in English.
✓ Become a rock star

comments: I thoroughly enjoy this game.. graphics are smooth and bright, gameplay is fantastic.. a highly recommended mobile game.. perfect mix Action/RPG.. Great XP Farming Levels.  This game can be very difficult, I suggest you do not just auto-battle everything.. Take some time to learn your characters and all the glyph combinations.. Its almost endless. You will enjoy this one much more!
So far it is very addicting. My number one issue is that it constantly "goes out of sync with the servers". Also, maybe I'm just early in the game but coins should be easier to obtain than they are

Evolution is retarded, seriously. Having to sacrifice 2 other creatures of the same level to evolve makes the game insanely difficult for noobs to get anywhere fast. Come on devs, that's just bald faced greed, try a little more finesse if you ever want to see me invest in this game.
Great disappointment, when I heard that this game would come I expected something epic like heroes of might and magic V. Not this generic game that looks like all other games in the play store.
New to the game but so far so good. Some of the rules are a little vague but YouTube is filing in the gaps. Lots of variety. Well put together.
Summoners war clone with all the same problems...get lucky summons or lose...spend 10 minutes and all your crystals upgrading a rune 1 lvl...the game is all luck no skill

descriptionHTML:
Enter the world of Might & Magic: Elemental Guardians - a fast-paced strategy RPG based on the medieval fantasy realm of Might & Magic.
Journey through enchanted lands, collecting fierce and fantastic elemental creatures, and evolve a team of mighty warriors to summon to battle on the path to victory.

ENROLL IN THE ACADEMY OF MAGIC
• Create, customize and level up your own hero
• Choose a House of Magic: Materia, Chimera or Anima
• Use the mystic powers of your House to triumph in the arena

SUMMON A LEGENDARY TEAM
• Discover and collect hundreds of fantastic beasts and iconic creatures
• Watch their evolution from cute companions to legendary war allies
• Equip your team with arcane Glyphs to enhance their abilities

TRAIN & BATTLE
• Level up your creatures to unlock their true might
• Compete in the PvP Arena to rise up the league leaderboards
• Participate in Live Events to win epic prizes and rare items

LEAD YOUR TEAM TO VICTORY
• Face fierce opponents in fast and strategic RPG battles
• Use the elements of Fire, Water, Air and Earth tactically to gain the advantage
• Cast epic spells and use magical abilities of different elements

BECOME A HERO OF LEGENDS
• Journey through the fabled fantasy realms of Might & Magic
• Complete diverse daily quests and earn special rewards
• Enjoy beautiful graphics and unique creature designs

Compatible with Android 4.3 and above.

This app contains In-App Purchases which allow you to buy in-game currency. In-game currency can also be collected by playing the game without requiring any purchase.

descriptionHTML:
*** Hungry Shark World Selected in Google Play’s Best Games of 2016 collection ***
The Sharks are back in the bigger and badder sequel to Hungry Shark Evolution!
Control a shark in a feeding frenzy and eat your way through many oceans feasting on everything from bite-size fish and birds to tasty whales and unwitting humans!
***This game is only compatible with devices running on Android 4.2 or above***

MORE THAN 20 SHARK SPECIES
Choose from a range of sharks in 7 different size tiers, including the most iconic ocean predator: the Great White!

HUGE OPEN WORLDS
Explore the lush Pacific Islands, frozen Arctic Ocean, exotic Arabian Sea, and now the South China Sea, a vibrant urban destination full of fresh, unwary victims!

FEAST FOR YOUR EYES
Experience the feeding frenzy in stunning console quality 3D graphics that will blow everything else out of the water!

SURVIVAL OF THE HUNGRIEST
It’s eat or be eaten in waters packed with 100s of delicious and dangerous creatures… Whales, submarines and wandering locals BEWARE!

SMASHING SHARK SWAG
Level up your shark and equip jawsome gadgets to bite harder, swim faster and grow even hungrier! No shark is complete without headphones, umbrella and a freakin' jetpack!

MANIC MISSIONS & BADASS BOSSES
Take on more than 20 different types of mission including high score challenges, prey hunts and epic boss fights!

HELPFUL PREDATORY PETS
Baby sharks, whales, an octopus, and even a bald eagle are happy to help with special abilities to increase health, score and more!

SUPERSIZED MEAL DEAL
Unleash your shark's predator potential: SuperSize mode, rushes, explosion, hypnosis and more!

INTUITIVE TILT CONTROLS
Back by popular demand, now you can control your shark simply by tilting your phone!

Google Play Leaderboards and Achievements enabled.
Use Facebook to synchronise your progress across your GP devices.
Hungry Shark World is regularly updated with new features, content and challenges to keep you coming back for more!

comments: Nice game, im still playing but it should be an easier way (for ppl that dont want to spend real life money on these games) to get diamonds. Cost for outfits/shoes/jewlery are extremely high 189 diamonds for a dress i mean come on. Only can watch one video to earn 1 diamond thats disappointing. I'll give 5 stars if getting diamonds gets easier or mini games to get diamonds would be great.

I Love this game but recently it has disappointed me. To move on to the next task I have to buy an expensive house which I can't afford (Hollywood mansion). I can't even buy the coins to afford it because the coins are so expensive too. There is no way of getting around it, I have tried making movies and moving up levels but I am always stuck with the same problem. I can't even skip the task! I am on the verge of rage quitting this game.

This is the best game I have ever played. This must be the world's NO. 1 game. Please make lessen the amount of money that you have for the London Mansion. Please add more stories as I have finished all the stories (except the London Mansion). The last thing is that this game should have more updates as in my IPad there is a new version of this game. Thank you.

I really do love it, but 95% of the clothing requires a ton of diamonds that are very rare and difficult to earn but when you do receive them you only get a couple. Also, it's very frustrating that searching for random objects consumes your energy. Please, PLEASE fix those.

I would give it 5 steers but every time I try to go into a Beverly hills store my game crashes and I have to close the game and I try again and it keeps happening also the losing is slow. If you fix this I will give it 5. Thanks.

This game is toooo Goooooood. But the dresses are very costly, no new hair styles, in spin wheel i never got 500 or 1000 diamonds, also i want to have this character a baby. Please reduce the prize of the dressed. Also London is nothing in front of a Hollywood mansion

descriptionHTML:
Here is your chance to become a true Hollywood Star!

Welcome to the star-studded, stunning and spectacular streets of Hollywood Story!
Build your own movie star career, dominate the red carpets throughout the city, hang out with fans, friends and followers, create own fashion lines, shoot awesome blockbusters and become a true Hollywood icon!

CREATE YOUR OWN HOLLYWOOD STAR
Make your own movie star! Personalize your avatar, choose your clothing, fashion style, hairstyle and make-up. Leave your own unique mark on the movie industry!

SHOOT MOVIES
Win auditions and shoot blockbusters! Promote your movies and earn fans!

FASHION
Meet designers and wear unique fashion dress made only for you!

GET FANS
Create your own star-signed fashion collection, design own perfume and become true megastar with hordes of fans!

DATE WITH CELEBRITIES
Meet the hottest Hollywood stars and hang out with them at epic parties on fabulous locations – it's time to live the dream!

UNLOCK THE CITY
Progress through the game and unlock amazing new locations and engaging new features! Hang out in Hollywood, Beverly Hills, Manhattan, Las Vegas and other exciting locations!

MAKE THE COVERS
With great fame comes great media frenzy! Paparazzi will be waiting in front of your home to get a picture of you, so be prepared for tabloid covers.

SOCIALIZE, CONNECT, INTERACT
Meet new people, play with your friends, visit their homes and check out their movies. Then share your accomplishments with the world!

comments: I reckon this game is so good! I reckon it needs a test mode track so when you finish fixing the car fully to 100% you can test it. And probably alot more cars to fix, and also instead of having just one place where there are garages. You can go all over the world to different type of country's where there are different cars like Australia has commodores, Japan of skyline etc. Love this game so much ‚ù§ hope you take this into exception

Great game and efforts of game generating team are appreciated. I wld suggest to add few things like  tires wheel rims tinted glass at extra cost and if used will pay more while selling. Also sometimes when we buy car from barn in some cases few parts could be made missing so that player wld need to search and then purchase new to add more fun. After u get all tools and all cards then it is boaring....

For the developers: this game is broken. I play on tablet Galaxi tab A   Start the game Remove battery Buy new battery Install new battery Cant tap the sell option Game freeze Nothing work Retart the game 5 times always the same

Trying to find a support link?? I have all tools yet wont give me a bonus.... Love the game. Camera can be a pain sometimes but you learn where to and where not to touch parts. Also why not have buyers or clients stop in... Finishing a car 100% and only making 2k after putting wok into the car Then 10k into parts... I would fire the guy selling cars... Just my two cents.

Nothing like the older apps like this. Camera control is hard, going from warehouse to parts catalogue constantly to remember bad parts to replace is a pain, then an add plays further impairing your memory. Disassembly  got way less interactive and so far I can't repair parts, just  purchase from a catalog.

Overall the game is exactly what you think it would be, a mobile version of car mechanic simulator 2018. That being said the rotate and zoom features of the camera can be a little irritating at times. It's also very hard to make money to get to your 4th level of tools when you can't completely repair the majority of cars that you get. It can be a little frustrating to purchase a car only to realize that you cannot completely restore it.

comments: Awesome game. just a few comments. you guys should have the stuff that's automatically generated (mining for example) running in the background even while the app is closed because otherwise you're just getting maybe 100 every now and then and you feel like you're getting nothing. would be nice for the money that comes every minute to also still run even while the app is off

Great idle game that you can play as much or as little as you want, even if you only have a few minutes. My only gripe is all the inactive guilds. Finding a guild with an active guild master is virtually impossible, and when the gm quits all guild upgrading is over. It's also frustrating that all the upgrades you earn for a guild stay with the guild so if your guild master comes back after 6 months and kicks you, you get to start from scratch with no bonuses.

This game is actually really good. Not as confusing as the picture shows. Lots to explore.   The only thing I would change for a 5 star it to not stop us from battling after 1 hour of playing.  Hypecrafter NX youtuber Sighing out.

comments: Lost another These constant updates caused me to uninstall this. Fun game - very good game!But if it ain't broke don't fix it. I will not sacrifice all the other good games I have for this single one. Now with google only allowing so many apps ( no writing to sd card). But My 4 friends have IOS devices & their Servers are showing different than us. I don't know why? We can't even connect by number also. Tried doing that!. Please let me know its fixture

It's a fun game. If you're a COD player you'll love it. In general It does good on it's own as a solid shooter. Only thing I think you really, REALLY need to change is the way to get weapons. Using rentals is great, picking up enemy or ally weapons, sure, but having to spend money to get most weapons, if not all, seems a little unfair. It's good that there's a grind to get them but I think it's a little overkill how difficult it is. I think levels should determine what you unlock, then use silver (make it easier to get) to purchase it. Or, if players want to speed up the process, use gold.

I really like the game. Fun, exciting, and addictive. The only problem I have is that the rewards you get are not nearly enough as I think they should be. Exp gains are good, but cash gains are so bad and you will have to play for hours to accumulate cash and then you can buy HALF of a weapon, because they require a lot of cash to get one. You also can barely upgrade weapons without any gold and you can just forget about that unless you put some real world currency in this game, which is a real shame. As a player I know we would like to buy and upgrade our own weapons instead of having to "rent" which is an option in the game.

this game is great, but i rated 3 star cuz i wanted this gaem to be like COD: WWII, and like ravenfield. There are NO MG nests, no war modes like COD:WWII, and please, fix the prices! It took me 3 years of full gameplay, 5 hours just to get a shotgun. And please optimize the guns. Overall, really great game!                                  By a youtuber                            Zombiehunter78oo  P.S. Please add more guns and some more features.

descriptionHTML:
WORLD WAR HEROES
Fight soldiers from all over the world in the best World War II online shooter for Android!
This game will take you to World War II, where you’ll able to use military vehicles to conduct battles.

The game features 7 game modes:

✯ Hardcore Mode
Mode increase the damage and makes the game more realistic;

✯ Deathmatch
Free fight for all. You fight for yourself. Player with the highest score wins the round;

✯ Team Deathmatch
Two teams fight for domination. The team with the highest score at the end of the round wins.

✯ Bomb Mode
One team should bring and plant a bomb at the indicated point, the other team must prevent it!

✯ Team Squad
Two teams fight each other with no respawns. The team which has at least one member wins.

✯ Team battle on panzers
Two teams battle against each other. The team that has the most points at the end of the round wins.

✯ Custom Modes
Create a game with your own rules! Tell your friends game number in the statistics window when you create a room and play together!


Features:

✯ 7 legendary World War II battles!
✯ 4 types of battle vehicles from different countries: USA, Russia, Japan, and Germany!
✯ 5 game modes and a custom mode with your own rules!
✯ 57 unique weapon types: pistols, assault rifles, machine guns, shotguns and many more!

*Reminder: Join tournaments to win prize, raise your clan!


More features:
✯✯✯ Login to Get Daily Free Gifts ✯✯✯
Login to Get Daily Free Gifts, Login to get Free Daily Quests!
Login to get daily free items. Don’t also miss the bonus EXP and Credits time!
　
✯✯✯ 50+ Weapons, Customize yourself ✯✯✯
50 types of weapons: guns, pistols, tommy-guns, subguns, grenades, rockets and body armors!
Customize your weapon and get an unique test piece – change the color and get all options, from barrels and stocks to scopes.

✯✯✯ Upgrade gear system ✯✯✯
Upgrade your gear and become stronger!

Regular updates and new elements are waiting for you. This year’s best graphics and perfectly matched sounds will make you spend your time playing WWH!

GOOD LUCK SOLDIER!

comments: This game is very fun and addicting. My only complaint is there isn't enough variation in the astromons. Some of them you can tell they are based off of a certain elemental character that's say...water but then the fire version is the same looking just red instead of blue. It's strange. Maybe change up how they look a bit more like in Pokemon with all of eevee evolutions. But then again it's a free game and I have been having a blast playing it. Thank you.

As a beginner in the game, all the interaction menus and stuff you need to get to, or just wanna check out, take way to long to get to, as they're complicated and hold a lot of the game in them. It'd be great if there were an easier way to figure out what they do, to get the most out of the game as a newbie, instead of going through 30 tutorials of their own to find out. Otherwise, I love the gameplay, characters, and art. Great game all in all.

It's nice overall. But you gotta spend a lot if you want 5 star units. I already did 3-4 600 gem summons and everytime they just give you 1 4stars unit the rest are 2 and 3 stars even when they say 'chances up'.

Please fix the constant crashing during clan battles. Other than that its a wonderful games. Also it's becomes harder get gold as you level up which sucks. I love the game. Cute astromon, Wonderful evolutions, and even a nice story!

so I have been playing this game for awhile now and the only major flaw I have found is that if you choose to pay for astrogems they are ridiculous expensive for pretty much nothing. I understand it is probably so it doesn't come as a pay to win game but ya. Also I wish appearance rates for rares and up for better.  I love this game. Really not an understatement. It's the perfect time killer and for me I doesn't get old. The only thing I would change is on the hard and extreme levels I wouldn't have the astromon revert to their original forms after you catch them.

There is no other game that I have ever found quite like Monster Super League. It's fun to play, the monsters have great designs, and while spending real world money is an option, it's not required to progress. And progressing without spending money is easy. I wish there were more games like this one out there.

descriptionHTML:
# Adventure with the Astromons!
Monster Super League summons you to the fantasy world of Astromons!
From cute to stylish, catch & collect monsters of all sizes and shapes!
Collect over 550 types of Astromon in Monster Super League!

# I Choose You!
Catch wild Astromons out there in the field, or summon them by hatching the mysterious eggs!
Collect & evolve your favorite Astromons!

# Evolve and Grow!
Your Astromons will evolve to change in looks and gain additional skills.
Sometimes, they will evolve into very rare variants with even more power!

# Strategic Combat!
Even the same Astromons can differ by attributes & combat style.
Build your team to adventure through over 100 stages in various natural environments!

# Populate your Airship!
Astromons you catch & summon get to live on your airship.
Sometimes you might even have a surprise visitor!

# Socialize with friends!
Summon your friends from all around the world to chat and exchange gifts and tips!

# Become stronger in your own way!
Collect Astromons with different attributes to build your own best team.
Grow your Astromons faster by feeding fruits, and unlock additional powers with special runes!

# Immersive Content!
Dive deep into the story of Astromons through 8 different regions!
Challenge yourself in daily Dungeons for better rewards!
Battle against other players in the Astromon League!

Access requests for gameplay (Game services restricted if disabled)
1) Only for game installation purposes, this application requests access to external memory.

▷Monster Super League Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/monstersuperleague
Follow up on the latest news and events on the Monster Super League official community!

comments: I'm so addicted to this game! Out of all the simulation games I've played this is by far my favourite. The characters are great and the story line changes on each route so it keeps you interested. And you don't have to spend money to enjoy everything in this game. An hourglass takes a while to get but it's worth it to use them to get the extra stories. I enjoyed the Christmas add on.

I LOVE this game, and everything about it is awesome, aside from the fact that I just got a new phone and now the time is correct on it (my old phone clock was an hour off), and daylight savings time just happened so while my new phone time is an hour later, my game won't let me play due to the time change. It says I need to go back to my previous time zone (which I haven't moved anywhere, its just daylight savings time). I've already put a suggestion up on your site asking about whether you guys can put an option to change the time on the game for these very situations, or to install a daylight savings time option so it can keep up with real time. Other than that though, I absolutely love the game, the graphics, the game play, and the characters to which I get so attached to, are stunning and beautiful. Y'all should be really proud of yourselves <3

Nice description, nice plot. Likable characters with spot on music. What more could I ask for? (Edit on 9/7: I downed the rating not because it's a bad game, but because although I had an account for this game, I lost all my data when I logged in. I had saved 270+ hourglasses so I could do the secret endings but well. That went down the toilet. I won't be trying again until I get interested (and over this) in this game again. Other than that I fully recommend this game.)

Loved it overall but make the chats last longer without having to reset them as I miss them with school or sleep. Not everyone can use the app at certain times in the day. It doesn't have to last the whole day just a few more hours  or 10. The games good other than that though. It's a good way to pass the time and has a good story.Keep up the good work.

Im in love wih the characters already! Though, its kinda sad that you are forced to be a girl character even if you state that you arent in game. That kinda took me out of the experience a bit. I understand it would probably take a lot of effort to put that option in, but man would it be cool. Keep up the great work!

I've been a long term fan now since 2016 when it came out and I still play it to this day! The chatrooms are very interesting to read and the visual novels are always something to look forward to! I have been in love with Saeran since the Common Route so him getting his own route was like a dream come true! Although, his route is an emotional roller coaster..

comments: I love this game one of my biggest issues though as it has a tendency to overheat your tablet or your phone. If it overheats too much then it will start shutting down the game and then can cause issues. I've had where my tablet has gotten the black screen of death and I'm having trouble using it directly in correlation to playing this game because of it overheating. This is something I think really needs to be looked into and see how they can maybe not use so much memory that it affects your tablet or your phone to the point of overheating

Still loves the game when I play. However, I don't understands why the bonus games keep disappearing after I play one round. I have to back out off the app and then restart for the next levels to show up. Pain in the butt. Because this has continued to happen I find myself playing less and less

I have this installed on a newer tablet and have played it for a year and now I can't get it to work.  I also play this on an older tablet that I have been playing for 5 years and plays very well but when I play Elsa creations it does not calculate all that I have matched whether it be one or three.  This part needs to be fixed.  I have watched it not tally what I have matched.  No way to win when it does not work right! I am adding to this post because now frozen free fall does not work at all!  Not sure what happened.  I even uninstalled it and reinstalled it and nothing.  So everything I have played on this game is gone!!

I love this game but its gotten very buggy in the last week. Screens go blank, restarts when making level selection many times over, errored out when buying snowballs, and extra challenged randomly appear and disappear so that the "days left" has no meaning. Someone needs to look at this.

Great game that I've been playing for years now, however with the new updates, I can't play past level 1310 because the game freezes as soon as I run out of moves and it tries to reshuffle...and just this morning I can't even play a level without the game restarting over and over again! I can play all the extra bonus games with no issue, it's the regular levels that I can't play...please fix this!
Since the last update the game keeps shutting off and restarting. Annoying as hell and I've stopped playing until it's fixed.

comments: Its world best game ever played.  It is like a small GTA of phone or for android. It doesn't look too good but if u download and play it will like a real GTA. It is a quite big but the game is super amazing. It is not too interesting in starting but later u can play it like a GTA. It also not need any extra files to download after downloading from play store but it needs Internet connection.

This game might not look so good when you download it, but there is a lot you can do. Buy properties to get money, buy guns armor, cars. There are plenty of minigames and quick play missions like street races, survival, and parachuting. The storyline may only be decent, but the missions are still fun.  The only real problem is the file size. You have to dedicate too much of your storage, if you have a newer phone with more built in storage, or a microSD card, you should try this game.

Huge Kudos to the developers for making this game!! It's amazing it's literally like playing GTA but on your phone it has the story mode and it all makes sense!! The graphics are ok but I'm sure if they made this again in a Los Angeles version of some sort the graphics could get better and better!! Overall Amazing game and there's nobody else making games like this on the app store!! Great job! 10 out of 10 stars!!!

Wow this game is so fun! when you go the airport, there are planes yay! and one thing you have to add to the game, please add some more hotels that are in the real Las vegas and I love the daily bonus and the one thing I hate, the military base where you get killed by a jackalope tank, bustard helicopter and the iron horse and please make the military base free to enter without getting 5 stars note: version is 3.6

Best game I've ever played! In fact it is the only game I've had on my phone for 2 years. But there are some minor errors that keep occurring, such as when you are running or driving any vehicle, the control pad keeps stopping and I have to lift my thumb up and put it back down to regain control. Now I know it doesn't sound like much, it can mess up your drifts and the gas will stop as well. PLEASE FIX. Thanks

It's a very great game,Nothing but love.   But I got a notification  that there is an update,I updated the game but I still can't find the new added missions in the game. Secondly I am on day 87 and my day 90 supposed  Reward changed after I downloaded the update.

You can even take off into the sky as you explore every inch of this criminal paradise.WELCOME TO OUTRAGEOUS LAS VEGAS‚àö Play as a mixed martial arts (MMA) fighting star whose dreams of becoming a Battle Royale champ clash with a world of theft, gang wars, zombies and more in a BLOCKBUSTER STORY MODE.‚àö Fight your way through 80 MISSIONS filled with action, auto races, shooting and more. Use your skills and your brain to counter every challenge they throw at you.‚àö Build up clans of criminals to strike from the shadows against your many enemies.ENDLESS SANDBOX FUN‚àö Explore a BIGGER CITY, 9x the size of the previous Gangstar game, for a ridiculously fleshed-out mobile world where you‚Äôll always find something new to do and thefts to commit.‚àö Perform awesome stunts with ragdoll effects that are as fun to see succeed as they are to watch fail horribly, thanks to amazing use of the HAVOK PHYSICS engine.‚àö Watch your name climb the Leaderboards as you overcome grand CHALLENGES including air, water and street auto races, MMA fights, FPS showdowns & more!‚àö Become Vegas's finest sniper by shooting it up in Carnage & Heist modes.‚àö Break the bank as you kill it in addictive CASINO GAMES. Theft isn‚Äôt the only way to make the big bucks!RIDE ON THE WILD SIDE‚àö Access INSANE WEAPONS like Molotov cocktails, long-range sniper rifles, flamethrowers & an electric guitar! Choose the right one to counter any threat.‚àö Stay mobile as you drive CRAZY VEHICLES including monster trucks, muscle cars, tanks & fighter jets. So strap in -- there‚Äôs no auto-pilot for these dogs of war!‚àö UPGRADE YOUR SKILLS for more deft theft, sharper sniper strikes, and better race-car control.‚àö CUSTOMIZE YOUR GEAR and look like anything you wish: a mechanized robot, boxing champ, shambling zombie, etc.BEYOND THE MORTAL COIL‚àö Kill zombies, try boxing with robots, and even strike out against the shadow clans of HELL itself as your story takes you to unbelievable locations.THE STORY:In this third-person shooting game, you play as a rising MMA champion. Framed by the mafia, you are supposed to throw your bout at the fighting event of the year. But when your opponent beats you to the punch and goes down first, famous gang lord Frank Veliano‚Äôs perfect plan goes down too. You have just become the most wanted man in the city. In a dog-eat-dog world where crime is everywhere, you will have to hold your gun tight to combat the wildest gang ever!Welcome to Las Vegas, where fortunes are made and lives are lost with a roll of the dice!For fans of FPS action, auto racing, driving (autos or tanks), robots, zombie clans, games with car theft, and free mobile games.This game supports smartphones and tablets running Android 2.3 and up._____________________________________________Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_ENCheck out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/centralDon't forget to follow us on social media:Facebook: http://gmlft.co/GVonFacebookTwitter: http://gmlft.co/SNS_TW_ENInstagram:http://gmlft.co/GVonInstagramYouTube:http://gmlft.co/GVonYoutubeForum: http://gmlft.co/GV_ForumPrivacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/privacy-noticeTerms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/conditions-of-useEnd-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/eula
descriptionHTML:
Roll up on a dangerously fun, wildly expansive, and overwhelmingly rich trip to the City of Sin!
Enjoy everything Vegas has to offer, from shooting up rival gangs and stealing cars to race down the strip, to pushing your luck at the casino and customizing your threads. You can even take off into the sky as you explore every inch of this criminal paradise.

WELCOME TO OUTRAGEOUS LAS VEGAS
√ Play as a mixed martial arts (MMA) fighting star whose dreams of becoming a Battle Royale champ clash with a world of theft, gang wars, zombies and more in a BLOCKBUSTER STORY MODE.
√ Fight your way through 80 MISSIONS filled with action, auto races, shooting and more. Use your skills and your brain to counter every challenge they throw at you.
√ Build up clans of criminals to strike from the shadows against your many enemies.

ENDLESS SANDBOX FUN
√ Explore a BIGGER CITY, 9x the size of the previous Gangstar game, for a ridiculously fleshed-out mobile world where you’ll always find something new to do and thefts to commit.
√ Perform awesome stunts with ragdoll effects that are as fun to see succeed as they are to watch fail horribly, thanks to amazing use of the HAVOK PHYSICS engine.
√ Watch your name climb the Leaderboards as you overcome grand CHALLENGES including air, water and street auto races, MMA fights, FPS showdowns & more!
√ Become Vegas's finest sniper by shooting it up in Carnage & Heist modes.
√ Break the bank as you kill it in addictive CASINO GAMES. Theft isn’t the only way to make the big bucks!

RIDE ON THE WILD SIDE
√ Access INSANE WEAPONS like Molotov cocktails, long-range sniper rifles, flamethrowers & an electric guitar! Choose the right one to counter any threat.
√ Stay mobile as you drive CRAZY VEHICLES including monster trucks, muscle cars, tanks & fighter jets. So strap in -- there’s no auto-pilot for these dogs of war!
√ UPGRADE YOUR SKILLS for more deft theft, sharper sniper strikes, and better race-car control.
√ CUSTOMIZE YOUR GEAR and look like anything you wish: a mechanized robot, boxing champ, shambling zombie, etc.

BEYOND THE MORTAL COIL

√ Kill zombies, try boxing with robots, and even strike out against the shadow clans of HELL itself as your story takes you to unbelievable locations.

THE STORY:
In this third-person shooting game, you play as a rising MMA champion. Framed by the mafia, you are supposed to throw your bout at the fighting event of the year. But when your opponent beats you to the punch and goes down first, famous gang lord Frank Veliano’s perfect plan goes down too. You have just become the most wanted man in the city. In a dog-eat-dog world where crime is everywhere, you will have to hold your gun tight to combat the wildest gang ever!
Welcome to Las Vegas, where fortunes are made and lives are lost with a roll of the dice!

For fans of FPS action, auto racing, driving (autos or tanks), robots, zombie clans, games with car theft, and free mobile games.

This game supports smartphones and tablets running Android 2.3 and up.


_____________________________________________

Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_EN
Check out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/central

Don't forget to follow us on social media:

How to Play
The Lobby
1. To enter a room simply double touch or two touch on the Room area in room list.
2. The status of room is “Playing”, or time stamp of remained time to play
3. There are 4 types of room, Emerald, Sapphire, Diamond and Ruby.
4. Each room type requires the minimum tick price. For example, a ticket price in Emerald is 5P and Diamond ticket’s 1￡.


The Room
1. When you fist visit a room, it’s divided into two columns.
2. Right column is ticket list to buy. Another ticket list can be shown to swipe ticket list.
3. Touch a ticket to buy, the status of ticket is changed to “Selected”. Touch “SELECT MAX TICKETS”, 18 tickets will be selected.
4. Touch “BUY SELECTED TICKETS”, then all of tickets to be chose will be bought.


The Game
1. One of the great things with online Bingo is that you won’t need to worry about marking your cards as you go, the computer will do all this for you.

4. We’ll flag it up each time someone wins and automatically credit your account!

The Prize
1st line pot : When All numbers of the first line on a ticket is called, you win 1st line pot
2nd line pot : When All numbers of the second line on a ticket is called, you win 2nd line pot
HOUSE : When All numbers of the all three line on a ticket is called, you win HOUSE Jackpot

comments: I do like the game because it is fun.  The graphics are excellent, the gameplay is challenging; however, the new update includes an option to purchase updates to units by way of credits, alloy, and crystals.  The wording is not specific and I wasted quite a bit of crystals, credits and alloy and did not receive what I thought I purchased.  Although I am unhappy and will most likely NOT make any further purchases in this game in the future, it is still worth a try.  Just make sure you do not make the same mistake I did.  I do hope the developer reads this and makes the appropriate chsnges.  Enjoy.

Loved it to begin with and spent a lot of actual money to progress...... but it only helped a little, you have to have deep pockets or too much time to get anywhere. Oh and now it's crashed, having to re install just to see if I've lost all my money!

The competitive balance in this game is garbage. Unless you spend real money and play constantly, you have no chance in this game. Constantly getting attacked by players levels ahead of you no fun. I'm a lvl 8, and to have opponents only need 2 shots to destroy any of my defenses is asinine. Especially for the amount of time and ore it takes to level up. Do not waste your time on this game!

I gave 2 stars.  I used to like this game but not anymore. I am lvl 7 and the only people who ever hit me are lvl 10 bases!!! What is up with that? Don't give me some bs excuse is because regardless, this is not right and I am thinking of quitting because of this.  I'm a paying customer but I won't be spending another dime on this lopsided game.  Thanks for stealing my cash and my time.

Would definitely give at least 4 stars, but there's one thing that really makes me mad: The Attacking/Defending Algorithm. Out my entire squad, I have the least attacks, but I'm the leader, by far, in defenses. I don't WANT to attack anyone yet. I want to farm and get stronger. But I can't do that if I'm getting attacked 7-10 times every hour. Even when I win defenses, I still lose resources. Fix that. Make it to where people that rarely attack, are rarely attacked.

this game used to be good but they have ruined the opponents. being a level 9 on all  units costs more to build to attack than the resources you can scavenge from your opponents. also the developers are allowing hundreds of absolutely identical bases to be produced so even if you decline an attack and are repaired you get matched to a different 'player' but with the same base. it's a disgrace.

descriptionHTML:
Fight for Your Side. Command The Galaxy.

The Galactic War rages on. Where does your allegiance lie? Will you side with the Rebellion or the Empire? Join the fight, build your base, recruit and train your army, strategically plan your defenses, and lead your troops to victory on war-torn worlds throughout the galaxy!

Battle with or against iconic characters like Darth Vader, Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, and Princess Leia, and utilize or destroy units like AT-ATs, Speeder Bikes, Wookiee Warriors, and Stormtroopers. Join millions around the globe to play in this epic combat strategy game. Commander, the fate of the galaxy is in your hands!

FEATURES

• CHOOSE to fight for the Rebellion or the Empire
• TRAIN your troops to charge into battle
• BUILD units and vehicles with multiple upgrades
• DEFEND your base against enemy forces
• COMPLETE original story missions and gain additional rewards
• LEVEL UP your heroes, troops, vehicles, and more
• BATTLE on different worlds within the Star Wars™ universe
• TEAM UP WITH FRIENDS and allies to form the ultimate squad

Upgrade your Planetary Command building to scout and relocate your base to new worlds such as Dandoran, Yavin 4, Er’Kit and Hoth to expand your command and strengthen your squad.

Star Wars: Commander requires Android OS 4.0 or above and supports both tablets and phones.

Before you download this experience, please consider that this app contains:
• Social media links to connect with others
• In-app purchases that cost real money, push notifications to let you know when we have exciting updates like new content
• Advertising for some third parties, including the option to watch ads for rewards
• Advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies

We respect your wishes regarding your Privacy. You can exercise control and choice by resetting your Advertising Identifier in your device’s Privacy Settings. This app allows access to your Google Play Account. You can upload and save content from this app to your device.

Visit the official Star Wars Commander website – https://www.starwarscommander.com/

Privacy Policy – http://disneyprivacycenter.com
Terms of Use – http://disneytermsofuse.com

description: Football Manager Mobile goes wherever you do, so you can win anytime and anywhere with your favourite club. With compatibility across the majority of smartphones and tablets, you‚Äôll speed through the seasons in FM Mobile whilst still experiencing that authentic football experience ‚Äì with all the top players and clubs featured from around the world.  There‚Äôs a massive 17 countries to base yourself including all the big European leagues, so you‚Äôll be the boss at one of the world‚Äôs top clubs.  Transfers and tactics are completely down to you, so you‚Äôll play the transfer market and decide who plays and who warms the bench.It‚Äôs down to you to keep the players, the board and the fans happy and lead your club to victory, and who knows ‚Äì maybe one day they‚Äôll name a stadium after you! Football Manager Mobile 2018 delivers many new and improved features for this season including:TWO BRAND NEW LEAGUESYou can now try your luck in South Korea and the USA, two brand new fully licensed league additions for this season. descriptionHTML:
Football Manager Mobile goes wherever you do, so you can win anytime and anywhere with your favourite club.

With compatibility across the majority of smartphones and tablets, you’ll speed through the seasons in FM Mobile whilst still experiencing that authentic football experience – with all the top players and clubs featured from around the world.

There’s a massive 17 countries to base yourself including all the big European leagues, so you’ll be the boss at one of the world’s top clubs.

Transfers and tactics are completely down to you, so you’ll play the transfer market and decide who plays and who warms the bench.

It’s down to you to keep the players, the board and the fans happy and lead your club to victory, and who knows – maybe one day they’ll name a stadium after you!

Football Manager Mobile 2018 delivers many new and improved features for this season including:

TWO BRAND NEW LEAGUES
You can now try your luck in South Korea and the USA, two brand new fully licensed league additions for this season.

LARGEST EVER DATABASE OF PLAYERS
Up to 21,500 active players can now be loaded with custom options across leagues and nation, meaning your scouts will be busier than ever before.

TACTICAL REVAMP
Improved player roles, new team instructions and a fresh UI make it easier than ever to create your footballing vision and control how your team plays.

UPDATED USER INTERFACE
Upgrades and fine tuning make the FM Mobile UI the most intuitive of the series.

IMPROVED TEAM REPORTS
There’s now far greater insight to the strengths and weaknesses of your squad and new depth charts will highlight where you might benefit from playing the transfer market.

ALL-TIME BEST XI / TEAM OF THE YEAR
Judge how your current team stacks up against club legends with the All Time Best XI and see which of your players make it into your dream Team of the Year.

THE BEST OF THE REST…
• Choose your managerial starting reputation before starting your career
• Improve and develop your staff with training options
• Badger the board for a new stadium

comments: üíñLOVE THIS GAME!  BEAUTIFUL, STUNNING GRAPHICS on each level. Continues to the next story line and game level without any ads. Only issue it keeps freezing up on me as a new player to this game. I hope I don't have to uninstall it as  its the best came I've come across that I have truely enjoyed. To many games on Google play with kiddie themes. This one is just what I've been looking for. I üíñüíñüíñüíñ it. But if it keeps freezing up I'll have no choice but to uninstall it. How sad that would be.

Game is not fun at all. You spend too much time looking for stuff that it won't give you, not to mention that you need to match 5 gems to get any kind of special gem unlike other match 3 games where you get a special gem when you match 4 or more gems. If they change that I will be willing to give it another try. But until then I'm uninstalling the game and won't reinstall again.

I wasn't expecting to like this game but I started it 3 hours ago and I'm still playing so it must have something good about it or I wouldn't still be here. I'm more of a play a few min and move on. It has pretty graphics, and nice story line.

I love this game! The graphics are awesome and the games themselves are difficult but winnable. Just don't plan on playing through it very rapidly. The only complaint I have is that the story line is disjointed and sometimes difficult to keep track of. I would recommend this game to anyone who likes match 3 games.
Great game, nice to play. But too many instructions to play makes this game BORED. Waste a lot of time. Sorry to say, I just uninstall.

It is ok and worth a download. I am at level 36. The first 10 levels took two hours, then it got hard to make progress.  This is greedware requiring many $100s to play very long. The initial game plays over an hour, then becomes tedious and time-consuming. It is fine to play when on the toilet in the morning, and that seems appropriate. Mostly, this is just another match three game with excellent graphics and a modest story. Skip all the side games, those just waste resources prompting you to buy time or resources for real cash.  Never waste jewels to keep playing as there are unlimited replays only requiring you to wait for more energy to slowly but for free to build up for the next day's 15 minutes of play. The rewards for playing daily go at least for a year, so it takes a long time to finish.
description: When boring, uninventive match-3 puzzles prevail and all hope is lost, it all comes down to one single game ‚Ä¶ Cradle of Empires! descriptionHTML:
When boring, uninventive match-3 puzzles prevail and all hope is lost, it all comes down to one single game … Cradle of Empires! Become the Chosen One and help the ancient empire rise from the ruins in this adventurous match-3 game with a rich storyline, thrilling quests and captivating characters!

Cradle of Empires is an exciting — yet cool, calm and collected — family-friendly adventure. It takes you on a breathtaking odyssey that challenges your matching, building and collecting skills. With the help from Nimiru and Egyptian settlers, you can break the Amrun’s curse and restore the ancient civilization to its former glory. Step up and become the secret weapon in the triumph of good over evil!

WHAT MAKES THE GAME SPECIAL?

● Unique gameplay mix: You make matches, build a grand city and go on an adventure all in one … How awesome is that?
● Mega-sized adventure: You’ll be immersed in this engaging adventurous story with unexpected twists, gripping quests and memorable characters.
● Ancient cities and civilizations: You collect resources by playing match-3 levels, which help you rebuild the cities that evil had destroyed.
● Different game modes: You play 6 different match-3 modes, a variety you won’t find anywhere else.
● Many power-ups: You can earn a diversity of bonuses, power-ups and amulets — you’ll develop your own strategy for using them.
● Regular updates: You’ll never run out of new adventures as you’ll get new buildings, quests, bonuses, levels and whole civilizations in future updates.

All this and much, much more for FREE!

Get Ready for the holidays - Festive updates

Do you dream of coaching a team of eleven stars hungry to be champions? New, free soccer club sim Top Soccer Manager puts sports fans like you in charge! Top Soccer Manager's immersive 3D graphics and a powerful game engine bring your coaching fantasy to life. Watch stunning games play out in real time as you command your eleven players or bet on other matches in your league. Every goal is a step further on your journey to victory.

MANAGE & TRAIN YOUR SQUAD
As club head, you will test different formations, adjusting player line-up and tactics during play in response to your opponent. Pick a promising player to groom into a hero with special skills to score in the ultimate showdown. Build a team of champs to climb the leader board.

comments: This is a time consuming game. It is a not free game, non money users are extremely handicapped.  Easier to use than previous versions. Primarily a PC game. Playing off the app brower is like threading a needle underwater. Should be rated "R" for language and content. Still requires some finesse when using phone app and Android tablets. Good support.
I stopped playing for awhile and I love the new updates. You're game is still awesome.
I played this game when it first realesed years ago and it was extremely slow paced they have done a lot to improve the fun factor

Addictive and  overall  good game but could be improved. Anyone that's played for a number of years will agree that changes in the last year are ruining the game. The events pretty much every month now are ridiculous.  The instant builds & gold abuse are out of hand. Used to be a game of skill, a level playing field in regards to age, background & financial means, where players skill level & strategy were tested on the battlefield, now it's become a pay to win game where teams are assembled based on how much they will spend to win. For all the $$ Inno is making off gold purchases, they fail to invest back into the game experience for a smooth running game. Example, the game will freeze up on a player being op'd and they are not able to effectively defend. This issue has been brought up many times to Inno & has yet to be corrected. Players know the glitch & many exploit it, again making for an unfair playing field. Many long time & loyal players are choosing to leave the game after finishing up current, active world's due to changes in the last year or so. For new players, it's a fun & addictive game in which you have the opportunity to meet & play with people from all over the world, but be advised the description is misleading, it's not a free game & based on skill as it once was. If you want to win, be prepared that you will need to spend a great deal in the newer version pay to win it's become.
Worse then Trump
A great game for strategy

descriptionHTML:
Battle the legions of darkness across time and space as otherworldly anti-hero 'Eddie', in an epic turn-based fantasy RPG.

Collect, power up and evolve incredible champions to form the ultimate fighting team - battle through multiple worlds, defeat giant bosses, rebuild Eddie's shattered soul and save the universe!

COLLECT AND COMMAND
Warrior, Magus, Sentinel, Gunner or Assassin. 5 different classes and 100's of characters to collect. Defeat corrupted enemies, turn them to your side and create incredible teams!

UNLEASH INCREDIBLE POWER
Eddies come in many shapes and forms, each featuring their own unique set of powers and abilities, including; Cyborg, Mummy, Trooper, Vampire, Viking, Samurai, Bounty Hunter and many more!

ENTER THE PvP BATTLE ARENA
Prepare for Eddie Vs Eddie in the ultimate face-off! Put your strongest teams to the test against other players and fight for death or glory as you duke it out to gain valuable prizes and supplies.

STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY
Collect unique resources to upgrade and evolve your team, enabling strategic gameplay to counter the enemy. Over 40 different 'Talisman' sets to pick and choose additional abilities for your characters!

TRAVEL THROUGH TIME AND SPACE
Explore the furthest reaches of a sprawling universe, from the depths of underworld to ancient Egypt, past battlefields, an enchanted forest and beyond, all set in stunning 3D environments.

HALLOWED BE THY GAME
Features the incredible sound of Iron Maiden, with an epic soundtrack especially prepared for the game.

NOTES:
- IMPORTANT Minimum requirement: 768MB Ram, 1GB+ recommended
- Minimum Android OS: 4.1 or newer
- Minimum screen resolution: 800x480
- Recommended: Android device manufactured in 2014 or newer
- Requires online connection to play


Why is Iron Maiden: Legacy of the Beast free to play?
We want every Iron Maiden fan and every mobile gamer to be able to enjoy our game! You can fully enjoy the game without ever spending a penny! You can battle it out, earning every piece of of the game through sheer victory on the battlefield, or you can speed up your progress by purchasing Ironite in the Vault.

summary: Pop the bubbles, save the kittens!
title: Cookie Cats Pop

comments: Easy to pick up and varied game play.  Some of the controls can be a little repetitive but not to the point of distraction.  Keeps you interested and doesn't require a great expenditure of cash if you are a relatively casual player.  Plenty of good themed events.  All in all a good distraction which I have now been playing for almost a year !

I have been enjoying this game very much since I installed it maybe about a month ago. I actually stopped participating in a game that I've been in for 3 years for I find the is more entertaining, better graphics, quick response time on tickets and the community is more open. Highly recommend this game; which I might add is for all ages and gender who enjoy space battles and strategy. Thanks eh

Love this game. it would be nice to know what kind of equipment you are going up against in war like you see when you are in pursuit mode i.e. DT, CR, MS, BS and what kind of weapons and defense. Thanks for the great game

Great game with a large degree of strategy. Unfortunately, recent changes make it very difficult to obtain good heroes without P2P. This is most likely going to erode the free to play player base resulting in a game that is not as fun to play. Hopefully this can be rectified in future updates.

Ooh dear ooh dear how sad,, yes that directed to you again astro-(I've run out of ideas an getting desperate now)-nest.  Just had a login gift (cue fanfare) which was 2 pointless training id's.. Big bloody Whoop. Oh an let's not forget the equally pointless (get your hands in your pockets/debit/credit card rip-off) St Patricks day event. Cue no crystal/AP boosters.. Seriously you jokers should all have stripey shirts on with a little printed card with numbers on attached.. What's truly sad is the games good, possibly even great.. But! Greed as always outweighs the gamers creed.. FYI! I don't expect a reply.. Your preprogrammed bots don't know how to deal with genuine critism, nor do you care either
A very amusing game. It has its flaws, but so do you! :-)  At least give it a try, you won't be dissapointed.

descriptionHTML:
The fate of humanity rests in YOUR HANDS. Play the #1 Space SciFi Strategy MMO on mobile! Colonize planets, build epic fleets of spaceships and battle real players from around the world!

2525 AD. Man is an interplanetary species, forced into space and fueled by the discovery of 3 powerful new elements: Raon, Nugen and Sectium. Collectively called the Cosments, these resources were shared between the two dominant hegemonies, the Alliance of Neos and the Federation of Terra. But an already strained peace explodes from the devastating arrival of mysterious Alien fleets. Humanity’s confidence is shaken to its core, and war is now unleashed across the galaxies.

As a powerful commander, both Neos and Terra call upon your aid. Colonize planets, recruit skilled heroes and develop warships to lead in battle against a multitude of enemy commanders. Along the way, you will raid alien fleets to harvest their technology, discover TRONs and EXTERs, and form crucial alliances.

A prequel to the browser scifi classic, AstroNest (1999). The universe of AstroNest awaits. Which side will you choose?

SCIFI GAMEPLAY:
● EXPLORATION EVENTS: Play for free resources to upgrade your planets, heroes and spaceships
● CAMPAIGN: Destroy space pirates, collect resources and level up your nation
● PURSUIT: Capture space pirates, bring them to justice and collect your bounty

WORLD-WIDE MULTIPLAYER:
● MASSIVE MULTIPLAYER WAR: Work everyday w/your faction and engage in fierce inter-factional war
● ASTRO LEAGUE: Weekly tournaments amongst experienced commanders
● ALIEN TECHNOLOGIES: Raid aliens and harvest their technology to empower your fleets
● ALLIANCES: Form alliances w/users from around the world to send gifts to and aid in multiplayer raids
● FRIENDLY SKIRMISHES: Battle allies to hone your skills, test new formations and get rewards

DEVELOP:
● SPACESHIP STRATEGY: Create your own unique combination of spaceship formations and weaponized them for battle
● COLONIZE NEW PLANETS: Discover and colonize new planets to mine for and develop more resources
● DEVELOP HEROES: Recruit, hire and train to develop the best heroes for each role
● ASSEMBLE TRONS: Customize robots, called Trons, to boost your hero’s abilities
● HYPER RESEARCH: Get advanced alien technology to upgrade your fleet

INTERNET DATA USE:
● AstroNest: The Beginning, requires a stable internet connection and is best played on Wi-Fi. After the initial install and updates, AstroNest: The Beginning needs to download additional game data, Wi-Fi is recommended.

For suggestions and help, please contact us at: AstroNest.freshdesk.com/support/tickets/new
Like Us on Facebook for Updates, Livestreams and Free Prizes: Facebook.com/AstroNest
Join Our Official Community of Strategy & SciFi Fans: Facebook.com/groups/AstroNest
Check Out Our Wikia for How-To’s & Strategy Guides: AstroNest.Wikia.com
Visit Our Official Website: AstroNesttheBeginning.com
Subscribe to Our YouTube: YouTube.com/AstroNest

comments: Love the game, excellent game play, and really makes you feel in charge! However, for game play 4 stars, because it is really annoying that every ship coming into a port, or finishing repairs, you have to click on visit the port! Why can't there be a OK option there as well? But, overall excellent game!

This game has a great pace until ou get into the 10th year... then it slows down so bad.... just make it 60days every 2 hours... this game is boring at only 10 or 20 days in 2 hours... common dev team speed this up or I'm deleting this game! Great for a bit but really lags on... speed it up please
Would have rated 5 Stars but there's one thing... Lag. It's very laggy. When the ship leaves the port it doesn't go smoothly. It lags along. Great game otherwise

Great game. Fantastic for when you have some spare time. But for the the normal cargo (Not Contract) the loads need to be bigger than 28k tonne. Especially when you use the bigger bulk and container ships! Please make this happen
Gave it one star because after naming my company it keeps crashing upon leaving port on maiden voyage. It seems like a interesting game and will give it four stars if the issues are fixed.
I have a problem with the game play after the loading the ship.. Usually it will start automatically.. Now i have to do it manually.. Can anybody help me solve this problem?

comments: While the overall gameplay is pretty good. The whole game is literally a grind fest. Keep playing the same level over and over until you can upgrade, play another level, then proceed to keep playing the same level again. The competitive mode is also messed up as the opponent gets scores near impossible

Everything is great and good but only have one problem. And this problem will killing you all. That's the loading is damn slow no matter you are in LTE network or wifi situation. Because of slow loading it will kill your battery life fast as well. Please help to fix the problem and I will re-rate again. Thanks

Even with a perfect LTE speed game struggled with downloading hunts. The game forces you to do certain hunts before you can go back to the ones you like and want to finish. Not too mention every other minute it forces you to watch an ad or tries to get you to buy something from them. I will be deleting this app once i finish posting this comment.

Awsome game, the only thing wrong with it is that it takes forever to load. The graphics are amazing and so is the gameplay. This is something that could keep me entertained all day and I wouldn't get bored.üò∫üëå

The game currently wont open, when it does its constantly crashing and force stopping. I have the silver subscription ($1.00/weekly) and im unable to take advantage of the content im paying for  want a refund. The upgrades and new equipment are too expensive, the gear and parts are also too expensive and hard to come by especially for the spearfishing which is the best part of the game.. You certainly can't get very far without spending some real money. You can be killed by animals when the come from behind so you with your limited turning capability you have no chance to defend yourself. A lot of problems.
During cts theres moments get sudden lag and it throws off the shooting causing to miss when i know aiming right. It never had these lag bits before.

comments: This game is awesome. The girls are beautiful and the songs are nice. There are a couple of errors I be having with the game though. I would have liked if they had subtitles to the songs so we know what they are singing. Also give us a chance to earn more gems and scouting tickets.The scouting I think is also not fair. I would scout single ten times and not get anything but a rare. While my friends do single scouts and get ur and SSR. YOU won't get goods cards unless you pay or do the 11 scout. The pricings also could be improved

I like music game in general, it's hard to get the game right on mobile. but they manage to get it right here. The LP system prevent you to play continuesly unless you paid. But in my experience the amount is decent enough (this make you enjoy the music more since you dont have to restart to achieve perfection). The card mechanic is added bonus where you can spend hard earn cash. I can see people still enjoying the game without spending anything.

Warning! This game is freakin' addictive. Good graphic with cute characters. Recommended for anyone who loves idol genre ... Suggestion: please fix the lagging. The circle disappear sometimes during the live show. Sometimes the app even doesn't recognize my finger touch that makes me miss a circle. But overall. It's a good game  .... ALL HAIL PRINTEMPS AND GUILTY KISS

I love the game definitely but with the new update, it keeps telling me that there's a transmission error then when it went through and finished connecting, it said that the data transfer was successful. I haven't transfered anything to a new device or anything like that. The only options I'm given is to contact support and start a new game in which I definitely don't want to do. It isn't my connection because everything else on my phone that requires WiFi is fine and I can use it. Is this because of the new update?

I love the game and it's wonderful!!  But...  I had i don't know like a glitch or something.  When started to play the rhythm game while I playing suddenly the icon that I should press came faster all or a sudden. But the song is still OK.  After the glitch it becames back to normal.  This happen me for 3 times on the same day. Please fix it. And Thank you.

It's so addicting and a fabulous rhythm game. One thing I'm really picky on is that you press the circle on the beat and this is the only game so far that has stayed true to all the notes being on the EXACT beat. Other games don't do that and it bothers me to no end bc I don't know when to press but this game is great and I love it dearly. Also cute girls.
